GSP29nystik_u:1947: tathā cānupajātavirodhitvamatra bādhyatve hetuḥ, upajātavirodhitvaṃ ca bādhakatva iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1955: tasmād dṛḍhamūlatvāt tadapi tattvajñānaṃ mithyājñānaṃ nivartayatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:1958: āgamamayena hi jñānena prameyaṃ gṛhītvā śāstrīyeṇa ca nyāyavijñānenānumānāparanāmnā vyavasthāpya bhāvayato yadātmamanaḥsannikarṣād yogajadharmasahāyādutpadyate tattvaviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ pratyakṣaphalam, tatra trayāṇāmapi pramāṇānāṃ pratisandhānam astīti dṛḍhamūlatvāt tena mithyājñānaṃ bādhyate viṣayaṃ bhāvayatīti vyācaṣṭa--samāhita iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1959: samāhitatvena cetaso dhāraṇāṃ darśayati--ananyamanā iti pratyāhāram,
GSP29nystik_u:1961: dhyānajanitabhāvanā saṃskāro dhyānabhāvanā, tasyā viveko mithyajñānavāsanāyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1963: athābhyāsavaśāt tulyabalābhavat, atheyameva balīyasī tattvajñānavāsanāsaṃbhinnā mithyājñānavāsanayā sahānuvartate /
GSP29nystik_u:1964: saṃprati tu tattvajñānavāsanayā atyantabalīyasya samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt mithyājñānavāsanāyā bhavati viviktā tattvajñānavāsanā tasyāmityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1965: nanvanena krameṇa nivartatāṃ mithyājñānam, nivṛttaṃ taṃ tattvasākṣātkārasamaye 'pi kasmāt punaḥ svavāsanāvaśānna jāyate? na khalu mithyājñānavāsanā anādikālapravṛttā ādimatā tattvajñānena tatsaṃskāreṇa vā
GSP29nystik_u:1967: tāvadeva puṃsāṃ buddhayo 'sthirā bhrāmyanti svocitaṃ ca
GSP29nystik_u:1969: atha sākṣātkṛtya tatra sthirapadā bhavanti, kṣiṇvanti ca savāsanān
GSP29nystik_u:1979: bhavatu mithyājñānasya nivṛttiḥ savāsanasya, tato 'pi kimityata
GSP29nystik_u:1985: na ca tasmādeva rāgādīnāmabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1988: tayā virodhiguṇena viṣayatṛṣṇā ca tatparipanthini vidveṣaśca tadadhikaraṇāśrverṣyādayo nivartante
GSP29nystik_u:1989: asaktirviṣayaparityāgecchā, vaśitayā ca svayamupanateṣu viṣayeṣu mādhyasthyadarśanam /
GSP29nystik_u:1992: yadi hi janmanaḥ pravṛttiḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt, tato janmanivṛttyai tannivṛttirarthyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:1993: na punarasau kṣaṇikā sato āmuṣmikāya janmane kalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:2016: syādetat, mahāpralaye 'pi mithyājñānādinā duḥkhāntenāsti viyoga iti atrāpi muktiprasaṅga ityata āha--so 'yaṃ mithyājñānādineti /
GSP29nystik_u:2018: na ca pralayāvasthāyāṃ sarveṇa viyogaḥ, karmāvidyāvāsanayoranavināśāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2021: tannivṛttau śarīrādivat tattvajñānasaṃskārasyāpi pralaya ityaśeṣaviśeṣaguṇavimukto mukta ityucyata iti saddhim //
GSP29nystik_u:2027: no khlvayaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ samācāro yad duḥkhabhiyā sukhaparityāga iti, api tu sukhaṃ duḥkhād vivicya upādadate duḥkhaṃ ca varjayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:2028: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante, bhikṣukāḥ santīti sthālyo
GSP29nystik_u:2031: yadyapi sukhaduḥkhe bhinne, tathāpyanityatvakṛtakatvavat parasparānuṣakte iti na khalu sukhasya kevalasyopādānaṃ duḥkhasya vā kevalasya parivarjanaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2035: tatsvarūpamāha--yatraikaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā, tatretarat duḥkhaṃ vā
GSP29nystik_u:2038: na cāvinābhāvo vinā saṃbandhāditi tatsiddhaye saṃbandhavikalpānāha--samānanimittatā vā anuṣaṅgo 'vinābhāvaḥ, vāśabdaśca
GSP29nystik_u:2040: atra ca śarīrādyapekṣayā samānanimittatā, na tu dharmādharmāpekṣayā, na tu pūrvāpekṣayā
GSP29nystik_u:2041: atra ca śarīrādyapekṣayā samānanimittatā, na tu dharmādharmāpekṣayā
GSP29nystik_u:2049: yatraikaṃ tatretaraditi vā yatra yasminnimitte satīti vā yatrādhāra iti vā yatropalabdhisādhane satīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2054: svapadebhyaḥ pramāṇādayaḥ padārthāstattvato jñātā yathāyathaṃ mithyājñānādinivṛttikrameṇa apavarge upayokṣyante, kṛtamuparitanena prabandhena iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2056: na nāmadheyamātrāt pramāṇādīnāṃ tattvajñānaṃ bhavati, api tu lakṣaṇaparīkṣaṇābhyām ityasti prabandhasyottarasyopayoga iti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2058: yadi puruṣakalpanā mātrāt traividhyam, athānantyameva kasmānna bhavati?
GSP29nystik_u:2061: arthasya prayojanasya sākṣāt, śāstrakāryasya tattvajñānalakṣaṇasya tathaiva trividhayaiva śāstrapravṛttyā bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2064: na cāsya dharmidarśanamantareṇa pakṣadharmatā sidhyatīti tadupadarśanāya nāmadheyamātreṇa dharmiṇāmuddeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2065: yadyapi ca pratilakṣaṇamuddiṣṭā eva dharmiṇaḥ, tathāpi śāstrābhisaṃbandhaparādapi vākyāt samadhigamyanta ityuddeśo 'pyuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2066: na cāparīkṣito heturvyatirekī catūrūpo bhavatīti parīkṣāpyavaśyaṃ kartavyā
GSP29nystik_u:2070: arthaḥ tattvajñānaṃ tathābhūtam, yenārthena hetunā śāstrasya
GSP29nystik_u:2074: yadyapi pramāṇaṇādiśabdā api kārakaśabdā eva, tathāpyuddeśasamaye tadarthānāṃ sadapi kārakatvamavivakṣitam, api tu prātipadikārthamātram /
GSP29nystik_u:2075: ghrāṇādisūtre 1.1.12 tu lakṣaṇapare kārakatvaṃ vivakṣitam anyathā lakṣaṇatvāyogāditi adoṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2076: atra ca yadyapi sūtrakāreṇa saṃśayapramāṇaprameyeṣu parīkṣā sākṣāt kṛtā na
GSP29nystik_u:2077: prayojanādiṣu, tathāpi tatkaraṇādeva prayojanādiparīkṣāpi sūcitā sūtrakāreṇa iti trividhetyuktam
GSP29nystik_u:2084: na caitat sūtramasya lakṣaṇam, vibhāgaparatvāditi śaṅkānirākaraṇaparaṃ bhāṣyam--tatroddiṣṭasyeti
GSP29nystik_u:2085: tasyārthaḥ--yadyapi vibhāgaparametat sūtram, tathāpi pramāṇapadasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ sat sāmarthyāt pramāṇatvamapi lakṣayatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2087: pramā ca smṛteranyaḥ arthāvyabhicārī svatantraḥ paricchedaḥ tasmād vibhāgaparādapi sūtrāt pratīyamānaṃ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇamapekṣitaṃ saṃgṛhītamiti pramāṇatvopagṛhītānāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānāṃ yukto vibhāgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2088: tathā ca vibhāgaparatvena sākṣāt sāmānyalakṣaṇānabhidhānād vibhaktasya lakṣaṇamucyata ityuktam tacceha /
GSP29nystik_u:2092: tacca chale sāmānyataḥ, pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca viśeṣata iti gamayitavyam
GSP29nystik_u:2096: na ca vivekaḥ svarūpa upayujyata ityata āha--athoddiṣṭavibhāgadvāreṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:2097: nātra vibhāgamātraṃ vivakṣitam, api tu taddvāreṇa
GSP29nystik_u:2108: tenāyamartho bhavati, sāmānyenoddiṣṭasya vibhāgavacanaṃ viśeṣeṇoddeśa iti
GSP29nystik_u:2113: pramāṇalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto yat catvāryeva lakṣayati tadavagamyate na nyūnānyadhikāni vā pramāṇanītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2118: na ca pratyakṣādīnāṃ samānāsamānajātīyasya vyavacchede pañcamyādyabhāva upayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2119: lakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛttasya kvacidakaraṇaṃ na tadabhāve pramāṇam, sato
GSP29nystik_u:2125: akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti vigṛhyāvyayībhāve kṛte sarvendriyāvarodho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2126: nanu yadir idṛśo vigrahaḥ, kasmāt punarbhāṣyakāreṇa akṣasyākṣasyeti
GSP29nystik_u:2127: vigṛhyata ityata āha--anyathā tu vastunirdeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2128: arthamātramanena pratipādyate, na punaḥ samāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2129: atha kasmāt samāsa eva tena vigraheṇa na pratipādyata ityata āha--samāse
GSP29nystik_u:2131: yadi sūtragatasya pratyakṣapadasyāvyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ, anyatra punarasya kaḥ samāsa iti pṛcchati--kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:2135: kvacit pāṭhaḥ samāse hi pratyakṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeteti /
GSP29nystik_u:2137: tatra śaṅkate, kasmāt punaḥ sūtravivakṣayetyucyate, yāvatā sarvatraiva kasmādavyayībhāvo na bhavatīti? tatredamupatiṣṭhate--samāse hi avyayībhāvasamāse hi, sarvatra pratyakṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeteti /
GSP29nystik_u:2138: vyutpattinimittamātraṃ cedaṃ pratyakṣaśabdasya, na tu pravṛttinimittam /
GSP29nystik_u:2141: tannimittaḥ khalvayaṃ pratyakṣaśabdastatra tatra laukikaparīkṣakaiḥ prayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2142: yathā mayūraśabdo mayūratvasāmānyanibandhanaḥ kāsucideva patatrivyaktiṣu vartamānaḥ, mahyāṃ rautītyanvākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2143: tadidaṃ pratyakṣamuddhiṣṭamapi sat pramāṇatadābhāsasaṃkīrṇamiti tadvivekāya lakṣaṇamupayujyate
GSP29nystik_u:2144: yadi tūddeśapadaṃ tadvivecayet, kṛtaṃ tarhi lakṣaṇapraṇayanena //
GSP29nystik_u:2148: sa tu vyāpāra ucyate, yaḥ kārakaiḥ phale janayitavye cāramabhāvī dharmabhedaḥ phalotpādānukūlo 'pekṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2149: yathā paṭe janayitavye tantubhiścaramabhāvinaḥ saṃyogabhedāḥ, svarge vā janayitavye yāgenāpūrvamātmadharmaḥ, tathehāpi indriyādinā pramāṇena
GSP29nystik_u:2150: pramāyāṃ phale pravṛttena tadutpādanānukūlaḥ sannikarṣo jñānaṃ vā caramabhāvī dharmabhedo 'pekṣyata iti bhavati vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2152: vyavasthāṃ darśayati--yadā sannikarṣo vyāpāra indriyādeḥ pramāṇasya tadā jñānam ālocanaṃ vā savikalpakaṃ vā sākṣātkāravadvijñānaṃ pramitiḥ phalam,
GSP29nystik_u:2154: na cāntarālikena nirvikalpakenendriyavyāpāraviccheda iti pratyakṣavyākhyānāvasare nivedayiṣyate
GSP29nystik_u:2155: yadā jñānam ālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā vyāpāra indriyādīnāṃ tadā hānopādānopekṣābuddhayaḥ phalam
GSP29nystik_u:2156: tatropādeyamidaṃ salilamiti buddhiranāgatopādānaviśiṣṭaṃ salilamālambamānā na sākṣātkāravatī, salilamātrasākṣātkārastu syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2157: na ca tanmātramasya phalam, api tūpādeyatā /
GSP29nystik_u:2160: tatra toyālocanamatha toyavikaltaḥ, atha tajjātīyasya dṛṣṭacarapipāsopaśamanahetubhāvasya smṛtibījasaṃskārodbodhaḥ, atha tasya smaraṇam, atha liṅgaparāmarśaḥ tajjātīyaṃ cedamiti tadidaṃ liṅgaparāmarśavijñānaṃ sākṣātkāravat /
GSP29nystik_u:2163: na ca vyāptismṛtivicchinnamālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā na liṅgaparāmarśajñānaheturiti vācyam, tadudbodhitasaṃskāradvāreṇa vyāpsmiraṇe ca parāmarśe ca tasya tadānīmasato 'pi kāraṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2164: na khalu kṛṣikarma śasyādhigatisamaye samasti, na ca yāgādikaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2168: kā punariyaṃ pipāsopaśamanaśaktistoyasya, yā anumānagocaraḥ? na tāvat mīmāṃsakavadatīndriyā śaktiryusmābhirabhyupeyate, kiṃ tu kāraṇānāṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2171: sahakāriṇā pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇāṃ sākalyaṃ kāryasamutpādaikavya/janīyam, na tu tat toyarūpadarśanamātrāt śakyānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:2172: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadanumānasya gocara iti? atrocyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2175: na ceyaṃ svarūpameva, ihasthasyeva nārikeladvīpādāgatasyāpi vahnidarśanamātrād grāhakatvāvagamaprasaṅgāt
GSP29nystik_u:2177: idameva cāsya kāryopadhānaṃ yat kāryotpādāt pūrvamavaśyaṃbhāva ānantaryaniyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2178: na ca tajjātīyasya dṛṣṭacarasya tathābhāvadarśane 'pi dṛśyamānasya toyasya tad dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati yena tatra smaryeta /
GSP29nystik_u:2183: upādānaprayatnāprasavahetutayā nopādānamiti cet? kimiyaṃ hānaprayatnamapi prasūte yato hānaṃ syāt? tasmād yā nobhayaprayatnaprasavahetuḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2190: tathā ca liṅgadarśanodbodhitasaṃskārajā smṛtirvyavacchinnā, tasyā miteranyatvena lokasiddhatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:2197: na ca dharmo svarūpeṇārthyate, kiṃ tu jijñāsitadharmaviśiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2202: anumānajñānasya phalāvasthāyāmevārtho mita iti meyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2209: atha kasmāt hānādiviṣayaṃ pramāṇamucyate, na svagocaraṃ pratītyata
GSP29nystik_u:2211: yadyapi vahnijñānasyānumānasya sato heyatvādikaṃ viṣayaḥ, tatraiva vyāpārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2213: na hi panasaviṣayeṇa paraśunā khadire dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2214: tathāpi phalāntarānapekṣamutpattāveva vijñāne yat prakāśate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2215: tatra tu na tat pramāṇam, phalāntarājanakatvādapi tu phalamevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2218: bhāvasādhanaścet pramāṇaśabdaḥ phalamasyārtho na tu phalaṃ svaviṣaye
GSP29nystik_u:2220: na ca svaviṣayādanyad viṣayāntaramasya saṃbhavati, atiprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2222: yadyapi yatra phalaṃ so 'syautpattiko viṣayaḥ, tathāpi yatrānena pramāṇena
GSP29nystik_u:2223: satā hānādibuddhayo janayitavyāḥ, so 'pi vyāpāreṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2232: neyamupamānaśabdasya phalena nirūktiḥ, api tu pramāṇena nirūktiriti na vayāghāta ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2234: yat khalu caitra, gāṃ badhāneti vākyamidamityanusandhānātmakaṃ smārtaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2238: yadā hyetat pramāṇaṃ tadā vākyārthavijñānaṃ phalam /
GSP29nystik_u:2239: yadānumānavad vākyārthavijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadā hānopādānādibuddhayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2242: pratyakṣaparā hi pramāṇāntarajanyāḥ pramitaya iti pratyakṣasya prādhānyam
GSP29nystik_u:2243: yadyapi kiñcidanumānamanumānādipūrvakamapi, tathāpi prāyeṇa pratyakṣapūrvakam, upamānaṃ tu pratyakṣapūrvakamapi
GSP29nystik_u:2250: ato mahāviṣayatvaṃ prāthamya eva heturna caramatva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2252: etāvatā kramamātraṃ bhavet, na tu tadviśeṣaniyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2263: yadyapi pramiteḥ pratyakṣaparatvena pratyakṣasya prādhānyam, tathāpi śāstre vyutpādyatvenānumānasyāpi tadastīti sādhāraṇatayā na heturiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2268: na cānumānaviṣaye sāmānyarūpe saṃbandhini pratyarkṣa pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2271: etena śabdopamāne api parāste, tayorapi saṃbandhasaṃvedanādhīnajanmatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2272: tasmāt nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti vibhāgavacanamanupapannamiti śaṅkāmapanetuṃ vimarśapūrvakaṃ vicārayati sma bhārūyakāraḥ---kiṃ punaḥ pramāṇānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2277: āhita utpāditaḥ pratyayo niścayo yasya, saṃsargopadhānaṃ varhi prati sa tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:2283: tadanena dhūmavyāpakatvopadhānena dhūmād gamyamāno bahniḥ parokṣa iti darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:2287: upadhānānapekṣastu pratyakṣeṇāvyavahitaṃ sākṣād varhina viṣayīkṛtya nirākāṅkṣo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2291: so 'yaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvo bhedāśrayo vyavasthāyāṃ nāsti, vyavasthitānāṃ pratyekamekatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2292: tasmād vyavasthāyāṃ guṇapradhānabhāvo na cintya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2297: tatra teṣu madhye prāthamyāt pratyakṣalakṣaṇam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam ityādi sūtram
GSP29nystik_u:2303: yaḥ khalu kutaścid vyāmohāt samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ tadrūpaṃ na śakroti grahītum, so 'nena lakṣaṇena bodhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2306: itastvavagatalakṣaṇaḥ tenaiva vivicya pratyakṣatattvaṃ gṛhṇātīti samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedaḥ sūtrārtha ukta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2307: atra ca yaha ityadhyāhṛtya yattadonityābhisaṃbandhāt tat pratyakṣamiti pramāṇavāci pratyakṣapadra yojanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2308: evaṃ ca jñānapramāṇyapakṣe 'pi yat tadviśeṣyajñānaṃ pratyakṣaphalaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2309: liṅgaparāmarśo vā tadapīndriyārthasannikarṣotvannatvādyupetatvena bhavati pramāṇaviśeṣaṇamiti nāvyāpakatvaṃ lakṣaṇasyeti //
GSP29nystik_u:2314: saṃyogapadopādāne hi na samavāyo labhyate, samavāyapadopādāne vā na
GSP29nystik_u:2318: na cāsāvaṇvākāśādīnāmastīti satyapi saṃyogādau nāsāvarthasannikarṣa iti tadvyudāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2321: anyathā kuḍyādisaṃyuktenendriyeṇa kuḍyādivyavahitasya tatsaṃyuktasya ghaṭādeḥ tatsamavetasya ca rūpāderapi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2322: na caitāvatā trividha eva sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ samavāyaśceti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:2324: ye hi dravyaguṇakarmāśrayaṃ sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśsayamarthānataraṃ rocayante, teṣāṃ kathaṃ rūpādibhedānāmanyonyasya sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavet ? na hi tadindriyeṇa saṃyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2328: anubhūyante hi rūpagandhatvādayaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣā anugatāḥ, tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu parasparavyāvṛttimatīṣu ete nānubhūyeran asati sannikarṣāntare /
GSP29nystik_u:2329: yadi tu vaiyātyādāhuḥ nānubhūyanta eveti, tadā prativaktavyaṃ kutastyo
GSP29nystik_u:2330: 'yamanantāsu rūpagandhādivyaktiṣu rūpamiti vā gandha iti vā
GSP29nystik_u:2335: tasmādastīndriyeṇa rūpatvādisāmānyānubhavo yannibandhanāḥ kāsucideva kecideva vyaktiṣu vyapadeśebhedā iti siddhaṃ sannikarṣāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:2336: viśeṣaṇabhāvena ca saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇaṃ samavetaviśeṣaṇa ca saṃgṛhītam //
GSP29nystik_u:2337: yasyendriyeṇa yādṛśaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tādṛśaṃ tatra darśayati--tatra cakṣuriti
GSP29nystik_u:2341: santānena śrotre samutpādaḥ samavāya ityādi dvitīye nipuṇataramupapādayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2342: avayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātijātimantau ca mithaḥ saṃbaddhāvanubhūtete
GSP29nystik_u:2343: nānyathā tantuṣu paṭa iti ca, śuklaḥ paṭa iti ca, paṭaḥ spandate iti ca,
GSP29nystik_u:2345: śuklaḥ paṭa ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyajñānaṃ na tu saṃbandhijñānamiti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:2351: tasmād bhinne eva vastunī saṃbaddhe sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhāsete, asaṃbandhe gauraśva itivat tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2355: na hi jātu dadhiśabdaḥ kuṇḍe vartate kuṇḍaśabdo vā dadhni /
GSP29nystik_u:2356: vartante tu surabhimadharaśuklādiśabdāḥ svābhidheyaṃ nimittīkṛtya paṭādiṣu, evaṃ paṭādiśabdā api jātyādi nimittīkṛtya dravye pravartante iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2358: nāpi dravyeṇa, kiṃ tu taistainvitamekaṃ dravyaṃ pratīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2359: śabdānāṃ tu tatraikasmin dravye pravṛtteḥ tadvācyānāmaikātmyabhramaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2360: ayutasiddhyā tu kuṇḍe dadhītivat na sphuṭataro vivekaprakāśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2361: tadevamasti saṃbaddhānubhavaḥ, na cāsau saṃbaddhānubhavaṃ vineti saṃbandho 'nubhūyate, sa cāyutasiddhyādisaṃpattyā samavāyaḥ, na cāsyānyaḥ samavāyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2367: tat kimatra saṃbandhāntaraṃ kalpyatām? tathā cānavasthā ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2369: tasmād vinā saṃbandhāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva eṣitavya iti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:2370: evamabhāve 'pi yadindriyasaṃyuktaṃ vā yadvendriyasamavetu yathā bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti vā nāstyakāre 'nudāttasvara iti vā tasya saṃyuktasya vā viśeṣaṇabhāvena, samavetasya viśeṣaṇabhāvena cendriyapratyāsattyā grahaṇam
GSP29nystik_u:2371: na ca bhūtalādirūpameva ghaṭābhāvo nārthāntaramiti sāṃpratam, satyapi ghaṭādau bhūtalasya bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2372: na ca kaivalyaṃ tasya dharmo ghaṭabhāvavirodhī ghaṭābhāvādanyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2373: na ca dṛśye ghaṭādau bhūtalopalambhaḥ kaivalyamabhāvavyavahāraheturiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2374: evaṃ hi ghaṭasaṃsṛṣṭabhūtalagraho 'pi kaivalyamiti ghaṭābhāvavyavahāraṃ pravartayet /
GSP29nystik_u:2376: dṛśye 'nupalabhyamāna iti tu viśeṣaṇe kimaparāddhamupalabhyābhāvena yena tadapākaraṇāyopalambhābhāvo 'bhyupeyate? tasmāt sadivāsadapi tattvamabhyupeyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2378: na ca pratiyogismaraṇavyavahita indriyārthasannikarṣo nālamabhāvadhiyamupajanayitumiti sāṃpratamityagra darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2379: savikalpakassa pratyakṣatvasiddhau yathā śabdasmaraṇapūrvagṛhītapiṇḍānusandhānādayo nendriyavyāpāraṃ vyavadadhatīti, na ca śabdasmaraṇādīnāmanuyogitā, bhūtalavikalpaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2380: pratyaṅgatvāt, svāṅgamavyavadhāyakamiti nyāyāt, ghaṭasya tu pratiyogiteti
GSP29nystik_u:2382: kasya punaḥ pratiyogī ghaṭaḥ? tadabhāvasyeti ced bhavatu /
GSP29nystik_u:2383: ghaṭābhāvānubhavasya tu ghaṭasmaraṇaṃ heturiti na pratiyogi, kiṃ tvanuyogyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:2384: nanu svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ veśmādyarthaṃ smaranneva bahirnitaśrcaitro yadā pṛcchyate kenacit--vayasya, tava gṛhe tadā kimāsīt maitra iti ? sa caitraḥ pratiyogismaraṇavirahāt pūrvamapratipannamaitrābhāvo 'pi
GSP29nystik_u:2390: smaraṇābhāvaṃ maitrasya gṛhītvā tena liṅgena tadabhāvasya tadānīmanumānāt
GSP29nystik_u:2391: tathā hi tadgehaṃ tadā maitrābhāvavat jñānārhasya maitrasyājñāne gehasya jñāyamānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2392: yad yasya jñānārhasyājñāne jñāyate tat tadabhā vavat /
GSP29nystik_u:2396: na ca yat kadācidānumānikaṃ tenenidrayagamyena na bhavitavyam,
GSP29nystik_u:2401: tadanena prabandhena indriyasyārthena sannikarṣād yadutpadyate jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:2407: ātmīyena hi rūpeṇālokacakṣuṣī dravyaṃ darśayata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2408: mahattvaṃ vā anekadravyavattvaṃ vā, anekadravyā avayavāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2409: tadvattvamavayavino mahata eva na dvyaṇukasya, tasmādanyonyanirapekṣatvaṃ mahattvānekadravyavattvayoriti vikalpa eva nyāyya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2415: pratyakṣalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto hi sūtrakāraḥ tadeva brūyāt yadasyāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2438: yu/jānasya hi yogino yadātmamanaḥsayogādātmani buddhayo bhavanti tāḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2444: yadevāsādhāraṇaṃ tad vyapadeśabhāgbhavati, kāraṇatvena jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate
GSP29nystik_u:2446: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yathā cukṣuṣā indriyatvena jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate
GSP29nystik_u:2447: cākṣuṣamiti, tathā manasāpīndriyatvena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ mānasamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2448: evaṃ yathā rūpeṇārthena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ rūpajñānamiti, tathā ātmanāpyarthena vyapadiśyate ātmajñānamiti, tatra cāsādhāraṇatvameva tayoḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2449: yatra tvindriyāntaramevāsādhāraṇam, liṅgādi vā tatra cātmā nārtho 'pi tu pramātaiva /
GSP29nystik_u:2450: yathā rūpādijñāne 'numānādijñāne vā na tatra jñānaṃ mānasamiti vā
GSP29nystik_u:2451: ātmajñānamiti vā vyapadeśaḥ sa kasya hetāḥ, tayoḥ sādhāraṇyāt?
GSP29nystik_u:2455: yadā hi nāgarayoṣitaḥ kutūhalāt praṇihitamanaso vikasitaniḥspandanayanotpalāḥ saudhamālāgavākṣakairavanipatiṃ sabalavāhanamaticiraparāvṛttaṃ gopureṇa niviśamānamālokayanti, tadā khlvāsāmekenaivendriyamanaḥsaṃyogena kramavadanekendriyārthasannikarṣasahakāriṇā bhinnāni kramavanti
GSP29nystik_u:2459: yadā hi mandaṃ gacchati gavi dūrataḥ saṃyuktasamavāyenendriyārthasannikarṣeṇa śuklo gaurityajñāsīt, atha pratyāsīdan gacchatītyapi vijānāti tenaiva saṃyuktasamavāyena
GSP29nystik_u:2460: sannikarṣeṇa, tena pratyakṣajñānasya śukla iti ca gacchatīti ca bhede 'pi
GSP29nystik_u:2466: nanu bhavatūktamuttaraṃ bhede 'bhedādityasyākṣepaḥ samādhātavyaḥ ityata āha--anabhyupagamācca
GSP29nystik_u:2469: tat kimidānīṃ bhidyamānasya pratyakṣajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvānnokta iti bhāṣyam
GSP29nystik_u:2473: punaḥ pṛcchati--kiṃ punaḥ samānatvam, uttaram--vyapadeśābhāva ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2475: pratyakṣajñānasya rūpajñānasya rūpajñānamiti vā cakṣurvijñānamiti vā vyapadeśena bhidyamānasya ātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iva ayam indriyamanaḥsaṃyogo na bhidyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2476: evaṃ hi sa bhidyate, yadi svasaṃbandhivācakena vyapadeśena svamanyato
GSP29nystik_u:2477: vyāvartyate, na viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaṃ jñānamapyanyato vyāvartayet /
GSP29nystik_u:2478: na tvasti indriyamanaḥsannikarṣādhārābhyāmindriyamanobhyāṃ pratyekamasya vyapadeśo yathendriyārthasannikarṣādhārābhyāṃ indriyārthābhyāṃ vyapadeśo rūpajñānamiti cakṣurjñānamiti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:2482: lakṣaṇaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ bhavati yathā dhūmo vahneḥ na cātīndriyadvayādhārasannikarṣastathā prasiddho yathendriyārthasannikarṣo
GSP29nystik_u:2484: ātmā tu yadyapi yu/jānasya śarīrādyatiriktaḥ pratyakṣaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2486: tadanenātīndriyādhāratvaṃ svarūpeṇoktvā tadevaṃ viṣayāvṛttitvamanovṛttitvābhyām atīndriyādhāratvaṃ sāmānyamāha--viṣayāvṛttitvaṃ veti /
GSP29nystik_u:2487: upasaṃharati--tasmāditi samānatvāditi bhāṣyokto hetuḥ, caritārthatvāditi svoktaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2490: nanu nārtho viprakṛṣṭaḥ, cakṣuṣastatra prāpterityata āha--na tu cakṣuṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2493: tasya prasāda indriyāvyavadhāyakatvam kuḍyādibhyo viśeṣaḥ yaḥ khalu kācābhrapaṭalādiṣu svaccheṣu samasti /
GSP29nystik_u:2495: asti kṛṣṇasāralakṣaṇo bhūviśeṣaḥ prasannāndhasyāpi, atastasyāpi rūpopalabdhiḥ syāditpata āha--tattṛṣṇāpūrvaketi
GSP29nystik_u:2497: etaduktaṃ bhavati--bhūtaviśeṣaḥ karmāpekṣo rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti cakṣurityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2498: karmakṣāyāt tu prasannāndhasya na rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti na cakṣuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2502: kecit tu sāntaramiti grahaṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ hentu bruvate,
GSP29nystik_u:2504: sādhyaviparyayādasya vyatirekaṃ darśayati--na hi prāpyakāriṣviti pakṣadharmatāmāha--dṛṣṭaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2507: dvyāśrayo hi saṃyogo 'lpameva saṃyoginamanurudhyate, na mahāntam /
GSP29nystik_u:2508: na jātu rathādisaṃyogā nabho vyaśnuvate, mā bhūt sarvatra rathādīnāṃ tatsaṃyogādīnāṃ copalabdhiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2509: tena yāvanmātra rāṣṭravanādergolakena vyāptaṃ tāvanmātrasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2513: yadyapi gatikṣaṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ spāśrayasya deśāntaravibhāgasaṃyogopajananaṃ prati kṣipratayā na viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2514: svāśrayapratyāsattau cāviśeṣaḥ tathāpyā cāpādānavibhāgāt ā ca prāpanīyadeśaprāpterantarālavartī yāvān gatikṣaṇapracayaḥ pūrvāparībhūto gatiriha vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2515: tasya sāntaratvaṃ mandatvaṃ vilambaḥ nairantaryaṃ tu pāṭavaṃ kṣipratā /
GSP29nystik_u:2516: tāmimāṃ gatimabhindad nairantaryeṇa kurvadapi sannikṛṣṭamāśu prāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:2517: na viprakṛṣṭena tulyakālam, kiṃ tu viprakṛṣṭaṃ cireṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:2519: sāntaragrahaṇaṃ na syāt prāptau jñāne 'dhikasya ca /
GSP29nystik_u:2526: yadi ca syāt tadā paśyedapyunmīlya nimīlanāt //
GSP29nystik_u:2527: yadi ca syāt unmīlya nimīlitanayano 'pi rūpaṃ paśyet, unmīlanādasti bahirindriyamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:2528: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sāntaragrahaṇāditi hetuṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--yat
GSP29nystik_u:2535: yat tu prasādasvabhāvaṃ tejaḥ tanna gṛhyate, kiṃ tu tasya rūpamātraṃ visphāritākṣaṇa dṛśyate
GSP29nystik_u:2538: mā bhūd gandhādibhirantaraṃ dravyasya, mā na bhūtāṃ ca nirantare dravye,
GSP29nystik_u:2540: na cāpātajanmālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā dravyānumānaṃ pratīkṣate yena rūpajñānānumitaṃ dravyam indriyarthayordravyayorantaraṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2541: api ca rūpamātramagṛhyamāṇe dravye svatantraṃ gandhādivad gṛhyamāṇaṃ kathamantarā svāśrayamanumāpayet, ākāśādīnāmāśrayāṇamagrahaṇāt? tasmād viṣaktāvayavatejodravyāpratyakṣatvasamāropamātreṇa dūṣaṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ tvanyathāsiddhatvadūṣaṇaṃ pāramārthikaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2542: athābhāvo 'ntaraśabdavācya iti, nāsmākaṃ mūrtadravyābhāvādanyat ākāśamastīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2543: dūṣayati--sa svatantraśrcakṣurviṣayo na bhavati indriyaṃ cārthaṃ cāntarā
GSP29nystik_u:2544: abhāvo grāhyaḥ, tena sahārthasya grahaṇaṃ sāntaragrahaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2545: na cendriyārthayormadhyate kasyacit saṃyuktasya vā samavetasya vā
GSP29nystik_u:2548: mā bhūdāntarālikaṃ saṃyuktaṃ vā samavetaṃ vā viśeṣyaṃ gṛhyamāṇameva tu rūpādiviśeṣyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2551: pratīyate hi tvagādibhiḥ apīndriyaiḥ prāpyakāribhirauṣṇyābhavaviśeṣaṇa śiṣirataraṃ pāthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2556: na ca taijasaṃ rūpamantaram, yena sāntaragrahaṇaṃ syādityāha--na cānyā gatirati /
GSP29nystik_u:2558: ye tu sāntara iti grahaṇamiti hetumāhuḥ, tān prati dūṣaṇamāha---yairapīti
GSP29nystik_u:2561: tatra ya eva śarīrāsaṃbaddha ityanubhūyate tameva sāntara iti manyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2562: indriyasaṃbandho bhavatu, mā vā bhūt, śarīrasaṃbandhena tasya sparśādau na sāntaratvābhimāna ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2568: na caitat niryatā vinā pṛthvagratāṃ bhavatīti pṛthvagratā sūcitā /
GSP29nystik_u:2569: yathā vartideśe piṇḍitamapi tejaḥ prasarpat prāsādodaraṃ vyāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:2571: svabhāvataḥ prasaradapi na svaparimāṇānuvidhāyinaṃ pratyayamādhatte, kiṃ tu viṣayabhedānuvidhāyinam
GSP29nystik_u:2575: dehamarthaṃ cāntarāvasthitasya pṛthivyādeḥ saṃyuktasaṃyogālpīyastvaṃ bhūyastvaṃ cāpekṣamāṇasyeti
GSP29nystik_u:2577: sa ca tādṛgālokāvayavī pratyakṣo 'nyathā na rūpamātreṇa tadanumānaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2579: na ca khagānāmuparyupari saṃcaratāṃ dūrantikapratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2580: na ca patati patatriṇīha prāpto neheti bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:2584: acintyo hi tejaso lādhavātiśayena vegātiśayo yadudayagiriśikharam ārohatyeva mārtaṇḍamaṇḍale bhavanodareṣvāloka ityabhimāno laukikānām /
GSP29nystik_u:2585: tādṛśaṃ cākṣuṣamapi teja iti krameṇāpi gacchad yugapattatra tatra lakṣyate
GSP29nystik_u:2586: na caikasmādeva karmaṇo yugapad durāntikasaṃyogā bhavantīti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2588: anyathā madhurāsthasya devadattasya karma pāṭaliputreṇa devadattaṃ yojayet
GSP29nystik_u:2589: vegākhyasaṃskārajamapi karmana sahasā śaramantarāladeśena ca lakṣyeṇa ca yojayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2593: na cāyamasati bādhake mithyeti vaktuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2596: indriyaṃ yadyagatvānāgatamarthaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, kimasya kuḍyakaṭādyāvaraṇamapakuryāt yena tadāvṛtaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2597: gatau tu sparśavatā prasādarahitena saivāsya pratibaddheti na prāpnoti viṣayam, aprāptaṃ ca na gṛhṇāti /
GSP29nystik_u:2598: prāyogastu, cakṣuḥśrotre prāpya svaviṣaye kāryaṃ kurutaḥ, janakatve sati tadaprāptāvajanakatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:2599: yajjanakaṃ sad yadaprāptau yanna janayati tat tatprāptāveva tajjanayati,
GSP29nystik_u:2600: yathā kumbhajanakaḥ kumbhakāro mṛdo 'prāptāvakurvan kumbhaṃ tatprāptāveva karoti /
GSP29nystik_u:2607: prāptau tu dūraṃ gacchat prakṣīṇaṃ sat prāptamarthaṃ na gṛhṇāti ataijasam,
GSP29nystik_u:2608: taijasam apyabhibhūtaṃ na gṛhṇāti, yatholkāprakāśaṃ madhyandine /
GSP29nystik_u:2611: yogyo hi tādṛśa indriyakṣaṇaḥ svakāraṇādupajātaḥ pariṇato vārthakṣaṇaśrca,
GSP29nystik_u:2617: tena sthemabhājāṃ bhāvānāṃ svarūpayogyatā vā mahattvādirviṣayībhāvaḥ sahakārisākalyaṃ vā jñānopajananaṃ prati pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2618: tatra svarūpayogyatāmātraṃ cedāsthīyeta, tadā yadevāvyavahitaṃ sannihitaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2619: sad ajanayad vijñānaṃ viprakṛṣṭamapi vyavahitamapi tadeveti tathaiva tena jñānaṃ janayitavyam
GSP29nystik_u:2620: asti hi tasya tadāpi svarūpayogyateti, sahakārisākalyaṃ tu prāptireva /
GSP29nystik_u:2621: tasmāt na saṃbandhamantareṇa viṣayībhāva iti sūktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2624: kulālādau prāpyakāriṇi dṛṣṭaṃ yathā viprakṛṣṭo vyavahitaśrca na karotīti,
GSP29nystik_u:2625: tasmāt aprāpyakāriṇi cācaskāntādau dṛṣṭaṃ yathā viprakṛṣṭo vyavahitaśrca lauhaṃ maṇirākarṣati, tasmāt tatra pramāṇaṃ vaktavyamiti
GSP29nystik_u:2628: yadi tu kaśrcit dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatvam ubhdāvayet
GSP29nystik_u:2631: yogyatayaiva hi kāraṇāni svakāryaṃ kurvanti, prāptistu svarūpyogyatāprayuktāṃ vyāptimupajīvati, na tvasyāḥ svābhāvikaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2636: sa ca vyastānāmapyastīti yatra tatra vyavasthitebhyo 'pi
GSP29nystik_u:2642: prāptereva tatra tatra kāryotpādaṃ prati upayogasya viditasvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2651: ata eva bahirnisṛtāpyacchinnamūlā dṛṣṭiḥ kāryāya samarthā na chinnamūleti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:2652: pṛcchati--atha jñāneti, pratyakṣasamākhyātalakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣaṇe vidhīyamāne jñāyata evaitajjñānameveti loke sākṣātkārijñānahetoḥ pratyakṣatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2659: na khalu yaiva candanasparśajñānasyotpattau sāmagrī saiva sukhasyāpīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2660: asti hi śītārtasyāpi candanendriyasaṃyogāt śītasparśajñānam iti tadvadevāsya sukhamapi bhavet
GSP29nystik_u:2666: api copādānābhedaśrca kutaśrcit kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaśceti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2667: ata evāsmākamabhede apyupādānasya piṭharasyauṣṇyāparākhyasya ca vahinasaṃyogasya pūrvarūpādipradhvaṃsānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ bhedād bhinnajātīyā jāyante gandharūparasasparśā iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2668: tasmādarthapravaṇebhyo jñānebhyastadapravaṇatayā bhinnajātīyāḥ sukhādayo yathāsvamunakūlavedanīyatvādibhirlakṣaṇairanyonyamapi bhedavantastīvrasaṃvegatayā pramitsānapekṣamānasapratyakṣapravedanīyā iti ramaṇīyam //
GSP29nystik_u:2670: asatyapīndriyārthasannikarṣe jñānamātrādeva sukhaduḥkhayoḥ svapnāntike darśanāt yatrāpīndriyārthasannikarṣastatrāpi jñānamastīti tadeva sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kāraṇaṃ kluptasāmarthyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2674: sukhaduḥkhabuddhyutpāda eva cātra dharmādharmopayogo na tu susaduḥkhotpāde
GSP29nystik_u:2675: na cāsatīndriyārthasannikarṣe jñānamanyanmanorathādi vā tādṛśaṃ sukhabhedaṃ vidhatte yādṛśo viṣayopabhogajanmā /
GSP29nystik_u:2679: iśvarasyāpyasti tatrabhavato yogarddhisaṃpannānāṃ ca mahādhiyāṃ samastavastusākṣātmāra iti teṣāmapi sukhaduḥkhotpādapracayaḥ prasajyet,
GSP29nystik_u:2682: sa ca satyapyarthasākṣātkāre nāsti siddhānāmiti na teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhotpādaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2683: api ca caramabhāvi kāraṇaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvabhāvināmakaraṇatvāpādane tantvādīnāmapi paṭādīn pratyakāraṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2684: saṃyogabhedādeva tādṛśapaṭātpatteḥ tantvādīnāṃ ca saṃyogabheda evopayogāt
GSP29nystik_u:2686: yathāhuḥ padārthavidaḥ stragādyabhiprataviṣayasānnidhye satīṣṭopalabdhīndriyārthasannikarṣadharmādyapekṣādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāt yadanugrahābhiṣvaṅganayanādiprasādajanakamatpadyate tatsukham iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2689: tatrobhayyapi indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītāpi svaśabdenopāttā, tatra vipratipatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2691: tatra vyapadeśo viśeṣaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ vā nāmajātyādi, tat karma vyapadeśyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2693: tadyathā ḍittho 'yaṃ gaurayaṃ śuklo 'yaṃ kamaṇḍalumānayaṃ gacchatyayamiti sarvaṃ hi savikalpakaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena vastuṣu pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2694: avidyamānaṃ vyapadeśyaṃ yasmistadavyapadeśyaṃ jātyādisvarūpāvagāhi, na tu jātyādīnāṃ mitho viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāvagāhīti yāvat //
GSP29nystik_u:2695: tatra nāmarahitamavikalpakaṃ nāstīti ye vipratipadyante tanmatamapacikīrṣurūpanyasyati bhāṣyakāraḥ yāvadarthaṃ vai nāmadheyaśabdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2697: nāsti so 'rtho yaḥ kadācit kvacit kathañcit nāmadheyena viyujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2700: arthā hi pratīyamānāṃ nāmadheyairūpetāstatsāmānādhikaraṇyenāvagamyante gaurityartho 'śva ityartha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2704: na hi bhavati dhūmo 'yaṃ vahinariti kiṃ tu dhūmo 'yaṃ dhūmatvāt vahinamāniti /
GSP29nystik_u:2705: api cāśabdopāye 'numeyādau na śabdasaṃbhedenādhigamo bhavet, asti tu /
GSP29nystik_u:2706: tasmāt tairnāmadheyaiḥ saha samānādhikaraṇasyārthasya pratyayo yata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2708: kiṃ ca gavādiṣu ṣaḍjādiṣu ca śabdāpakarṣe 'rthapratyayāpakarṣāt tadutkarṣe tvarthapratyayotkarṣāt pratyayasya ca pratyetavyotkarṣādhīnotkarṣatvāt nāmadheyotkarṣeṇārthasyotkarṣaḥ arthasya tādatmyaṃ gamayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2709: tadidaṃ samaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃpratyaya iti samadhikaḥ pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2710: astyarthasaṃpratyayo nāmadheyasāmānādhikaraṇyena, na tvetāvatā nāmadheyātmatā sidhyati
GSP29nystik_u:2711: asti hi purovartidravyasāmānādhikaraṇyena rajatapratyayo na caitāvatā śuktī rajatātmikā bhavatītyata āha---arthasaṃpratyayācca vyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2714: yojanayati---tatredamindriyārthasannikarṣādutpannaṃ viṣayajñānaṃ rūpamiti vā rasa iti vā evaṃ rūpādyarthasāmānādhikaraṇyena bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2717: uktamapi vyapadeśaṃ savyākhyānamāha--rūpamiti jānīte rasa iti jānīte iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2718: tathā cārthānāṃ nāmadheyātmakatvāt tadgocaramālocanamapi nāmadheyagocaramityarthavat nāmadheyena vyapadiśyamānaṃ śābdaṃ prasajyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2719: na śabdapramāṇakatayā śābdam, api tu śabde jātaṃ śābdam /
GSP29nystik_u:2723: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
GSP29nystik_u:2730: tadasya nirākaraṇaṃ lakṣaṇagatenālocanajñānāvarodhārthenāvyapadeśyapadena sūcitam iti parīkṣāparvaṇi vacanārhamapi subhāṣitarucitayā tadvilambamasahamāno bhāṣyakāro lakṣaṇāvasara evāha /
GSP29nystik_u:2735: sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdātmakatvaṃ rūpādīnāmabhidhīyānaṃ śabdabrahmātmakatvaṃ vocyeta śreyamāṇagaurityādipadabhedātmakatvaṃ vā? na tāvadādya /
GSP29nystik_u:2737: na salvasmadādisamastadarśanapathātivṛttena śabdabrahmaṇā rūpādīnāmasti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītiḥ laukikānām /
GSP29nystik_u:2738: śrūyamāṇaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena tu tādātmyaprasādhane anupayuktaśabdasaṃbandhasya bālamūkādeḥ rūpādijñāneṣu nāsti śrūyamāṇaśabdagandho 'pi, prāgeva tu tatsāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2739: na ca teṣāmapi prāgbhavīyaśabdabhāvanānugamena tatsāmānādhikaraṇyamiti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:2740: na khalu rūpādyātmanaḥ śabdasya rūpādivaiśadyaināvaiśadyaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2742: veśadye tu vyutpannavadavyutpanno 'pi śabdaiḥ vyavaharet, na tu saṃbandhagrahaṇapekṣeta
GSP29nystik_u:2743: na ca tādātmyādanyad vācakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ yatra saṃbandhagrahāpekṣā bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:2746: na hyasti saṃbhavo bhedakalpanā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaprathā ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:2748: na kevalamabyutpannānām, vyutpannānāmapyastītyāha--gṛhīte 'pi ca śabdārthasaṃbandhe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2752: tathā ca yo ḍittho nānādeśakālāvasthāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ piṇḍabhedaḥ so 'yamiti
GSP29nystik_u:2754: na tvayaṃ piṇḍo ḍitthaśabda iti pratyayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2755: autsargikaṃ hi śabdānāmarthaparatvaṃ kvacit punarityādibhiḥ śabdaistadapodyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2756: yatrāpi saṃbandhapratipādanamabhedena ayaṃ ḍittha iti, tatrāpi śabdo vācyatvaparo na svarūpaparaḥ yathā gaurvāhīka iti lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogaparaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2757: na ca tanmātreṇa vāhīkasya gotvaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2758: tasmād bhinnayoreva śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhagrahāt tanmūlatvācca śabdavyavahārasya na śabdapuraḥsaramapi jñānaṃ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyamātmano 'rthasyāvagamayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2759: yattu śabdānupāye 'pi jñāne śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ bhavati tadgṛhītasaṅketasya prathamamindriyārthasannikarṣādālocanena śabdasaṃsargarahitenālocite 'rthamātretasyārthabhedasya śabdabhedena saṃbandhāt śabdaviṣayaḥ saṃskāraḥ prabodhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2761: tena vyutpannasya nirvikalpakāt parāñcaḥ pratyayāḥ śabdānupāyā api śabdapuraḥsarā jāyante
GSP29nystik_u:2764: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ san saṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2765: tasmād vyutpannasyāpi nāmadheyasmaraṇāya pūrvameṣitavyo vinaiva nāmadheyamarthapratyayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2768: yadā tu so 'rtho gṛhyate nāmadheyarahito nāmadheyasmaraṇāt
GSP29nystik_u:2769: pūrvamavikalpena tadā pūrvasmād avyutpannāvasthāyām arthajñānāt na viśiṣyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2770: yato na viśiṣyate tasmāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2771: nanu parapratipādanādilakṣaṇavyavahārāya svarūpeṇa jñāne vyapadeṣṭavye yadarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate tadavagacchāmo 'rthavyapadeśākāramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2772: kathaṃ cārthākāraṃ bhavati? yadyarthavyapadeśayornābhedaḥ, tasmāt punarapi tādātmyaṃ prasaktamityata āha--tasya tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2773: arthākārameva tu jñānamarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate anyathā aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2776: tadevamarthajñānakāle sa na samākhyāśabdo vyāpriyate pratīyamānatayā,
GSP29nystik_u:2777: vyavahārakāle tu parapratyāyanakāle tu vyāpriyate kāraṇatayā /
GSP29nystik_u:2778: tadanena gopālāvipālādīnāṃ saṃjñāniveśanaṃ tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu vyavahārotkarṣahetuḥ nārthotkarṣaheturityapi sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2782: cākṣuṣaṃ hi rūpajñānaṃ rūpa eva niyataṃ na śabde pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2783: evaṃ śrautramapi śabda eva niyataṃ na rūpādau pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2784: yadi punaridaṃ śabdātmakaṃ rūpādi bhavet, śrotrajaṃ jñānaṃ śabdagrāhīti
GSP29nystik_u:2787: api ca śrūyamāṇaśabdātmatve rūpādīnām, teṣāmapi śravaṇagrāhyatvamityandho 'pi rūpu gṛhṇīyāt
GSP29nystik_u:2788: asti hi tasya śrotraṃ ca śabdajñānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:2790: asti hi tasya locanaṃ ca rūpajñānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:2792: śabdatvāt, aśabdatve vā sa evāsyārthaḥ śabdād bhinnaḥ prasajyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2800: indriyārthasannikarṣeṇa hi liṅgena yadindriyagātijñānaṃ tadapi pratyakṣalakṣaṇopetamiti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata iti tannivāraṇāya avyapadeśyapadam /
GSP29nystik_u:2806: nanvindriyagatijñānamapi indriyārthasannikarṣālliṅgādutpannamityata āha---na hyanumeyasyeti naitadindrayārthasannikārṣādupajāyate, kiṃ tu tajjñānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2807: ata evātīte 'pi dhūmādau liṅge tatsmaraṇamātrādevānumeyajñāna bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2808: na ca sannikarṣapadasya mukhyatve saṃbhavati jñānalakṣaṇā yuktetti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2813: yadyapi sāmānyalakṣaṇenaiva vyabhicāriṇo nirastāḥ pratyayāḥ tadapekṣaṃ ca
GSP29nystik_u:2818: na hi cakṣurādīnāṃ grahaṇamupayujyate, api tu sattaiva /
GSP29nystik_u:2820: na khalvagṛhītaṃ liṅgaṃ vā śabdo vā āgamasahitaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vā yathāviṣayam ādadhāti pramām
GSP29nystik_u:2823: śabdādau tu yadyapi pramopajananaṃ prati nārthāvyabhicāragrahāpekṣā,
GSP29nystik_u:2831: evaṃ yathā mudgastambastathā mudgaparṇīti āptavākyaśravaṇādeva mudgastambasādṛśyajñānasyānupajanitaphalasyāpi śakyaṃ tadarthāvyabhicāritvaṃ niśrcetum /
GSP29nystik_u:2832: pratyakṣasya tu pramāṇasyātyantaparokṣasvarūpolambha eva tāvat pramopajananāt prāg durlabhaḥ, prāgeta tu tasyārthāvyabhicāritvam /
GSP29nystik_u:2833: yadyapi ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'pi tatsaṃvedanaṃ manasā sulabham,
GSP29nystik_u:2835: api tu asādhāraṇendriyārthasannikarṣasahāyamiti tatsahāyasya tasya parokṣatvameva /
GSP29nystik_u:2836: tena pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya phalāvyabhicāreṇaivāvyabhicārajñānam, na svarūpataḥ ityetat pramāṇāntarebhyo vyāvṛttamasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣasya
GSP29nystik_u:2841: yattu bādhitaviṣayaṃ satpratipakṣitaṃ cānumānam, tadapi yadyapi prathamaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2842: vyāptigrahaṇadoṣeṇa na khaṇḍitam, tathāpi khaṇḍanottarakālaṃ so 'pi
GSP29nystik_u:2844: tathā ca vyāptigrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tatrāpi vyabhicārīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2848: tadevaṃ pratyakṣāvyabhicāre pramāṇānāmavyabhicāro 'stīti pratyakṣasyaiva viśeṣaṇamavyabhicāripadaṃ cakāra, netareṣāṃ pramāṇānām /
GSP29nystik_u:2849: na hyasti saṃbhavastanmūlaṃ pratyakṣam avyabhicāri, tāni ca vyabhicārīṇīti
GSP29nystik_u:2855: tasmāt suṣṭhūkaṃ grīṣme marīcaya iti bhāṣyam,
GSP29nystik_u:2863: atra ca na nirvikalmakaṃ bhrāntam, kiṃ tu savikalpakamityāha--tāṃstu
GSP29nystik_u:2865: indriyeṇālocya marīcīn uccāvacamuccalato nirvikalpakena gṛhītvā paśrcāt tatropaghātadoṣād viparyeti, savikalpako 'sya pratyayo bhrānto jāyate iti
GSP29nystik_u:2867: yathāhuḥ niruktakārāḥ, naiṣa sthāṇoraparādho yadenamandhe na paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:2870: no khalu saṃśayajñānaṃ vikalpyamānavastugocaraṃ tadrūpaṃ vastu prāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2871: aprāpayaccopadarśitaṃ kathaṃ saṃvādam, asaṃvādakaṃ ca kathamavyabhicāri?
GSP29nystik_u:2874: na ca tadevāsya preṣiturvi dhitsitam, tathehāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:2876: tathā hi vyavasāyo viniśrcayo vikalpa ityanarthāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:2877: sa evātmā rūpaṃ yasya tat savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:2878: tadetadatisphaṭatvāt śiṣyairgamyata eveti bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyām avyākhyātamapi asmābhiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2884: na cendriyārthābhyāṃ labdhajanma vijñānamarthāvabhāsaṃ śakyamabhilāpena yojanayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:2885: na hyarthe śabdāḥ santi, arthātmano vā, tathā satyavyutpannasyāpi vyutpannavad vyavahāraḥ syādityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2888: na hi rūpāt jāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ rasasahitametadādarśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2889: tasmādabhilāpasaṃsargānapekṣamabhilāpasaṃsargiṇamādarśayad vikalpavijñānaṃ vikalpavāsanotthāpitamaniyatārthagrāhi mānasamātmīyamutprekṣālakṣaṇaṃ vyāpāraṃ tiraskṛtyānubhavaprabhavatayā anubhavavyāpāraṃ darśanu puraskṛtya pravartamānamanubhavatayā abhimanyante pratipattāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2890: tat siddhametat, yadarthasāmarthyalabdhajanma, na tat śabdakalpanānugatam,
GSP29nystik_u:2898: tathā hi yadabhilāpakalpanānugataṃ na tadarthasāmarthyajaṃ yatheśvarapradhānādivikalpavijñānam
GSP29nystik_u:2899: tathā caite vivādādhyāsitā vikalpā iti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2900: niṣedhyamarthasāmarthyajatvaṃ tadabhilāpakalpanānanugatatvena vyāptaṃ tadviruddhaṃ ca sadanugatatvamiti
GSP29nystik_u:2901: na ca sandigdhavyatirekitā, arthasāmarthyena hi tadutpadyamānamartharūpam
GSP29nystik_u:2903: na hyarthe śabdāḥ santi tadātmāno vetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2905: saṅketavaśāt śabdānāmarthasaṃbandhenārthopalabdhau tatsmaraṇāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭavedanamiti cet? yatra tarhi te kṛtasaṅketāḥ tadeva smārayedetān
GSP29nystik_u:2906: tatraiva ca te kṛtasaṅketā yadanugataṃ sāmānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2907: na ca taddṛṣṭam, kiṃ tu svalakṣaṇaṃ darśanagocaraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2908: tadeva hi paramārthasadvijñānasya kāraṇam, na tu sāmānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2910: tasmād yad dṣṭaṃ na tena śabdānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ, yena ca saṃbandho na taddṛṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:2911: api ca dṛṣṭasya śabdavācyatve darśanādiva vahinaruṣṇa iti vākyādapi pratīyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:2912: tathā ca śabdādapi tasmin pratīte śītāpanopanaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2914: tādṛśaṃ ca taddarśanasya kāraṇamiti nirvikalpakena prathamākṣatannipātajanmanā jātimadvastuvedanāt tatropalabdhacarasaṃbandhasya śabdasya smaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2915: tathā ca tacchabdābhidheyajātiviśiṣṭadravyāvagāhīndriyārthasannikarṣajanmā vikalpapratyayo gaurayamityevamākāro jāyata iti cet? yathāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2917: grahaṇam ślo. vā. pratyakṣa. 118 tathā tataḥ paraṃ punarvastu dharmairjātyādibhiryayā /
GSP29nystik_u:2921: na hi jātijātibhantau vā kriyākriyāvantau va guṇaguṇinau vā tatsamavāyo vā vivekena cakāsati
GSP29nystik_u:2922: na ca vivekenāpratibhāsamānaḥ śakyā mitho yojayituṃ kṣīrodakavadatadvedinā
GSP29nystik_u:2924: api ca paramārthasadvastudvayavedane 'pi kuto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ? na hyaṅgulyāvekavijñānaviṣayau mitho viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamāpadyete //
GSP29nystik_u:2927: na caikavijñānasamārūḍhayorjñāpyajñāpakabhāvo vā kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā saṃbhavī, samānakālayoḥ tayorūbhayorapi paurvāparyaniyamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2928: api ca vastuniveśe jātyādīnāmupādhīnāmekasya vastunaḥ sattvaṃ ca dravyatvaṃ ca pārthivatvaṃ ca vṛkṣatvaṃ ca śiṃśapātvaṃ copādhaya iti dūrādekopādhiviśiṣṭasya grahe sarvopādhiviśiṣṭagrahaprasaṅgaḥ tathā hyādhārādheyabhāva upakāragarbho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2929: patanadharmaṇo hi badarasyottarasya kuṇḍamadharaṃ pratayāsannamapatanadharmakaṃ badaraṃ vidadhadādhāraḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2933: tasmāt svabhāva eva svakāraṇādhīnajanmā dravyasya sa tādṛśo yena bahūnāmupādhīnāmupakarotīti vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2934: tathā ca sattvopakārasamartheṃ tasmin dravye gṛhyamāṇe dravyatvādyupakārasamartho 'pi sa evāsya svabhāva iti tatsvabhāvāvacchinnāḥ sattvavikalpakena paramārthasaddravyāvagāhinā sarva eva dravyatvapārthivatvavṛkṣatvaśiśapātvādayo viṣayīkṛtā iti vikalpāntarāṇāmānarthakyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2942: asmākaṃ tu anādivikalpavāsanopādānā vikalpā yacca gṛhṇanti, yacca adhyavasyanita tayorūbhayorapyanyanivṛttirūpatayā avastutvāt matāgapi na
GSP29nystik_u:2943: paramārthasad vastu gāhante, pāramparyeṇa tu vastupratibandhāt tatra pravartayantaḥ prāpayantaśca na visaṃvādayanti lokam /
GSP29nystik_u:2945: api cālocite vastunīndriyeṇa tadanantarotpannaṃ śabdasmaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramindriyamarthaśrca na savikalpikāmapi dhiyamupajanayitumarhataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2949: na ca yadevālocanamajījanadindriyaṃ tadeva smaraṇasahakāri vikalpapratyayamādhatte /
GSP29nystik_u:2961: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca saṃbandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim /
GSP29nystik_u:2965: jātiguṇakriyāvatāṃ caitanna saṃbhavatyeva rūpavivekasaṃbandhayorapratibhāsanena ghaṭanāyogāt kṣīrodakavadatadvedinetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2970: syād virodho yadi svalakṣaṇamevārthaḥ, na tvetadasti /
GSP29nystik_u:2972: tena tajjanitaṃ jñānamarthasāmarthyajaṃ cābhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2974: na ca dravyādyabhinnaṃ jātyādi bhinnaṃ kalpayanto vikalpā nārthasāmarthyajanmāna iti sāṃpratat
GSP29nystik_u:2976: yathā ca bhede 'pi teṣāṃ tadvācakānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:2980: uktametad avyapadeśyapadavyākhyānāvasare yathā na śabdābhedenārthayorekendriyajñānasaṃsargitā kiṃ tu prathamamālocito 'rthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2981: sāmānyaviśeṣavān saṅketagrahaṇsamayavartinīmātmano 'vasthāṃ smārayan tatkālabhāvinaṃ śabdamapi smārayatyavarjanīyatayā /
GSP29nystik_u:2986: śabdastu saṃpātāyāto na niveśayatyātmānam indriyaje vikalpe /
GSP29nystik_u:2989: cakṣuṣāpi sa evāyaṃ piṇḍaḥ saṃprati dṛśyate //
GSP29nystik_u:2993: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP29nystik_u:2998: na ca prāgavasthāsmaraṇasāpekṣatayā nendriyārthasannikarṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ vikalpasyeti sāṃpratam
GSP29nystik_u:3004: na hi nājījanat kuśūlasthaṃ bījamaṅkuramiti na samavahitakṣityādisahakārigrāmamapyasyājanakaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3005: na ca janakatvājanakatvalakṣaṇo viruddhadharmasaṃsargo bhedaheturityupapādayiṣyate kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge
GSP29nystik_u:3008: na ca vartamāno 'rthaḥ smaraṇagocaraḥ smaraṇasyānubhavajanitasaṃskārodbodhajanmanaḥ pūrvānubhavagocaraṃ prati niyamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3010: na hi rūpaviṣayāḥ sahasramapi nayanapradīpādayaḥ śabdaviṣayasya śravasaḥ sahakāritāmāpadyanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3011: tat kiṃ bhavatāṃ yatra gandhajñānānantaraṃ cākṣuṣaṃ rūpajñānaṃ jāyate tatra gandhajñānam na samanantarapratyayaḥ? tatrāpi hi cakṣūrūpaviṣayaṃ na gandhaviṣayasya jñānasya sahakāri bhavitumarhati, bhinnaviṣayatvādeva /
GSP29nystik_u:3012: athānvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo na samānaviṣayatvamanuvidhīyate ityucyetra, tadasmākamapi samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3014: tat kiṃ yadindriyasaṃbaddhaṃ tat pratyakṣam? tathā satyākāśaparamāṇvādayo 'pi tatsaṃyuktā iti te 'pi pratyakṣāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:3017: nanvasaṃbaddhamindriyaṃ kathaṃ tatra jñānaṃ janayati? tacca jñānaṃ kathaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3020: vyāpnoti, asyaiva pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇenāvyānāt? mā bhūdarthasya pūrvakālavartitā indriyagocaraḥ, tathāpi smaraṇasahakāriṇā saṃskārasahakāriṇendriyārthasannikarṣeṇopajanitaṃ tadindriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ na bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3027: yathā hyekasmin padmarāgamaṇau gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyate, yadi punarnaṃ vyavacchidyeta tadā bhāvo na paricchidyeta, tasya svābhāvavyavacchedarūpatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3028: tadabhāvāvinābhāvinaśrca puṣparāgādaya iti te 'pi sarve vayavacchinna bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:3029: yadi punarna vyavacchidyaran, sa eva puṣparāgādyatmeti tadavinābhāvī padmarāgābhāvaḥ padmarāgaśrca syāditi durghaṭamāpadyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3033: tathāpi yadyasau taddeśakālasaṃbandhādanyasvabhāvo bhavet, tathā sati sa
GSP29nystik_u:3035: tasmāt pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhādanyo 'paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti siddho viṣayabheda iti //
GSP29nystik_u:3041: tasmād viṣayabhodāt virodha iti cet---na tvihāpi tadekaṃ jñānaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3042: tasyaivaikasya vastunaḥ pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhe parokṣamaparokṣaṃ vā paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti ko virodhaḥ? yo 'pi kāladeśasaṃbandhabhedena viṣayabheda uktaḥ, so 'pi ayuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3043: yato yuktaṃ yat padmarāgasvarūpagrahe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyata iti,
GSP29nystik_u:3046: cet? athaitadabhāvāvinābhāvajñānaṃ kutastyam? tayoḥ kadācidapi tādā
GSP29nystik_u:3047: tmyenānupalambhāditi cet---yatra tarhi tādātmyamupalabhyate na tatra
GSP29nystik_u:3050: tasmāt parvāparadeśakālau tatsaṃndhau vā kāmaṃ bhidyeyātāṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3052: na tu tadāliḍrigatasvabhāvaḥ padmarāgamaṇi/, tasya tābhyāmanyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3054: na cendriyārthasannikarṣābhāve 'pi pūrvāparāvasthāparāmarśātmano vikalpasya bhāvādanindriyajayatvamiti sāṃpratam, tathā satyavikalpakamapi kāmāturasya kāminīṃ bhāvayataḥ tadviṣayamindriyārthasannikarṣaṃ vināpi dṛṣṭamiti nīlādyanubhāvātmāno 'pi avikalpakā anindriyajāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:3055: yadi tu nīlādyanubhavānāṃ kāminyanubhavāt kathañcid viśeṣaṃ brūyāta, tadā asmākamapi anindriyajebhyo vikalpebhya utprekṣāvyāpārebhyo 'stīndriyajānāṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3057: na ca vikalpagato darśanavyāpāro 'nubhūyamānaḥ sati saṃbhave nirvikalpakopādhiriti yuktam
GSP29nystik_u:3058: sarvā eva hīndriyajā buddhayo vikalpikā avikalpikā vā dhārāvāhinyo 'mahamikayā parasparānapekṣā ekamarthamavagāhamānā udayante vyayante ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3060: tasmāt indriyārthasannikarṣalabdhajanmāno vikalpā darśanavyāpārā nānya iti yuktamutpaśyamaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3061: na ca śabdapratyakṣayorvastugocaratve satyapi pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3062: na ca vahinasaṃyogajanmā śītāpanodo vahinajñānād bhavitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:3063: na caikopādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhyantaraviśiṣṭatadgrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3064: svabhāvo hi dravyasyopādhibhirviśiṣyate, na tūpādhayo va tairviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3065: na ca yat svabhāvasaṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3068: api ca rūpajñānaṃ viṣayagrahaṇadharma nānāparamāṇuviṣayaṃ na paramāṇusvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3069: tatsvabhāvatve vā teṣāṃ sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt sarvaireva te paramāṇavo viditāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3070: na cāsaṃbaddhā eva svajñānena rūpaparamāṇavo viṣayāstasyeti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3072: svabhāva evārthajñānabhedayoḥ saṃbandho yadartho viṣayo jñānaṃ ca viṣayīti cet? hantopādhyupādhimatorapi svabhāva eva saṃbandho 'stu tathāpi vijñānārthavanna svarūpābhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3078: evaṃ viśeṣyajñānamapi viśeṣaṇāviṣayaṃ kena svaviṣayamavacchindyāt, tayoḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3079: parasparavārtānabhijñatvāt? tābhyāṃ vāsanā, tato mānasapratyayo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvākara utpadyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3080: na tvasti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vāstava iti cet? astu tāvad vāstavāvāstavacintā /
GSP29nystik_u:3082: yastu bhavatāmasya mānasatve prayāsaḥ, sa varamindriyajatva eva bhavatu,
GSP29nystik_u:3083: tathā sati darśanavyāpāratvamasya sākṣāt samarthitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3086: hanta bhoḥ kiṃ mānasamapi jñānaṃ saṃkalayitumarhati? saṃkalayati manasastatkāraṇasya sarvaviṣayatvāt iti cet? yadi pūrvakaṃ vijñānaṃ manaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3087: kathaṃ tasya sarvaviṣayatā? asmākaṃ tu manaḥ sarvaviṣayamapi acetanatayā na vicārakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3088: tasmādātmaiva sakalajñānatajjanitavāsanādhāraḥ smartā ca pratisandhātā ca
GSP29nystik_u:3090: ātmanyeva sthitaṃ jñānaṃ sa hi boddhātra gamyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3091: smaraṇe cāsya sāmarthyaṃ sandhānādau ca vidyate //
GSP29nystik_u:3092: ślo. vā. pratyakṣa. 122 sa salvindriyārthasannikarṣādālocya jātimantaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3095: karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ buddheḥ kartā cātma sacetanaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3097: tenaikavijñānavedyatve yadyapi jñāpyajñāpakabhāvarūpa upakāryopakārakabhāvo nāsti, tathāpi,
GSP29nystik_u:3099: arthau hi rūparūpibhāvena sthitāvapi nāpātajanmanā jñānena tathā gṛhītau,
GSP29nystik_u:3101: na hi yāvadasti tāvad grahītavyam, tena tadekadeśagrahe 'pi nāpramāṇatā /
GSP29nystik_u:3102: savikalpakaṃ tūktasāmagrījanma jātyādirūpatayā dravyaṃ ca rūpitayā kalpayat paścājjāyamānamapīndriyārthasannikarṣaprabhavatayā pratyakṣaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:3104: tat siddhametad vivādādhyāsitā vikalpāḥ svagocare pratyakṣā avyabhicāritve sati indriyārthasannikarṣajatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:3105: yo ya evaṃbhūtaḥ sa sarpaḥ pratyakṣo yathālocanam, tathā caitat /
GSP29nystik_u:3111: nanu satīndriyārthasannikarṣe purovartini dravye dhūma iti vā reṇuriti vā jñānamutpadyamānaṃ kathamanindriyajamityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3113: saṃpūrvo hi śīḍ bhāvapratyayānto viśeṣāpekṣe vimarśe vartate sa caikādhikaraṇau smaryamāṇau mitho viruddhau dharmāvāropayan anyatarannāvadhārayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3116: ata eva visphāritākṣāḥ saudāminīsaṃpātāt sakṛdālocya kañcit samānadharmavantaṃ dharmiṇaṃ samandhakāre sandigdhe, tasmānmānasa evaiṣa saṃśayo na tvindriyaja ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3117: tadetat pariharan na caitadityādi bhāṣyaṃ vcācaṣṭe---tacca naivam /
GSP29nystik_u:3123: indriyeṇopalabdhaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ sannikarṣapūrvakatvāduparladheḥ manasopalabhate jānīte cakṣuḥsahāyenetyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3124: atra bhāṣyaṃ yacca tadindrayānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tadviśeṣapekṣaṃ vimarśamātraṃ saṃśayaḥ, na parvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3130: yaduparatendriyavyāpārasya saṃśayajñānaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayā hṛdi sthitaṃ śaṅkiturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3134: nanu smaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramasya kāraṇaṃ nendriyamityata āha--tasya hīti
GSP29nystik_u:3135: upapāditametadadhastāt yathā smaraṇaṃ nendriyavyāpāraṃ vyavadhatta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3138: syādetat, mana evendriyānapekṣaṃ bāhye pravartate ityabhyupeyam, anyathā ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti jñānaṃ nirnimittaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3142: yadi ca ghaṭādau bāhye na manaḥ pravartena, kathaṃ ghaṭamiti bhavet?
GSP29nystik_u:3144: na cārthanirupaṇamantareṇa jñānarūpanirūpaṇam, tasmād bāhyābhyantaraviṣayaṃ manaḥ, tathā ca sarva eva saṃśayo mānasa
GSP29nystik_u:3145: ityāśaṅkyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ, sarvatra ca pratyakṣaviṣaye iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3146: yadyapyayamīdṛśo 'nuvyavasāyo mānasastathāpyandhabadhirādīnāmabhāvāt tatpūrvaṃ vyavasāyotpattau cakṣurādyapekṣaṇīyam, anyathā andhabadhirādyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3147: tathā ca saṃśayajñānotpāde apīndriyārthasannikarṣo 'pekṣaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3154: taddhi bāhyendriyalakṣaṇam, āntaraṃ ca mana ityata āha--pṛthak ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3157: nanu naite prameyāḥ svasaṃvedanasiddhatvāt, tat kimatra prameyārthena
GSP29nystik_u:3158: pramāṇena ityata āha---na ca teṣāmiti nanūktaṃ svasaṃvedanatayā na pramākarmabhāva eṣāmityata āha--na cānyā gatiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:3159: saṃvedanatvena hi teṣāṃ svasaṃvedanatā, na caite saṃvedanamiti
GSP29nystik_u:3165: na sukhādi prameyaṃ vā mano vāstvindriyāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3166: na ca tat saṃbhavati, ghrāṇādisūtreṇa vibhāgapareṇa niṣedhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3172: nedaṃ vibhāgaparaṃ ghrāṇādisūtram, api tu lakṣaṇaparam /
GSP29nystik_u:3173: tatra cendriyamapi mano na lakṣitam, vaidharmyādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3177: kāryasya hi viśeṣau bhautikatvābhautikatve, bhūtakāryaṃ bhautikam /
GSP29nystik_u:3182: api ca vaidharmyāt manovat śrotramapi na vaktavyamityāha--śrotre ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3184: bhūtāni hi ghrāṇādīni śrotrāntāni, manastu na bhūtamiti
GSP29nystik_u:3187: darśayiṣyati hi vārttikakāro yathā svārthiko na kaśrcidapi pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3190: tadadena sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:3191: yaccāparaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ghrāṇādibhyo manasa uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa tadapi siṃhāvalokanena dūṣayati---saguṇānāmiti
GSP29nystik_u:3192: ghrāṇādīni yathā svasvaguṇena gandhādinā bāhyaṃ gandhādi bodhayanti ,
GSP29nystik_u:3193: naivaṃ svaguṇena śabdena śrotraṃ bāhyaṃ śabdaṃ bodhayati, tanmanovat śrotramapi ghrāṇādisūtre na paṭhitavyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3195: bhūtatvābhūtatvalakṣaṇaṃ vaidharmyaṃ na bhautikatvābhautikatvagrahaṇena śakyaṃ vaktumityavadhāraṇābhiprāyaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3199: tantryate vyutpādyate anena tattvamiti tantraṃ śāstram /
GSP29nystik_u:3201: etad dūṣitaṃ dignāgena aniṣedhādupāttaṃ cedanyendriyarutaṃ vṛthā /
GSP29nystik_u:3205: sarvasya tantrāntare loke ca siddhatvādavaktavyatāyāṃ svamatamiti nāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:3206: vacanaliṅgaṃ hi matājñānaṃ na cānanumate niṣedhamātraṃ śakyaṃ vaktum,
GSP29nystik_u:3213: indriyārthasannikarṣotvannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti hi pratayakṣalakṣaṇamanavayavena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ śakyameva lakṣayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3214: na khalvayamasāvaśva iti jñānamindriyajaṃ śabdajaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3215: taddhi dravyagocaraṃ vā ucyeta, vācyatvagocaraṃ vā,
GSP29nystik_u:3217: tatra dravyamaindriyakameva na śābdamityaśakyaṃ hi jñānaṃ vyavacchettum,
GSP29nystik_u:3219: vācyatvagocaraṃ tu jñānaṃ śābdam eva, anyathā hyaśrutaśabdo 'pyāraṇyako
GSP29nystik_u:3224: atha na vācyatvaṃ nāma mīmāṃsakānāmiva kiñcidatīndriyam, api tu saṅketamātrametadasmādidaṃ pratyetavyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3226: athāyamapyaindriyaka eva, tatra gurupadiṣṭā gāthā paṭhitavyā,
GSP29nystik_u:3235: savikalpakasyendriyajasyāpratyakṣatvaṃ mā prasāṃkṣīditi tadavarodhārthena vyavasāyātmakapadena saṃśayajñānapratyakṣatvanirākaraṇamanvācitamiti saṃśayetyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:3239: dvipadaparigraheṇa daśa--indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadaṃ dhravaṃ kṛtvā jñānādyekaikapadasaṃbandhena carastraḥ koṭayaḥ, jñānaṃ ca ghavaṃ kṛtvā avyapadeśyādi ekaikapadasaṃbandhena tistraḥ, evamavyapadeśyapadaṃ dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādyekaikapadasaṃbandhena dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3242: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyapadeśyādyekaikapadasaṃbandhe tistraḥ koṭayaḥ, jñānamavyapadeśyamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādipadasaṃbandhena dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3244: avyabhicārivyavasāyātmakapadayostu dhruvayorindriyārthasannikarṣotpanna padena jñānapadena ca pratyekaṃ saṃbandhe koṭidvayam, iti tripadaparigraheṇa daśa koṭayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3246: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyapadeśyamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādyekaikasaṃbandhe dve koṭī, avyapadeśyapadaṃ tyakatvā parakoṭiḥ, jñānapadaṃ tyaktvā cāparā, indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadaṃ tyaktvā tu pañcamī /
GSP29nystik_u:3247: pṛcchati--kasmāt pañcapadaparigraheṇaikatriśattamakoṭiparigraheṇetarāḥ koṭayo vyavacchidyante? na hyatra tadvyavacchedavācakaḥ kaśrcidasti śabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3253: tadevaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ samarthya vāsubandhavaṃ tāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitum upanyasyati--apare punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3255: yattadornityasaṃbandhād yasyārthasya yadvijñānaṃ vyapadiśyate, yadi tata eva tabhdavati nārthāntarād vyapadeśāsaṃbandhinaḥ tat pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3256: ata eva vyapadeśāsaṃbandhino 'rthāntarāt śuktirūpāt rajatena vyapadiśyāmānaṃ śuktijñānaṃ na pratyakṣam, vyapadeśakānutpatteḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3258: etasya pratyakṣābhāsasya vyāvṛttiḥ suprasiddheti tāmupekṣyānumānavyāvṛttim āha--eteneti
GSP29nystik_u:3259: kutaḥ? na hi tata eva vyapadeśakādeva vahneḥ tad vijñānamanumānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:3261: tataśca yatra tu dṛṣṭamātra eva vahnerūparamāduparato dhūmaḥ tatrānyataśrca tabhdavati smaryamāṇād dhūmādasati vyapadeśake vahnau /
GSP29nystik_u:3262: tato 'rthāt ityatra hi arthaviśeṣaṇaṃ tata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3263: tatsaṃgataśrca evakāro 'yogavyavacchede vartate, yathā caitra dhanardhara
GSP29nystik_u:3267: na hi jñānavyapadeśa ātmanā vā indriyeṇa vā saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3271: asati cārthapade kasyedaṃ viśeṣaṇam iti viśeṣaṇasaṃgato naivakāro 'yogaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3275: anyathā abhidhānāparyavasānād yasya tad vyapadiṣyata iti vyapadeśasaṃbandhī viśeṣyaḥ prāpyata eveti sidhyatyeva viśeṣaṇatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3277: anyavyavacchede apihi tadevānyadvyavacchidyeta yadvirodhi, na punaranyamātram /
GSP29nystik_u:3282: tata ityucyamāne yatastataḥ syāt, tathā cānumānādyapi liṅgajñānādestata
GSP29nystik_u:3283: upajāyate iti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeteti tannivṛttyarthamarthāditi vaktavyam
GSP29nystik_u:3289: yadi yasya vyāpadiśyate jñānaṃ, tat pratyakṣaṃ tato ghaṭa ityapi jñānaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3290: pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeta, tadapi hi ghaṭasya vyapadiśyate, na tu tato ghaṭād bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3291: tasya vicārāsahatayā paramārthasattvābhāvena saṃvṛtisato vijñānaṃ prati kāraṇabhāvābhāvāt
GSP29nystik_u:3295: rūpādiparamāṇava eva nirantarotpādāḥ paramārthasanto bhinnāḥ svavijñānasyāvikalpakasya janakāḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3296: teṣāṃ tu nānātvaṃ svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇvatī nirvikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvinī ghaṭa iti vikalpikā buddhiḥ tāneva rūpādīn ekodakāharaṇādikriyākāriṇo bhedina iva darśayantī saṃvṛtirityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3301: yatsaṃvṛtitvena bhavatāmabhimataṃ yaccāvikalpakaṃ tatsarvaṃ svaviṣayād bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3303: mā bhūt saṃvṛtinivṛttyartham, mithyājñānanivṛttyarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti codayati---nanu ca mithyājñānamatasmādapi bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3304: yathā purovarti dravyamidamiti vyapadiśyate rajatamiti na, na tu śuktiriti, tena yadyapi sāmānyarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate jñānam, tataśrca
GSP29nystik_u:3305: tabhdavati, tathāpi yena viśeṣaṇarūpeṇa tasya vayapadiśyate na
GSP29nystik_u:3307: tasmāt tata eva yabhdavati tat pratyakṣam, na caivaṃ mithyājñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3309: pariharati--na hyatasmāt āropitādrūpāt tatrāsataḥ tat mithyajñānaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tu tato bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3310: yasya sāmānyarūpasya vyapadiśyata idamiti tata eva /
GSP29nystik_u:3316: yato bhavati jñānaṃ sa grāhyo 'rthaḥ kāraṇam, grāhakaṃ ca vijñānaṃ kāryam
GSP29nystik_u:3317: tayorayugapabhdāvāt vartamānābhaṃ jñānamatīte mithyeti na pratyakṣaṃ syāt
GSP29nystik_u:3321: kṣaṇikatvād bhāvānāṃ kāraṇasaya nāśaḥ kāryasyotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ, tathāpi kāraṇasya grāhyatā bhinnakālasyāpi, svasadṛśajñānajanakameva tasya tajānaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3324: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3327: na caitāvatā mithyātvam, arthāhitasya nīlākārasya vartamānatvāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3332: anahaṅkārāspadamasātādirūpaṃ vijñānād bhinnaṃ nīlādyanubhūyate, na tu vijñānātmakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3333: tathā ca yadi vicchedagraho mithyā, tathā sati jñānametasmin mithyeti kathaṃ pratyakṣam, samyagjñānabhedasya tathābhāvāt? na cārthā hitākāravedanamarthavedanam, bhāktatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3334: na ca gauṇamukhyalakṣaṇā girāṃ gatayo jñāneṣuśakyā niyojayitum bhinnaprasthānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3335: tasmāt nirākāraṃ jñānamātmano bhinnaṃ gocarayatīti vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3336: sa cet kāraṇaṃ vinaṣṭasya pratyakṣateti tathā ca vartamānābhamavartamānaṃ gocarayati mithyātvamapratyakṣatvaṃ ca syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3337: yaugapadye 'pi nāstyudāharaṇam, sarvasya kṣaṇikatvapakṣanikṣepāditi codayati--tulyamiti cet /
GSP29nystik_u:3342: yadṛcchāśabdeṣu hi nāmnā viśiṣṭo 'rtha ucyate ḍittha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3347: seyaṃ kalpanā yatra jñāne nāstyarthataḥ svarūpato vā tatkalpanayā apoḍhaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3348: tadidamāha--yat kila na nāmnā abhidhīyate arthataḥ svarūpataśrca na jātyādibhirvyapadiśyate
GSP29nystik_u:3361: tadgocaraṃ vā paramārthasad gocarayanti vikalpāḥ śabdāścetyayamabhisandhiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3366: na hi yathā samyagjñānam adhikṛtya pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ kīrtinā tathā dignāgena yenādhikārāt jñāne vyavatiṣṭheta kalpanāpoḍhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3367: nanu yadi svarūpato nābhidhīyetānabhidheyaṃ tarhi vastu prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3368: tathā cāvāstavaḥ syāt śābdo vyavahāra ityata āha--sarvasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3374: viśeṣamākāramabhipretya svarūpato na vyapadeśyamityuktam, na tu sarvatheti
GSP29nystik_u:3378: athāścakarṇādivadavyutpannaḥ kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ pratyakṣasvarūpasya vācaka iti śaṅkate--atheti
GSP29nystik_u:3380: bhavatu kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ avyutpanno mā vā bhūt, avācyaṃ tu pratyakṣameṣitavyam, anyathā vikalpasya pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3384: sā ca mithyāpratyaye 'pi tulyā, vyatyaye 'pi buddhyā boddhasyopasthāpanāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3386: asti ca mithyājñāne 'pi bodhyena saṃbandha indriyāṇām, bodhyaṃ hi purovarti dravyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3387: atha yathā bodhyaṃ tādṛśo nāsti saṃbandha indriyāṇām, rajatatvasya prakārasyāsannidhānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3390: api ca prābhākare darśane anumānādijñānamātmani pratyakṣaṃ na bhavet, na hi tat satsaṃprayogajam
GSP29nystik_u:3396: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //
GSP29nystik_u:3399: atrānumānamiti sidvavat pramāṇāviśeṣarūpalakṣyānuvāda eva nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityaprāmāṇyamanumānasya sudūdaṃ pratikṣipati /
GSP29nystik_u:3400: dṛṣṭaprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyavijñānavyaktisādharmyeṇa hi kāsāṃcid vyaktīnāṃ prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ vā vidadhīta /
GSP29nystik_u:3401: dṛṣṭasādharmyaṃ cānumānam eveti kathaṃ tenaiva tasyāprāmāṇyam? api cānumānamapramāṇamiti vākyaprayogo 'jñaṃ vipratipannaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā
GSP29nystik_u:3403: na ca parapuruṣavartino dehadharmā api sandehājñānaviparyāsā gauratvādivat pratyakṣamīkṣante
GSP29nystik_u:3404: na ca tadvavacanāt prattīyante, vacanasyāpi pratyakṣādanyasyāprāmāṇyopagamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3405: puruṣaviśeṣamanadhikṛtya tu vacanamanarthaṅkaṃ prayu/jāno nāyaṃ laukiko na
GSP29nystik_u:3419: anumānādipūrvakaṃ cānumānaṃ na pratyakṣapūrvakamiti nānumānaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:3423: tatra prathame vigrahe tānītyanantaraṃ sūtram uvallaṅghya vibhāgasūtragatāḥ pratyakṣādayaḥ saṃbandhanīyāḥ yogyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3429: pāramparyeṇa hi pratyakṣapūrvakatvamuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā, tasmānna virodha iti
GSP29nystik_u:3431: te iti vigrahe anantarasūtragatameva pratyakṣapadaṃ saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3432: yathā ca dve pratyakṣe pūrve yasya pratyakṣasya liṅgaparāmarśajñānasya pratyakṣaphalasya /
GSP29nystik_u:3433: tadidaṃ tatpūrvakaṃ pratyakṣam, taddhi svaviṣaye pratyakṣamapyanumeyārthapratyayaṃ kurvadanumānam
GSP29nystik_u:3438: atha tadarthaviṣaye dvitīye pratyakṣe sati yā tatpadaviṣayā smṛtirutpadyate sāpi pratyakṣadvayapūrvā
GSP29nystik_u:3439: evaṃ liṅgalliṅgsiṃbandhasmṛtirapi pratyakṣadvayapūrveti tadavasthaivātivyāptirityāśayavān pṛcchati--- katare dve iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3444: vyāptisaṃskārobdodha samayajanmanā svajanitena saṃskāreṇāsya vyāptismaraṇasamaye vināśāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3445: vinaśyadavasthasya dvitīyaliṅgadarśanasya vyāptismaraṇena saha yaugapadye 'pi tayoḥ parasparavārtānabhijñatayā mitho ghaṭanāyogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3448: tasmād ubhābhyāmutpannaṃ parāmarśajñānamindriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratyakṣam eṣitavyam
GSP29nystik_u:3451: liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhadarśanamādyaṃ pratyakṣam ityatra saṃbandhapadenānumānāṅga saṃbandhaṃ vivakṣan paroktān saṃbandhavikalpān anumānānaṅgabhūtān pratikṣipati---pratyakṣamiti ca tasya pramāṇamāha tathā hi kecidavinābhāvaṃ tādātmyatadutpattinibandhanamanumānāṅgamāhuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3453: tatra yo buddhau sākṣādātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ niveśayati sa pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3454: sa hi svaviṣayāyā buddheḥ janaka iti tamantareṇa buddhirātmānamanāsādayantī tasya sattā niścāyayatīti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3459: sa hi pratibaddhasvabhāvo yathāvidhaḥ siddhaḥ tathāvidhasannidhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3460: sa ca pratibandho na darśanādarśanamātrādavaseyaḥ, tathā sati sa śyāmo maitanayatvāt paridṛśyamānamaitratanayastomavadityapyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3463: yathāha kāryakāraṇabhāvād vā svabhāvād vā niyāmakāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3465: tathā ca liṅgavikalpaṃ vinā na liṅgivikalpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3468: na cāvinābhūtaṃ liṅgaṃ vinā liṅginamiti liṅgisvalakṣaṇāpratibhāsyapi pāramparyeṇa tatpratibandhāt tatrāvisaṃvādako 'numānavikalpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3470: asmin sati bhavati satsvapi tadanyeṣvasminnasati na bhavati evamākāro nānvayavyatirekābhyāmatiricyate
GSP29nystik_u:3472: tathā hi satyagnau dhūma iti pratyakṣameva vikalpānugatavyāpāramadhyavasyati /
GSP29nystik_u:3473: asati cāgnau na dhūma ityapi pratyakṣameva, na hyagnidhūmānupalambhāvānyau /
GSP29nystik_u:3476: evaṃ tādātmyamapi viparyaye bādhakapramāṇopapattyā niścetavyam, yathā sattvasya kṣaṇikatayā saha tādātmyaṃ vipakṣai'kṣaṇike
GSP29nystik_u:3480: satyaṃ yat kiñcit kvacid dṛṣṭam, tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tadvidastasya tadgamakaṃ tatretyanujānīmaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3481: sa eva tu pratibandho na tāvat tadutpattyā saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3482: kā punariyaṃ tadutpattirdhūmasya? kiṃ vahnyanantaraṃ bhāvaḥ? sa tādṛśo 'sti rāsabhasyāpīti tatpratibaddho 'pi dhūmaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3483: atha tadanantarameva bhāvaḥ, na ca rāsabhānantaraṃ bhavannapi tadanantarameva bhavati, tasmin satyapyasatyagnau tadabhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3484: asatyapi tasmin sati ādrendhanavati vahnau tadbhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3485: atha yadyapi dhūmasya vahnibhāvābhāvānuvidhānaṃ tatropalabdhaṃ tathāpi deśāntarādiṣu tadbhāvo 'sya kutastyaḥ? tathā hi bhūyo bhūyo rāsabhe dṛṣṭe
GSP29nystik_u:3488: tajjātīyasyaiva dhūmasya rāsabhaṃ vinā sati vahnau bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3489: evaṃ satyapyagnau piśācena janito dhūmaḥ kvacit deśādau tajjātīya eva rāsabhavad vahnyabhāve 'pi piśācādeva bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP29nystik_u:3491: na ca sati bhāvamātraṃ niyāmakam, tasya rāsabhādiṣvaṣyaviśeṣāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3495: yo yo dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ sa sarvastāvadārdrendhanasahitavahnyanantarameva na piśācānantaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3496: sa ca kādācitkatayā nimittamapekṣamāṇo yadanantarameva gamyate tadevāpratītavyabhicāraṃ nimittīkaroti, na tu pratīvyabhicāraṃ rāsabhādi /
GSP29nystik_u:3498: yadi na tannimittaṃ kasmāt vināpi vahni kvacid dhūmo nopalabhyate? athāsau sarvathā vahnisahitaḥ, tathā satyādrendhanavat kathaṃ vahnirapi na kāraṇam? kāraṇaṃ cet kathaṃ tadantareṇa dhūmabhāvaśaṅkā? akāraṇasya hi kāryasya nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt, anapekṣatvāt, na kādācitkatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3500: vahnyanantarameva bhāva iti hi dhūmasya vahnikāryatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3501: sa cet avahnerapyanantaraṃ naivakārārthaḥ syāditi na vahneḥ kāryam /
GSP29nystik_u:3503: na hi anyānantarameva bhavati, vahnerapyanantaraṃ bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3507: tadeva tu tadanantarameva bhāva ityevaṃrūpaṃ nāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:3508: yadyapi ca vinā vahni nopalabdho dhūmo yadyapi ca piśācānantaraṃ nopalabhyate teṣāmanupalabdheḥ, tathāpi piśācakārya eva dhūmasyatra tatra vahniḥ kutaścit svahetorūpanipatito rāsabha iva na tu dhūmasya janamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3509: tena tadabhāve 'pi tajjātīya eva kāraṇabhedajanmā kadācit kādācitko dhūmaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3511: na dṛṣṭasaṃbhave nādṛṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktamiti śakyaṃ bhavadbhirvaktum,
GSP29nystik_u:3515: na ca yad yadanyasahitānantaram mupalabdhaṃ tat tadanyarahitāt tasmād bhavad bhinnajātīyaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3516: uktaṃ hi rāsabhasahitād vahneryādṛśo dhūmaḥ tādṛśa eva tadvirahitād vahneriti /
GSP29nystik_u:3517: tasmādevaṃvidhā śaṅkāpiśācī svanivārakaṃ tadutpattiniścayamāskandantī na śakyā nivārayitum
GSP29nystik_u:3518: api cāstu tadutpattiniścayaḥ, tathāpi kasmāt kāraṇamantareṇa na kāryaṃ bhavati? tathā ca satyanapekṣatayā kādācitkatvavihatiriti cet---yathāha,
GSP29nystik_u:3522: astu tarhi saṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikatayā anyānapekṣo 'vyabhicārī gamakāṅgam /
GSP29nystik_u:3523: sa ca yo vā sa vā bhavatu, kṛtaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇāyāsena /
GSP29nystik_u:3525: api ca kāryāt kāraṇamanumīyamānaṃ tataḥ pūrvamevānumīyeta, na tu vartamānakālam /
GSP29nystik_u:3526: na hi hetusattā kāryakālā kāryotpādāṅgam, api tu tatpūrvakālā /
GSP29nystik_u:3527: na hi nadīpūrabhedaḥ svasattāsamayavarti varṣaṃ gamayatyapi tu tatpūrvakālam /
GSP29nystik_u:3529: ata eva sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena tatkālavartina varṣe sandihānā na tadarthinaḥ pravartante
GSP29nystik_u:3530: evaṃ dhūmādapyagniḥ tatpūrvakāla evānumīyeta, na tu vartamānakālaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3531: tathā ca sati na tadarthinaḥ tatra niḥśaṅkaṃ pravarteran /
GSP29nystik_u:3533: na cānayorasti kā kāraṇabhāvaḥ tādātmyaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:3534: yadyucyeta tatpūrvebhyo rūparasagandhasparśakṣaṇebhyo rasakṣaṇo jāyate, sa svakāraṇaṃ pūrvarūpakṣaṇamanumāpayan yādṛśā tena janitaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3536: sa cānumāpakarasakṣaṇasamānakālarūpakṣaṇāntarajanaka eva svakāraṇam iti tādṛśameva gamayati
GSP29nystik_u:3544: yo 'yu gamakarasasamānakālo rūpakṣaṇaḥ, sa kiṃ tajjanakasya rūpakṣaṇasya svabhāva ata tatsvabhāvāvacchedako 'svabhāvabhūtaḥ? na tāvat svabhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3547: nanu naitāvatāpyasya tulyakālasya rūpasya kāraṇabhāva iti kathaṃ kāryaṃ hetorgamyeta? viśiṣṭena kāraṇasvabhāvenāsvabhāvo 'pi asāvākṣipyate viśeṣaṇatayeti cet? nanvākṣipyate jñāpyata ityanarthāntaram sa kiṃ kāraṇānumiteḥ prāgathānumitisamaye paścād vā? na tāvat prāk na hi sattāmātreṇa kāraṇaṃ tad gamayatyatiprasaṅgāt, kiṃ tu svajñānena /
GSP29nystik_u:3551: tathā ca rasāt kāryāt tatkāraṇaṃ rūpamanumātavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3552: tathā ca kāraṇāt kāryānumānaṃ tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanyata iti nābhyāmeva pratibandhasiddhiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3553: laukikānāṃ cedaṃ rasād rūpānumānam, na caite piśitacakṣuṣaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3556: na ca lakṣaṇānurodhena lakṣyasyānyathākaraṇaṃ yuktaṃ parīkṣakāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:3562: api cādyatanasya saviturūdayasya hyastanena saviturūdayena, candrodayasya ca samānakālasya samudravṛddhyā, madhyanakṣatradṛṣṭyā
GSP29nystik_u:3563: cāṣṭamāstamayodayasya, na kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tādātmyaṃ vā, atha ca dṛṣṭo
GSP29nystik_u:3565: api ca tādātmye 'pi kathaṃ gamyagamakabhāvaḥ? na hi tadeva karma ca kartṛ
GSP29nystik_u:3568: yadyapi ca vṛkṣatvaśiṃśapātve paramārthato na bhinne tathāpi bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepābhyāṃ kalpitabhedayorgamyagamakabhāva iti
GSP29nystik_u:3570: api ca kālpanikamapi rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ na yathā bhinnamevamabhinnamapi na
GSP29nystik_u:3576: kalpanābhedavirahiṇāṃ bhedamullikhantyapi parasparameṣāmabhedamapyavagāhate sāmānādhikaraṇyākāratvāt, abhedānullekhe tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3579: uktaṃ hi yathā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na bhāvānāmabhedasādhakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3580: jātyādiśabdā hi jātyādīn nimittīkṛtya dravye vartante /
GSP29nystik_u:3581: taccādhikaraṇamekamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam aśnuvate, na punarjātyādīnapi mitho miśrayanti
GSP29nystik_u:3583: tasmād yatra gamyagamakabhāvo na tatra tādātmyam, yatra tādātmyaṃ na tatra gamyagamakabhāva iti saddhim /
GSP29nystik_u:3584: yattu viditaśiṃśapāvyavahāramaviditavṛkṣavyavahāramuccāyāṃ hi śiṃśapāyāṃ vṛkṣaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ, tasmāduccatvameva vṛkṣaśabdapravṛttinimittamiti manyamānaṃ mūḍhaṃ prati śiṃśapātvena vṛkṣavyavahāramātraṃ sādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3585: vāmanāyāmapi śiśapāyāṃ vṛkṣa iti vyavahartavyam, śiṃśapāmātrānubandhitvād vṛkṣatvasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:3586: tatrāpi ced vyavahāraḥ sādhyaḥ sa śiṃśapāyā bhinna iti, na tādātmyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3587: vyavahārayogyatā cet? sā śiṃśapāyā abhinneti na gamyagamakabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3590: yaśca vaiṣeśikaiḥ catuṣprakāraḥ saṃbandha ucyate, asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3591: saṃbandhyekāryasamavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam vai. sū. 9/2/1 //
GSP29nystik_u:3592: iti, atrāpi saṃbandhipadenaiva sarvāpasaṃgrahāt śeṣābhighānaṃ vyartham /
GSP29nystik_u:3594: tathā sati śeṣapadānyeva santu kṛtaṃ saṃbandhipadena, tebhya eva saṃbandhibhedānāmadhigateḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3598: api ca bhūtaṃ varṣam abhūtasya vāyvabhrasaṃyogasya kathaṃ virodhi? taddhi tadanukūlameva evam abhūtam varṣaṃ bhūtasya vāyyabhrasaṃyogasyāpratikūlam
GSP29nystik_u:3599: evaṃ bhūto nakulajayo na bhūtasya sarpaparājayasya virodhī /
GSP29nystik_u:3601: yeṣāṃ punarvirodhaḥ, teṣāmanyatamadanyatamasya na liṅgamapi tu pratikṣepakameva //
GSP29nystik_u:3606: tasmād yo vā sa vāstu saṃbandhaḥ kevalaṃ yasyāsau svābhāviko niyataḥ, sa eva gamako gamyaścetaraḥ saṃbandhīti yujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3607: tathā hi dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ, na tu vahnyadīnāṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3612: tasmādvahnyādīnāmādrendhānādyupādhikṛtaḥ saṃbandho na svābhāvikaḥ, tato na niyataḥ svābhāvikastu dhūmādīnā vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3614: kvacid vyabhicārasyādarśanāt māno 'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhovana sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatva pratibadhnātīti sāṃpratam //
GSP29nystik_u:3616: iti dattāvakāśā khalviyaṃ laukikapramāṇāmaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāśicī labdhrapasarā na kvacit nāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta /
GSP29nystik_u:3625: tasmādupādhi prayatnenānviṣyanto 'nupalabhyamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:3627: anyenānyasya sahakāreṇa cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet, sarvaṃ sarveṇa svabhāvataḥ saṃbadhyeta
GSP29nystik_u:3629: athānyasya cedanyat kāryam, kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasya na bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:3634: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva
GSP29nystik_u:3636: kaḥ punaḥ pramāṇena svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate? pratyakṣasaṃbandhiṣu
GSP29nystik_u:3638: yadā tāvat prathamaṃ vahnidhūmayoḥ sahādrendhanayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ paśyati tadā dvayorapi kiṃ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha aupādhiko vā? atha dhūmasyaupādhiko vahneḥ svābhāvikaḥ, vahnervaupādhiko dhūmasya tu
GSP29nystik_u:3640: tatra vahneranārdrendhanasya vinādhūmamayogolakādau darśanād ādrendhanopādhirasya dhūmena saṃbandho, na tu svabhāvika iti niścīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3641: dhūmaviśeṣasya tu vinā vahnimanupalabhbhād upādhibhedasya cādṛśyamānasya kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvād viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣasya ca saṃśayasyānupalabdhapūrve anutpādāt, utpāde vā atiprasaṅgāt prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyucchedāt svābhāvikaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3643: tadidamavadhāraṇaṃ na mānasam, anapekṣasya manaso bāhye
GSP29nystik_u:3645: bhūyodarśanasāpekṣasya ca pravṛttau pramāṇāntarāpātāt, na hi mano nimittam ityeva mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3646: tathā sati na kiñcinmānasam, pratyayamātrasya manonimittatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3647: tattadasādhāraṇakāraṇāpekṣayo tu tatpramāṇavyapadeśe atrāpi bhūyodarśanam asādhāraṇamiti pramāṇāntaraṃ jātam /
GSP29nystik_u:3649: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandhiṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇamunnetavyāni /
GSP29nystik_u:3650: svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetavaḥ svasādhyena yadi sādhyamantareṇa
GSP29nystik_u:3654: annapānapariṇatibhedasyopādheḥ śyāmatāyā maitratanayasaṃbandhaṃ prati vidyamānatvena maitratanayatvasyāgamakatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:3655: etena pakvānyasya vṛkṣasyāgravartīni phalāni etadvṛkṣaprabhavatvāt patitaphalavadityādayo 'pyaupādhikasaṃbandhā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3660: yadyapi svarūpato liṅgadarśane atīte, tathāpi tajjanitā smṛtiḥ anugṛhṇāti yasmādatastābhyāmanugṛhyate
GSP29nystik_u:3662: saṃbandhasamṛtisahakāriṇā indriyeṇa svasādhyāvinābhūtaliṅgavijñānaṃ yadupajanyate tat parāmarśa ityākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3663: tathābhūtaliṅgagocara eva caturtho vākyāvayava upanaya ityākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3668: sa ca liṅgaviṣayaḥ kriyā ca liṅgiviṣayeti viṣayavaiṣamyāt na kriyākaraṇabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3674: vṛkṣoddeśena pravartitaḥ paraśuḥ kartrā na tadavayavoddeśena, tasmād vṛkṣaviṣayaḥ paraśurna tadavayavaviṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3675: dvaidhībhāvaścāvayaveṣu na vṛkṣe, tasya tato vināśāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3680: na kevalaṃ samānaviṣayatvāniyamaḥ kartuḥ karaṇaṃ bhinnamityapi niyamo
GSP29nystik_u:3682: sthitiḥ sāvayaveṣu samavāyo vā pradeśaviśeṣe saṃyogo vā /
GSP29nystik_u:3685: yadā agniviṣayameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatrāha---kvacit punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3692: yadi anyaviṣayaṃ karaṇamanyaviṣayā kriyā bhavet tataśchedane khadiraṃ prāpte panasādāvapi cchidā syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3693: yadyapi vṛkṣoddeśena kartrā paraśuḥ prayuktastathāpyayaṃ vṛkṣamiva tadavayavānapi prāpta iti tadviṣayo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3694: tena tadavayavadvaidhībhāvamukhena vṛkṣaviṣayāmapi dvaidhībhāvakriyāṃ janayatīti na vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ karaṇaphalayoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3695: evaṃ yadyapi liṅgaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaphalatayā liṅgajñānam, tadanubaddhasya tasya mānasapratyakṣagocaratvāt, liṅganirūpaṇamantareṇa tadanirūpaṇāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3696: na tu liṅgajñānaṃ liṅginaṃ vinā na nirūpyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3697: tasmāt pratipattayanubandhitayā viṣayo na liṅgajñānasya liṅgī, kiṃ tu liṅgameva /
GSP29nystik_u:3700: tasmād dvividho viṣayabhāvaḥ pratipattyanubandhitayā, pratipādyatayā ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3701: tatra pūrvaḥ phalasya, uttarastu prāmāṇyasyeti vivekaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3703: sthitau tu bhedo darśayiṣyate kartuḥ karaṇasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3704: tadevaṃ tāni te iti vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādya tāni taditi vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādayati---yadā punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3705: liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhadarśanaṃ ca anantaraliṅgadarśanaṃ ca tatsmṛtiśceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3708: nanu yadi pramāṇaphalayorekaviṣayatvaṃ tarhi parāmarśajñānaviṣayīkṛta evārtho viṣayīkartavyo nānyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3709: sa ca pratyakṣapramāṇaviṣaya eveti kṛtamanumānenetyāśayavān pṛcchati---kiṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3713: pratyakṣapramitāt liṅgādanyo liṅgī tadviṣayatvaṃ ca liṅgaparāmarśasyoktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3715: yuktaṃ, tasyaiva liṅgadarśanadvayasmṛtipūrvakatvāt, na tvanumitiranumānaṃ pramāṇavyāpāratvenātannimittatvāt karaṇakārakādanyatvād atatpūrvakatvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3718: na dravyādīnāmeva kārakatvam, api tu vyāpārasyāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:3721: saṃbhavati hi tasyāpi siddhasya phalabhāvanāyāṃ nimittatvam /
