GSP29nystik_u:3723: etasmiśca kalpe tatpūrvakamityatra tadā hānādisaṃbandhāvadhāraṇasamaye prathamaṃ vahnitvasya liṅgasya darśanam, athānumānikaṃ dvitīyam, atha saṃbandhasya smṛtiriti trayamekīkṛtya parāmarṣṭavyam tatpūrvako hi tathā cāyamanumīyamāno vahniriti liṅgaparāmarśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3730: satsvapītareṣu smṛterabhāvādanumiteranutpādanena smṛtireva anumānam, itare tu tadanugrāhakā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3732: satsvapītareṣu liṅgaparāmarśaṃ vinā anumityanutpādāt, liṅgaparāmarśa evānumānamitarairanugṛhīta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3734: anvayavyatirekābhyāmaśakyo guṇapradhānabhāvo vivektum, tayoḥ sarvatra tulyatvāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3735: tat kimidānīṃ nāstyeva guṇapradhānabhāva ityata āha---pradhāneti /
GSP29nystik_u:3736: nānvayavyatirekāvatra prabhavato na tu nyāyāntaramiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3741: nanu bhavatu pratyakṣadvayapūrvakaḥ saṃskāro 'numānam, tenāpi śeṣo 'rtho
GSP29nystik_u:3744: viśiṣṭajñānaṃ vijñānam viśaṣaśca smṛteranyatvam, na hīndriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3746: tena ca jñānena svakāraṇaṃ viśeṣitam, pratyakṣasūtre yata ityadhyāhārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3748: na ca saṃskāraḥ pratyakṣapūrvo 'pi tādṛśajñānakāraṇamiti na tasya prasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3760: anvayimātrāt vyatirekimātrācca vyāvṛtto 'nvayavyatirekī darśanīya iti hetutrayasādhāraṇe abādhitaviṣayatvātsatpratipakṣatve satī api heturūpe na
GSP29nystik_u:3770: tathā cāyaṃ nityebhya ākāśādibhyo ghaṭādiṣu cānityeṣvanvita iti bhavatyanvayavyatirekī /
GSP29nystik_u:3774: tena hetoryato vipakṣānnivṛttiḥ sa eva nāstīti kuto nivartatām,
GSP29nystik_u:3775: pakṣādanyasya sarvasyaiva sapakṣatvāt? na nivartata iti cet? astu tarhi hetostatra vṛttiḥ, nivṛttiniṣedharūpatvād vṛtteriti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:3776: yasyābhāvādhikaraṇatvamapi na saṃbhavati nirūpākhyasya tasya bhāvādhikaraṇatvaśaṅketi subhāṣitam
GSP29nystik_u:3777: na khalu mumurṣosatoyābhyavahāre 'pyasamarthasya śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate cetanaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3778: tat kimidānīṃ bhāvābhāvau na parasparābhāvātmānau yadekaniṣedhenānyavidhiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3779: syāt? satyam, yatraikatara etayorniṣidhyate vidhīyate vā tatra taditaravidharniṣedho vāvaśyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:3782: nanu nirūpākhyo niṣedhādhikaraṇamiti ca vacaḥ svacaritaviruddham /
GSP29nystik_u:3783: na caitat tattvato nirūpākhye hetorvyatirekaṃ vā hetuṃ vā vyāsedhāmo nāpyanvayaṃ vidadhmaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3786: kastarhi na nirūpākhye hetorvyatireka ityasyavacanasyārthaḥ? atha nirūpākhye hetorvyatireka ityasya bhavadbhāṣitasya ko 'rthaḥ? ahṛdayavācāṃ khalayahṛdayā eva prativāco bhavanti bhavanti yakṣānurūpo baliriti hi laukikānām ābhāṇakaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3790: svābhāvikarūpasaṃpannaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ tattvajñānarūphalāya kalpate na
GSP29nystik_u:3793: tasmādanupākhye vipakṣe hetorvyatirekanivṛttau vā vyatireke vā hetupravṛttau vā sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataivocitā /
GSP29nystik_u:3796: mā bhūdasādhāraṇasyāpi gamakatvam, kiṃ tu svasādhyena saha svābhāvikasaṃbandhaśālitayā /
GSP29nystik_u:3798: vipakṣasaṃbhave tu tatrāpi hetuvṛttiśaṅkānirākaraṇāya vyatirekagrahaṇam upāsanīyamiti sarvamavadātam
GSP29nystik_u:3801: paramāṇvākāśādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvāt ghaṭavadityādayo draṣṭavyāḥ, viśvasyaiva sadasatprabhedabhinnasya yathāsvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3804: tamimaṃ vyatirekiṇaṃ hetvavayavalakṣaṇavyākhyānāvasare vārttikakṛd upapādayiṣyatīti nehopapāditaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3805: tadevaṃ trividhamityavacchidya vyutpādya saṃprati pūrvavadityādinā ekavākyatayā vyācaṣṭa---atha vā trividhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3806: tisṛṣvapi vidhāsu sādhyavacanasya pūrvamapapādanāt pūrvaṃ sādhyaṃ tad yasyāstyadhikaraṇatayā tatpūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:3807: tathāpyanityāḥ paramāṇavo gandhavattvād ghaṭavadityapi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3808: asti hi sādhyaṃ tasyāpi, pārthivānāmapyaṇūnāmanityatvena siṣādhayiṣitatvādityata āha---vyāptyeti
GSP29nystik_u:3809: asti gandhavattvasya sādhyaṃ na tu vyāptyā, pṛthivīmātravṛttitatayā caturṣu paramāṇuṣu tadabhāvāt
GSP29nystik_u:3810: sādhyasyopayuktatvāt tato 'nyastajjātīyaḥ śeṣaḥ, sādhyasāmānyena samāna iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:3814: tathā ca bādhitaviṣayaṃ prakaraṇasamaṃ cānumānaṃ syādityata
GSP29nystik_u:3818: nanvevaṃ trividho 'pi hetuḥ pañcalakṣaṇaḥ syādityata āha---evamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3819: etaduktaṃ bhavati abādhitaviṣayamasatpratipakṣaṃ pūrvavaditi ca dhruvaṃ kṛtvā śeṣavadityekā vidhā, sāmānyatodṛṣṭamiti dvitīyā,
GSP29nystik_u:3824: tadevaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakṛnmatena vyācaṣṭa---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:3827: tad yasyāsti viṣayatayā parāmarśajñānasyānumānasya tat pūrvavadityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3835: kiṃ tarhi abhyupeyate ityata āha--kāryaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:3842: yadyapi kāraṇamātraṃ vyabhicārati kāryotpādam, tathāpi yādṛśaṃ na
GSP29nystik_u:3844: anyathā dhūmamātramapi vahnisattāṃ vyabhicaratīti na dhūmaviśeṣo gamako bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:3846: api cāntyatantusaṃyogānantaraṃ paṭo jāyate tatrāpi śakyaṃ kāraṇāt kāryānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3847: yadā khalvayamanyata evodbuddhasaṃskāro vyāptismṛtimān aviraleṣvitareṣu tantuṣu antyatantāvutpannāyāṃ kriyāyāmindriyasannikarṣāt prathamameva parāmṛśati tathā ceyamiti, tadaiva kriyāto vibhāga ityekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3848: atha yadā vibhāgāt pūrvasaṃyogavināśaḥ, tadā parāmarśāt tasmādavaśyaṃbhāvipaṭaviśiṣṭeyaṃ kriyetyanumānotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3849: athāntyasya tantostantusaṃyogaḥ, atha paṭotpādaḥ, tatra rūpādyutpādaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3850: atha pratyakṣadarśanam ityanumānotpādasya parastāccaturthe kṣaṇe pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3851: yadi tu kriyotpādānantaramālocanamiṣyate, tathāpi tṛtīye kṣaṇe
GSP29nystik_u:3853: api ca badhiro murajamukhamabhihatya svapāṇinābhighātādeva śabdakāraṇāt tatkāryaṃ śabdaṃ niḥśaṅkamanumimīte
GSP29nystik_u:3859: na tu vṛṣṭiranumīyamānā pūraviśeṣāt nātītā śakyānumātum, anumānasamaye tadatyayasyāśakyaniścayatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:3864: kāraṇasya hi kāryāt pūrvakālatā śakyā niścetum kāryeṇa liṅgena /
GSP29nystik_u:3867: sa ca kāryasya purastāt tato niścayavyāpta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:3870: atrāpi kāryeṇa saviturdeśāntaraprāptyā tatkāraṇasya vrajyāyā anumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3875: sādhyadharmāvinābhāvinā viśeṣaṇena sādhanadharmeṇa viśiṣyamāṇo dharmo gamyate gamakatvena
GSP29nystik_u:3876: hetuviśiṣṭo hi dharmo gamakaḥ, jijñāsitadharmaviśiṣṭaśca gamyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3878: sa eva cobhayātmāṣa gamyo gamaka iṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3883: sāmānyenāvinābhāvinā hetunā avacchinnaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dharmirūpamanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanumānam
GSP29nystik_u:3885: tadetat pūrvavaccheṣavatorapi prāpakamapi tatpadasannidhānāt gobalīvardanyāyena te parityajyānyatra niviśate /
GSP29nystik_u:3893: deśāntaraprāptimānādityaḥ dravyatve sati kṣayavṛddhipratyayāviṣayatve ca prāṅmukhopalabhyatve ca tadabhimukhadeśasaṃbandhād anutpannapādavihārasya parivṛtya tatpratyayaviṣayatvāt maṇyādivat, tatpratyayaviṣayatvād ityucyamāne puraḥsthitena sthāṇunā vyabhicāraḥ, so 'pi hi pratyabhijñāviṣayo bhavati tatraiva sthitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3898: tathāpi pṛṣṭhato 'vasthitayā sthūṇayā vyabhicāraḥ, tannivṛttyarthaṃ prāṅmukhopalabhyatve satīti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:3900: sā cehātītā vivakṣitā, anyathā pūrvāparajaladhivelāvagāhinā tuhinaśailena
GSP29nystik_u:3904: mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ tvastācalacūḍāvalambi na prācyāṃ kasyacidupalambhagocara iti vaiṣamyam, tathāpi yadi draṣṭaiva puro 'vasthitasya
GSP29nystik_u:3910: tamuddiśya khalvayaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃcaramāṇaḥ prāsādasya pṛṣṭato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3919: anyathāsiddhatayā aṅgulyā nirdeśasya dikpratyakṣatvena na svābhāvikaḥ pratibandha ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3921: apratyakṣāyāṃ diśi digdeśasaṃbandhiṣvityetadeva kuta ityata āha---ādityeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:3923: tat punaridaṃ pratyakṣam ā codayāt ā cāstamayād deśāntaraṃ sañcaraṇaṃ mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasya anākalitadravyatve satītyādidaṇḍakānumānānāmindriyavyāpārāntaramupajāyamānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3924: tatra mā bhūvannākāśadigādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ, tathāpi parito viniṣpatadativiśadamayukhajālamadhyavartino helimaṇḍalasya ta eva mayukhabhāgabhedāḥ pratyakṣadeśā iti teṣāṃ pratyakṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa savitṛmaṇḍalena saṃyogavibhāgāḥ pratyakṣā bhaviṣyantīti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3925: idaṃ tvatisphuṭatayā nābhidhāya śiṣyavyutpādanāyākṣuṇṇaṃ mārgāntaraṃ darśitamiti mantavyam
GSP29nystik_u:3926: tadevaṃ rūpeṇa sparśānumānam, śiṃśapātvena śrutena vṛkṣatvānu mānamityādi sāmānyatodṛṣṭena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:3929: pakṣaikadeśe sadapi siddham, pakṣavyāpakaṃ tu prakarṣeṇa siddhamityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3930: yadyapi avinābhāvaḥ pañcasu caturṣu vā rūpeṣu liṅgasya samāpyate ityavinābhāvenaiva sarvāṇiliṅgarūpāṇi saṃgṛhyante, tathāpīha prasiddhasacchabdābhyāṃ dvayoḥ saṃgrahe gobalīvardanyāyena tat parityajya vipakṣavyatirekāsatpratipakṣatvābādhitaviṣayatvāni saṃgṛhṇāti /
GSP29nystik_u:3931: atrāpi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ caturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ vā rūpāṇāṃ liṅgeṣu saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3944: tatra sapakṣe sadeva, yathā paramāṇvādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvād ghaṭādivaditi
GSP29nystik_u:3945: tathā sapakṣe sadasad yathā tatraiva sādhye sattvād ghaṭādivaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:3955: tasyārthaḥ, pūrveṇa tulyaṃ vartate iti pūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:3958: pūrvamanyataradarśanena sahānyataradarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi, yathāpūrvaṃ pratyakṣabhūtayoriti pramāṇamātropalakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:3959: evaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi anyataradharmadarśanena sādhanadharmadarśanenānyatarasya sādhyadharmasyānumānamanumiti darśanamiti bhavati kriyātulyatā /
GSP29nystik_u:3961: atra dignāgena dhūmādagnirūpadharmāntarānumānam agnideśayoḥ saṃbandhānumānaṃ ca dūṣayitvā agniviśiṣṭadeśānumānaṃ samarthitam /
GSP29nystik_u:3965: liṅga dharme prasiddhaṃ cet kimanyat tena mīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3967: saṃbandhe 'pi dvayaṃ nāsti ṣaṣṭhī śrūyeta tadvati /
GSP29nystik_u:3969: na hi saṃbandhadharmatayā liṅgaṃ pratīyate, api tu deśasaṃgatamityarthaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3973: tatra dignāgadūṣitān kalpān anyāṃśca vikalpān dignāgasamarthitaṃ ca kalpamupanyasya dūṣayati---anye punariti dharmadharmibhāvānupapatteriti /
GSP29nystik_u:3974: dharmeṇa hi dharmipratipattavyaḥ, anyathā atiprasakteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3978: yaḥ kaścid vā deśo 'gnimān sādhyo, dhūmavān vā deśabhedaḥ? tatra pūrvasvin kalpe nirākaraṇamāha---ataddharmāditi
GSP29nystik_u:3979: yaḥ kaścidagnimattayā deśaḥ sādhyate na tasyāvaśyaṃ dhūmo dharma ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3984: na hyayamevaṃvādī dignāgo dhūmādhāraṃ deśaviśeṣaṃ paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:3985: na hyasya mate parvato nāma kaścidavayavī yadādhāro dhūma upalabhyeta, kiṃ tu paramāṇavaḥ paramasūkṣmā atīndriyāḥ parvataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3988: yeṣāmapi deśabhedo 'vayavī darśanārhaḥ, teṣāmapi viyadvartinīṃ dhūmalekhāmabhraṃlihāmupalabhyānupalabdhadeśānāṃ nānumānasaṃbhava iti
GSP29nystik_u:3996: dhūmena hi vahniranumīyate, na ca kāryasattā nimittakāraṇasattāyā vyāptā /
GSP29nystik_u:3997: na hi yadā yatra vā paṭaḥ, tadā tatra vā kuvindaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3998: nāpyasamavāyikāraṇasattayā, na hi yadā yadā saṃyogastadā karma /
GSP29nystik_u:4002: ekārthasamavāya iti hi dvedhā, ekasyārthasya samavāyaḥ, ekasmin vārthe samavāya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4004: yadi hi vahnimābhyāmeko 'rthaḥ kaścit ārabhyeta tato 'sau tayoḥ samaveyāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4007: tat kimasaṃbaddhāveva vahnidhūmau, tathā ca pratītivirodha
GSP29nystik_u:4019: na hi bauddharāddhānte dravyaṃ nāma kiñcidasti yatra rūpasparśai samavetau, kiṃ tvekasāmagryadhīnatayā niyatasāhacaryau, tathā vahnidhūmāvapi ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4026: yatra tāvat parvatanitambavartinī dhūmalekhā santatamudgacchantī dṛśyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4027: tatrāsau deśa eva tadviśiṣṭo 'numīyate iti lokaprasiddhameveti kimatra
GSP29nystik_u:4029: yatra tu bhūyiṣṭhatāyā tasya dhūmasya dūratvena deśo na dṛśyate, dhūma eva tvamraṃliho limpanniva abhramaṇḍalamavalokyate, tatra deśānumānaprayāsālasatayā dṛśyamāno dhūmaviśeṣa evāgnimattayā sādhyate
GSP29nystik_u:4032: tena dhūmamātrād vahnivyabhicāriṇo vahnyavinābhāvī dhūmo viśeṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4035: dravyatvakarmatvayoḥ śabde nirākāryatvena upayuktatvāt tābhyāmanyad guṇatvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4046: yat samānajātīyārambhakaṃ na tat karma, yathā rūpādaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4054: na ca vaktṛvaktrāvaruddhaṃ nabhaḥpradeśaṃ tat prāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:4055: na cādravyaṃ śabdo gatvā śrotreṇa saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4056: tasmād vīcītaraṅgarītyā svadeśānantaradeśe śabdāntarārambhaṇaparamparayā śrotradeśotpannaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātīti siddhaṃ sajātīyārambhakatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4059: eṣa punaranvayavyatirekī dravyakarmānyatve sati sadādyabhedasya sapakṣe rūpādau sattvād, vipakṣe sāmānyādāvabhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4066: sa khalvatyantāparidṛṣṭaḥ svarūpato vā sādhyeta, dṛṣṭadharmiviśeṣaṇatayā
GSP29nystik_u:4067: vā? tatra pūrvasmin kalpe nānupalabdha iti vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4068: uttarasmin sandigdha iti, viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣo hi saṃśayo
GSP29nystik_u:4070: na khalu saptamarasavattayā kecid dravye saṃśerata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4072: na tāvat svarūpeṇānumīyate yena nānupalabdha iti vyāhanyeta, kiṃ tu dṛṣṭasya dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇatayā
GSP29nystik_u:4075: tajjātīyena tu dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇordṛṣṭena pratyakṣato vā mānāntarād vā sādhanadharmasya svābhāvikapratibandhagrahasaṃbhādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4079: kutaḥ? guṇabhūto 'vacchedakatayā yataḥ, tasmādātmaviśiṣṭā icchādayaḥ sādhyā ityuktaṃ bhavati
GSP29nystik_u:4082: anupalabdhacaraścātmeti kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭā icchādayo nyāyaviṣayā iti śaṅkāmurīkṛtyata prayogaṃ sūcayati--paratantrā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4083: mā tatra saitsīdātmapāratantryam, pāratantryamātraṃ tu siddham ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4084: tena sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya pāratantryamātraviṣayatā, na pāratantryamicchādīnām anumeyātmavādīnāṃ kadācidapyasmadādipratyakṣagocaraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4088: icchādīno hi bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatve guṇatvameva vyatirekī hetuḥ ātmapāratantrye pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4089: yadyapi cāyaṃ svarūpeṇātmā na prasiddhaḥ, tathāpi dravyāṣṭakavyatirekādiśabdairadūraviprakarṣeṇa parāmṛṣṭaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭuṃ dharmiṇi ca nyāyapravṛttyaṅgaḥ saṃśayam āpādayitumiti niravadyam atra bhāṣyaṃ vibhāgavacanādeva trividhamiti saddhi iti, tasyārthaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4090: trividham iti vibhāgavacanādeva trividhe pūrvavadādau siddhe kimarthaṃ pūrvavadādyupādānaṃ sūtreṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4092: mahataḥ trividhasya mahāviṣayasya atītānāgatavartamānaviṣayasya laghīyasā sūtreṇa tatpūrvakamityetāvataivopadeśe paraṃ vākyalāghavaṃ manyamānasyānyasmin vākyalāghave 'nādaraḥ sūtrakārasyeti śiṣyān vyutpipādayiṣoḥ atraiva nidarśanam--tathā cāyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4093: asya samācāraḥ---itthaṃbhūtena vakyavikalpena vaicitryeṇa pravṛtta iti yojanā //
GSP29nystik_u:4094: evaṃ tāvat lakṣaṇabhedānumānaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣād darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4095: bhāṣyakārastu viṣayabhedādapi bhedamāha---sadviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ sadasadviṣayaṃ cānumānam
GSP29nystik_u:4101: yadyapi pratyakṣamapyatītānāgatayoḥ saṃprati niṣedhyaniṣedhayorniṣedhe pravartamānamasadviṣayaṃ tathāpi na pratiṣedhyayoḥ pravartate ityetāvatā sadviṣayamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4102: anumānaṃ tu tayorapi pravartate ityetāvatā asadviṣayamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4104: na hyanupalabdhasāmānye iti sāmānyata upalabdho viśeṣataścānirṇīto dharmo nyāyapravṛttāvadhikriyate
GSP29nystik_u:4111: yadi hi svatantraḥ samavāyaḥ, na tarhi kasyacid viśeṣaṇam, tathā ca na
GSP29nystik_u:4114: na viśeṣaṇatvaṃ svātantryeṇa nirākurmaḥ, kiṃ tu vṛttimasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4115: kasmāt punarasya na samavāyāntaramabhyupeyata ityata āha---atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:4121: ayaṃ pañcapadārthavṛttiśabdo bahuvrīhiṇā paramāṇau vartate, ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena tu samavāye /
GSP29nystik_u:4122: na ca kathañcit śabdābhedamātramanumānāṅgam, mā bhūd gośabdasāmyena
GSP29nystik_u:4123: vāgādīnām api viṣāṇitvamityaparitoṣāt nyāyāntaramāha--anāśritaḥ samavāya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4127: tacceha pratyayakāraṇe ātmāni ca samavāye cāvilakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4132: bhavatu vṛtteḥ prāganāśritaṃ kāryaṃ paścāt samavaiṣyati, turīsaṃyuktebhya iva tantubhya utpadya paṭaḥ paścāt turyā ityata āha--samavāyaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4135: pramāṇavattvāt prāptā samavāyasya vṛttirna śakyā anavasthābhiyā parityaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4137: saṃyoge prāptitvasya nivṛttyā svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kāryatvasyopādheḥ tatprayojakasya vidyamānatvādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4138: atha prāptidharmo 'pi kasmāt na bhavatītyata āha---yadi punariyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4139: nanviyamanavasthā kasmād bījāṅgurādiṣvivehāpi nābhyupeyate ityata āha---na
GSP29nystik_u:4141: anidaṃprathameṣvanāditvāt śakyā pratipādayitumanavasthā pramāṇena, na tvidaṃprathameṣvādimattvena tasyāśakyaniścayatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4144: tattvamekatvaṃ samavāyasya bhāvena sattvayā vyākhyātamiti śāstramāha,
GSP29nystik_u:4147: tathā ca vinaśyati, vinaṣṭe ca tasmin yo dṛśyate sa tato 'nya utpanna iti siddhaṃ samavāyasya nānātvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4152: kārya svāpādānena akṛtakasaṃbandhavad ādhāravattvāditi vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4154: utpadyamānaḥ khalvayaṃ samavāyaḥ sahakāryeṇa, na kāryasya /
GSP29nystik_u:4155: na hi sahotpannau rūpasparśau mithaḥ saṃbadhyete /
GSP29nystik_u:4161: kāryāt pūrvamutpannaḥ samavāyaḥ paścādutpadyamānaṃ kāryamupādānādhārakaṃ kariṣyati kāryahetubalādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4163: tribhyo hi kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ jāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4164: kāryakāraṇasamavāyasya ca kāryakāraṇe samavāyikāraṇe vaktavye, kāryāt prāg jātasya ca samavāyasya na kāryaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4165: na ca nimittakāraṇamātrādasya janmeti sāṃpratam, bhāvotpādasya sarvatra kāraṇatrayapūrvakatvaniyamāt
GSP29nystik_u:4166: tasmāt samavāyasya samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇābhāvat na kāryāt prāg utpāda iti suṣṭhūktam--tathāpi kasyeti vācyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4169: na ca paṭaturīsaṃyogavat samavāyasya paścāt kāryakāraṇasamavāya iti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4170: saṃyogajasya saṃyogasya kāraṇatrayasaṃbhavād asya tu samavāyāntaramantareṇa kāraṇatrayāyogāt
GSP29nystik_u:4173: tataśca na jñāyate kimabhipretyata asadviṣayamityuktamityākṣepa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4176: tanniṣedhastu bhavatu pratyakṣagocaraḥ, tathāpi siddho viṣayabheda
GSP29nystik_u:4178: atra caiṣa dharmatraividhyakramo dvedhā tāvat, vidhīyamānaḥ pratiṣiśyamānaśca /
GSP29nystik_u:4183: visphāritākṣo hi tadā ghaṭo bhavatīti pratyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4184: na cāsau tadā san, sato bhavanaṃ pratyakartṛkatvāt, gamanavaditi
GSP29nystik_u:4190: dhaṭo jāyata iti tu laukikaḥ prayogo ghaṭaśabdaṃ ghaṭārtheṣu tadavayaveṣūpacarya teṣāṃ ca siddhatayā kartṛtvādupapādanīya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4196: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ samāsaṃ vikalpya dūṣyati--nāntarīyakārtha iti ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4204: ityatra viśeṣaṇapadopādādamātreṇa vā viśeṣyapadopādānamātreṇa vā anyatarasyārthāt prāpterūbhayapadopādānasyaitat
GSP29nystik_u:4205: pratyekaṃ vyabhicāraḥ samudāye tvavyabhicāraḥ, tatra samāso yathā syāditi
GSP29nystik_u:4211: pṛthivītyukte bhavati saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ pṛthivītvaṃ sāmānyamasya vivakṣitaṃ yathā paśunā yajeta iti, kiṃ vā tadviśeṣyaṃ dravyam, grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4214: evaṃ dravyamityapyukte dravyatvaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ vyaktirveti vimarśe pṛthivītyetadupatiṣṭhate
GSP29nystik_u:4215: na dravyatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiṃ tu pṛthivī /
GSP29nystik_u:4221: na hyasti saṃbhavo nāntarīyakaśca syāt na cārtha iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4223: vastuvacanatve 'pyarthaśabdasya lakṣyāsaṃbhavād aviṣayaṃ lakṣaṇam, na hi dignāgasya mate kiñcidasti vastu yannāntarīyakaṃ saddheturbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4225: sarvo 'yamanumānānumeyabhāvo buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharmibhāvena na bahiḥ sadasattvamapekṣate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4226: avyāpakaṃ ca, na hi vastveva nāntarīyakamasato 'pi nāntarīyakatvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4230: atastrirūpaliṅgadarśanasya siddheḥ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadavarodhāya tadvida ityupādīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4234: na hyasmin lakṣaṇe tadvida ityasti, tena tadatiricyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4237: tadanena dignāgasya lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā anyeṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣitam //
GSP29nystik_u:4242: na hi yo 'numeye saṃścāsaṃśca sa śakyaḥ sanniti vaktum ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4244: yadyevaṃ syātad yo vipakṣe dvedhā sa vipakṣāvṛttiriti hetureva syāt na savyabhicāra ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4247: anumeye sadbhāva evetyavadhāraṇenānumeye sadbhāvasya niyatatvāt kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4250: asaṃbhavaḥ atyantāsaṃbhavo nirākriyate, yathā nīlaṃ sarojaṃ bhavatyeva nātyantaṃ na bhavatīti gamyate, na tu nīlameva sarojaṃ nānīlamiti, nāpi sarojameva nīlaṃ nānyaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4255: na hyatyantāyogavyavacchedenāyogo vyavacchinno bhavati, nāpi saṃbhavamātravidhānenāsaṃbhavo vyavacchinno bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4262: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'numeya evāsti tattulye ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4265: anumeya eva sadbhāva iti pakṣaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dūṣayitvā anumeye sadbhāva eveti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati---athottaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4267: sadbhāva eveti kila viśeṣaṇasaṃgatamavadhāraṇamayogam avyāpti vyavacchindat vyāpti darśayati
GSP29nystik_u:4269: dūṣayati---tathāpyanumeyamavadhāritaṃ saṃbhavasya vyāptyā na dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4273: anumeyaṃ khalvavadhāritaṃ saddhetusaṃbhavaṃ parityajya nānyatra vartate,
GSP29nystik_u:4275: hetusaṃbhavastvanavadhāritaḥ sarvatraiva tattulye ca vipakṣe ca prasṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4276: sa ca kaścit tattulyavipakṣau vyāpnoti, kaścit tadekadeśavṛttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4277: tadasya hetusaṃbhavasya vipakṣe 'pi prasaktasya pratiṣedhāya yuktamasati
GSP29nystik_u:4279: tattulye tu prasaktamapratiṣiddhamanumatameveti tattulye sadbhāva iti vyarthamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4281: tulyahetu sadbhāvasiddhāvapi tattulye vyāptyā hotoḥ sadbhāvo bhavatvityetadarthaṃ tattulye sadbhāva iti vacanam ityata āha--tattulye ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4282: yadi punarvyāptirvivakṣyeta kṛtakatve sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4287: pūrvapadena saha virodhe nidarśanamāha---na hi bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4288: anumeye sadbhāva ityanenānumeye vṛttau hetārlabdhāyāṃ tattulya eva sadbhāva iti samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇaṃ vipakṣamātrād vṛtti vyavacchinatti,
GSP29nystik_u:4290: naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūva /
GSP29nystik_u:4292: samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇe hi tattulyena yathānyayogavyavacchedenaivakāraḥ saṃbadhyate tathānumeyenāpi saṃbadhyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:4294: na khalu naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameveti nipāto nārāyaṇena sahānyayogavyavacchedena saṃbadhyate, nareṇa cāyogavyavacchedeneti bhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4296: yathāyogavyavacchedaḥ, tathā tattulye 'yogavyavacchedena saṃbandha ucyeteti śaṅkate---atha tattulya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4300: na ca yasyānumeye sadbhāva evetyanūdya tattulya eva sattvamiti vidhātuṃ śakyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4301: na hyanumānaṃ śakyaṃ viśeṣṭum, tathā sati tadviśeṣaṇāya
GSP29nystik_u:4305: ityatra hi yadyapi svarūpeṇārteraśakyapratipattitvena haviṣā viśeṣaṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:4306: mṛgyate, tathāpi na śakyaṃ havirūbhayatvena viśeṣṭuṃ vinā
GSP29nystik_u:4309: atha tadvivakṣayaiva vākyabhedamabhyupetya paścād vākyaikavākyatayā abhimatārthasiddhirāsthīyate
GSP29nystik_u:4313: tathā hi anumeye sadbhāva ityatrānumeya eva nānanumeye, sadbhāva eva nāsadbhāva iti padārthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4315: evaṃ tattulye sadbhāva ityatrāpi tattulya eva nātattulye, sadbhāva eva nāsadbhāva iti padārthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4321: na ca samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇaṃ dignāgo mene, yadevamūce
GSP29nystik_u:4323: yadi rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ tato na dravyaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4326: atra hi rūpavaddravyasahitaṃ rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ na gandharasādīti śakyaṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇam
GSP29nystik_u:4330: kasmāt? yadasat tattucchaṃ svayameva nāsti, tanna saditi śakyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:4332: bhavatu, tathāpi kasmāt tasmānna hetoḥ vyāvṛttirbhavatītyata āha---na
GSP29nystik_u:4338: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4340: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4342: gaurayaṃ viṣāṇītvādityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva nāsti, pakṣasapakṣavyāpakatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:4343: na tu nāstyeva, vipakṣaikadeśe mahiṣādau vṛtteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4344: ato vipakṣa eva nāsti ityayamapi hetuḥ syāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4347: tatraikapadaparyudāsena trayaḥ pakṣāḥ, dvipadaparyudāsenāpi traya iti
GSP29nystik_u:4350: yathānumeye sadbhāva ityucyamāne yasya tattulye nāstitā vipakṣe ca vṛttiḥ so 'pi hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4351: tattulye astītyucyamāne vipakṣavṛtterapakṣadharmasya ca hetutvaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4353: nāstitāsatītyucyamāne yo 'pakṣadharmastattulye ca nāsti sa hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'sattvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4354: anumeye tattulye cetyucyamāne, anityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:4356: anumeye 'styasati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne nityaḥ śabdo jātimattve sati
GSP29nystik_u:4358: tattulye 'sti asati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kṛtakatvādityayam apakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4365: tathāpi yatrāvinābhūte liṅge bhavata ekasmin dharmiṇi
GSP29nystik_u:4371: yadi pratyakṣaśabdo jñānavacanaḥ jñānaṃ caikatvena viśiṣyate, tadaitad dūṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4372: atha saṃbandhaviśeṣaṇamekasmāditi, pratyakṣaśabdaśca jñāye na tu jñāne,
GSP29nystik_u:4375: saṃbandhasya pratyakṣatoktā pūrvam, na tvanumānakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4380: tathā ca gṛhītāvinābhāvāt liṅgāt saṃprati pratyakṣādityupapannamityata
GSP29nystik_u:4384: sarvarūpasaṃpattirvā? tatra prathame kalpe mā bhūd viruddhāvyabhicārī,
GSP29nystik_u:4386: dvitīye tu kalpe na sarvarūpasaṃpanno heturviruddhāvyabhicārī saṃbhavatītyekasmāditi atiricyate
GSP29nystik_u:4391: na ca pratikṣaṇapariṇāmavāde kuṇḍavadarādīnāmapi kaścidasti saṃbandha ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4394: na hi sāṃkhyānāṃ bauddhānāṃ vā rāddhānte 'sti saṃbandhaḥ samavāyo nām /
GSP29nystik_u:4398: yadyucyeta prādhānikatvād rūpādīnāṃ pradhānamekamāśrayaḥ, tathā ca yatra
GSP29nystik_u:4399: rūpaṃ tatra sparśa ityata āha--yatra rūpamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4401: na hi pradhānamādhāraḥ kāryāṇām, api tu pradhānātmakatvameṣāmiṣyate, tathā ca yatra tatretyanupapattiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4403: na ca bhedābhedāvekatra saṃbhavato virodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4405: yathā hyāsandikāṅgāni bhinnānyanauttarādharyavyavasthitānyapi parasparāśrayatayā na patanti, evaṃ rūpasparśāvapi parasparāśrayāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4407: kutaḥ? na rūpaṃ sparśo rūpe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4409: rūpasparśādīnāṃ tu sthitirna parasparahetukā, api tu bhogāpavargalakṣaṇapuruṣārthahetuketi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4421: sādharmyaṃ ca sāmānyamabhidadhatā na sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāma padārthāntaramastītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4422: sādharmyaṃ cāprasiddhaṃ na sādhyasāghanāyālamiti sādharmyaprasiddhirapi draṣṭavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:4423: sā ca yathā gaustathā gavaya ityāptavākyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4427: pratayakṣād gavayagatād gosādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ prajñāpanamuktamiti
GSP29nystik_u:4433: yadyapi prasiddhasārmyamupamānamityucyamāne pramāṇaviśeṣābhidhāyyupamānapadasāmānādhikaraṇyāt karaṇatvalābhaḥ, tathāpi tadābhāsanirākaraṇāya sādhyasādhanapadopādānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4436: vārttikakāreṇa bahuvrīhidvayasaṃbhavo darśitaḥ, na tu tṛtīyāsamāso
GSP29nystik_u:4438: bhāṣyakāreṇa hi saṃjñitayā gavayapratipattiḥ phalaṃ sādhyasādhanapadavācyamuktā, ākṣiptaprayojyavyāpāratvāt
GSP29nystik_u:4446: samākhyāsaṃbandhapratipattistu kutastyā? na hi yo yatsadṛśaṃ yaṃ pratipadyate, sa tasya samākhyāmapyavagacchati ityāśayavān
GSP29nystik_u:4455: pratyakṣamayī ca yathā gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'yamīdṛśaḥ piṇḍa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4457: yadyapi yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya ityetasmādapi gosadṛśasya gavayaśabdaḥ samākhyeti śakyamavagantum, na khalu pratyakṣa eva saṃjñākarma,
GSP29nystik_u:4459: tacca yadi mānāntareṇāpi tathāvagamyate, kastatra saṃjñākarma nivārayet?
GSP29nystik_u:4460: gosādṛśyena copalakṣitaḥ piṇḍo ya iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭaḥ śakyo ghaṭādibhyo 'samānajātiyebhyo mahiṣādibhyaśca samānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinno 'vagantuṃ gavayaḥ, tathāpi yāvadayamasau gavaya iti sākṣāt pratīte saṃbandhini saṃjñāṃ na niveśayati, tāvadayaṃ pariplutamatiḥ pramātā kaccit khalu drakṣyāmi tādṛśaṃ piṇḍaṃ yatra gavayasaṃjñā pratipatsya iti pramotsuka evodīkṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:4465: nanu yadodīcyena kramelakaṃ nindratoktam, dhik karabhamatidīrghavakragrīvaṃ pralamboṣṭhaṃ kaṭhoratīkṣṇakaṇṭakāśinaṃ kutsitāvayavasanniveśamapasadaṃ paśūnāmiti, tadupaśrutya dākṣiṇātya uttarāpathaṃ gatastādṛśaṃ vastūpalabhya nūnamasau karabha iti pratyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:4466: tat katamadeteṣu pramāṇam? na tāvadupamānaṃ sādharmyābhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4468: yadyucyeta nindāparaṃ vākyaṃ karabhasya tādṛśatve na pramāṇam, na hyanyaparāt śabdādanyasyāvagama iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4469: yatra tarhi tādṛktve paryavasyati vākyaṃ tatra kā gatiḥ? atha tatrāpi tādṛk karabha āgamāvagataḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4470: karabhaśabdavācyatā tu tasya tatpūrvaṃ tādṛkvarabhaparatve apyāgamasya prayogamātrādavagatā anumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4471: yo hi yatra prayujyate śabdo 'sati vṛttyantare sa tasya vācakaḥ, yathā gośabdo gotve /
GSP29nystik_u:4474: tadidaṃ prāgeva prayogānumitaṃ vācakatvamasya pratyakṣasamaye kevalaṃ smaryate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4475: samānametat upamānavākye 'pi tatrāpi vākyādavagataḥ sādharmyavān piṇḍaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate
GSP29nystik_u:4476: prayogānumitaṃ ca gavayapadasya vācakatvaṃ smaryate iti na phalāntaramavaśiṣyate yatropamānaṃ pramāṇamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:4478: na tāvadākāśādiśabdavadeṣa gavayaśabdaḥ sākṣāt piṇḍasya vācakaḥ, kintu gavayatvaṃ nimittīkṛtya piṇḍe vartate iti paramārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4479: na ca yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti vākyād gavayatvamavagatam, na hyanavagatasaṃbadhaṃ gavayapadametadavabodhayati
GSP29nystik_u:4482: na khalvanupalabdhacareṇa gavayatvena gosādṛśyaṃ saṃbaddhaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:4485: tasmāt saṃbandhino gavayatvasya sarvathānupalabdheḥ kuto vākyād vā anumānād vā vācyavācakasaṃbandhāvasāyaḥ? kutastarāṃ ca saṃbandhasmṛti?
GSP29nystik_u:4486: gavayatvasāmānyaviśeṣavati tu piṇḍe pratyakṣe yuktaḥ saṃbandhāvagamaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4487: saṃbandhino gavayatvasya pratyakṣatvāt vākyārthasya ca smaryāṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4488: tathāpi kiṃ gavayatvajātimān piṇḍo vācyaḥ, uta gosādṛśyavāniti kuto
GSP29nystik_u:4491: tarkaśca gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭapiṇḍābhidhāne kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgaḥ tathā hi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭa piṇḍābhidhāne, nāpratītaṃ sādṛśyaṃ piṇḍaṃ viśinaṣṭīti tatpratipattavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4492: na ca śabdādanyatastadavagama iti śabdaśya tatra vācakatvaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4493: na cāviśiṣṭaṃ sādṛśyamapi piṇḍaviśeṣe gavayapadam avasthāpayitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:4494: yasya kasyacid yena kenacit saha sādṛśyāditi tadapi gavā viśeṣaṇīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4495: na cānyato gotvasyāpi pratipattiriti tadapi gavayapadenābhidhātavyam iti kalpanāgauravam /
GSP29nystik_u:4499: ata eva bahunyudāhaṇānyuktvāpyāha sma bhagavān bhāṣyakāraḥ, evamanyo
GSP29nystik_u:4502: tadīdṛśamupamānaphalamavidvān sādṛśyaviśiṣṭavastujñānaṃ copamānaphalamiti bhrānto bhadanto dignāga ākṣipati---pratyakṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4506: yadā tu gavayamekaṃ pratyakṣeṇa paśyati, smarati ca gām, tadāpi gosādṛśyaṃ gavayasthaṃ pratyakṣameva /
GSP29nystik_u:4507: gagosthamapratyakṣam, apratyakṣatvād goriti cet? hanta bhoḥ kimabhimataṃ
GSP29nystik_u:4508: sādṛśyamāyuṣmato yadapratyakṣāyāṃ gavi na pratyakṣam? sāmānyabāhulyaṃ jātyantaravarti jātyantarasya
GSP29nystik_u:4512: iti cet? tat kimidānīṃ karṇatvādisāmānyaṃ gogavayagatakarṇādibhedena bhinnamityapi vaktumadhyavasito 'si? tasmād yathā kālākṣyāṃ gavi gotvamīkṣitavataḥ svastimatyāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:4513: tadevedamiti, etadeva tadityavagataṃ bhavati, tathehāpīti na phalātirekaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4514: tasmāt na sādṛśyapratītiphalamupamānaṃ pratyakṣād vākyād vā vyatiricyate iti sūktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4521: yadi tu na tebhyo vilakṣaṇamabhaviṣyad na tadvilakṣaṇāṃ pramāmakariṣyat,
GSP29nystik_u:4531: upadiśyate 'neneti upadeśo vākyajñānaṃ vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā abhighīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4535: yadyapi vidhirūpadeśaḥ pravartanamityanarthāntaram, yadyapi cāyaṃ niyojyaprayojane pravṛttinivṛttī vidadhadājñādhyeṣaṇābhyāmatiricyate, te hi niyoktṛprayojane pravṛttinivṛttī vidhattaḥ, tathāpi bhūtārthaparopaniṣadādiśabdavyāpakatvāt paraprayojanavadvacanamātravivakṣayopadeśapadaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4536: yadyapi sadeva somyedamagra āsīd ityādi vacanaṃ kvacit na pravartayati, kutaścid vā nivartayati
GSP29nystik_u:4540: āptānāṃ ṛṣyāryamlecchānāmupadeśaḥ śabdo na tvanāptānāṃ māyāmohanirmitānāṃ buddharṣabhādīnāṃ pramāṇaviruddhakṣaṇikasarvadharmanairātmyavādināmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4543: sudṛḍhena pramāṇenāvadhāritāḥ sākṣātkṛtā dharmāḥ padārthā hitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā yena sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4544: tathāpi tattvaṃ vidvān akārūṇikatayā vā alasatayā vā anupadiśan,
GSP29nystik_u:4545: matsaritayā vā viparītamupadiśan nāptaḥ syādityata āha---yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4552: āpta iti prakṛtipratyayasamudāyāt prakṛti niṣkṛṣya tadarthamāha--sākṣātkaraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4557: karatalāmalakaphalavat sākṣātkṛtatraikālyavarttiprameyamātraḥ, ārād yātaḥ pātakebhya ityāryo madhyamo lokaḥ, mlecchaḥ prasiddhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4558: mlecchā api hi paripathamavasthitāḥ pānthānāmapahṛtasarvasvānāṃ mārgākhyāne hetudarśanaśūnyā avantyāptā iti pareṣāmāptalakṣaṇamavyāpakamityuktaṃ bhavati //
GSP29nystik_u:4561: ākṣeptā bhāṣyam ākṣipya sūtraṃ samādhatte tasmāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4563: apauruṣeyo vaidika upadeśaḥ svargāpūrvadevatādiviṣayaḥ svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe nirdeṣatayā yukta upapannaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4568: tasmāt puruṣasyaivāptasyopadeśa āptopadeśa iti sādhu vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyakārīyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4570: asti hi svargādīnāmapratyakṣatve nyāyaḥ, yogipratyakṣaṃ na svargādiviṣayaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4574: atra yāvati pakṣe yo hetuḥ siddhaḥ, tasya tanmātre pakṣīkāryam /
GSP29nystik_u:4575: yogaje ca pratyakṣe siddhe tatsādhakādeva pramāṇāt tasya svargādiviṣayatvamapi siddhamiti dharmigrāhakapramāṇaviruddhaṃ mīmāṃsakānām anumānaṃ nodetumapyutsahate prāgeva tad bādhitum asiddhe tu yogaje pratyakṣa āśrayāsiddho heturābhāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4576: asmākaṃ tu samyañco bahavaśca nyāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4580: atra trayaḥ kalpāḥ, kimekamapūrvaṃ sarvapuruṣasādhāraṇam, āho asādhāraṇam?
GSP29nystik_u:4581: yadāpi asādhāraṇaṃ tadāpi kiṃ pratipuruṣamekaikamapūrvam, āho
GSP29nystik_u:4582: pratipuruṣamanekamiti? tatra prathamaṃ kalpaṃ dūṣayati--yadi sādhāraṇateti
GSP29nystik_u:4583: na hi kadācidapyayamapūrvaṃ paśyati laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4589: tad yathā mahati darpaṇatale mahanmukham, tadeva kanīnikāyām aṇviti bhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4592: svābhiprāyeṇa nirākaroti---na dṛṣṭa iti brūma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4593: śaṅkitā pṛcchati--kiṃ punastat yadi na dṛṣṭam? tatra yadi bhedena na
GSP29nystik_u:4595: kiṃ punastat, yad bhedena bhedadarśanamiti bhāsate? samāghātā
GSP29nystik_u:4597: na bhedadarśanamapajānīmahe, kiṃ tu pāramārthikaṃ bhedam /
GSP29nystik_u:4598: na ca kalpito 'pūrvabhadaḥ pāramārthikāya kāryāyālamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4603: aśvamedhakriyayā tāvat tadapūrvaṃ svakāla evābhivyaktaṃ phaladānābhimukhīkṛtam, abhivya/jakasamānakālatvādabhivyakteḥ, pradīpādiṣu darśanāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4604: tathāpi phalaṃ tāvat na datte, yāvat kriyā na nivartate /
GSP29nystik_u:4607: tat khalu pūrvaṃ sadapi phalaṃ nākārṣīt caramabhāvinyāḥ kriyāyāḥ tajjanyāyā ābhivyakteranutpādāt
GSP29nystik_u:4608: utpannāyāṃ tu kriyāyāmabhivyaktau vā kasmāt na karoti? na hi kriyāyā
GSP29nystik_u:4610: tasmādakāmenāpi tvayā asatyā eva kriyāyā vya/jakatvamanugrāhakatvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:4613: api ca sāsatī cet kriyābhivyanakti, tathā sati asattāyāḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāt na kiñcidapūrvaṃ nābhivyaktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4615: atra śabdaṃ pramāṇāntaramasahamāno dignāgaḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ vikalpyākṣipati---āptopadeśa iti
GSP29nystik_u:4619: tasmāt na sākṣāt śabdādarthaniścayaḥ, vivakṣākāryantayā tu vivakṣāṃ
GSP29nystik_u:4623: tatra yaḥ pramāṇaniścitamarthaṃ vivakṣati, yathāvivakṣaṃ coccārayati sa
GSP29nystik_u:4625: tasya vacanāt kāryāt kāraṇaṃ vivakṣā anumīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4629: te ca prāyeṇa visaṃvādakā dṛṣṭā ityāptagrahaṇena teṣāmavisaṃvāditvam /
GSP29nystik_u:4635: tathā hi yad yannirdeṣasattvīyaṃ vacanaṃ tatsarvamarthavat, yathā buddhasya kṣaṇikanairātmyādiviṣaya upadeśaḥ, tathā cāyaṃ vivādādhyāsita
GSP29nystik_u:4640: atra hi upadiśyata ityupadeśa iti vyutpattyā artha ucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4641: āptaḥ prāpta upadeśo yasmāt sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4642: etaduktaṃ bhavati yasmāt śabdādavagamyārthaṃ pravartamānaḥ prāpnoti tamevārtha sa āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4643: evaṃ ca yathā śabdena yo 'rtho darśitaḥ, tasyāptyā tathātā darśitā bhavati
GSP29nystik_u:4647: āptyā hi tathātvaṃ viniścanvan arthasya nāpratipannatayā niścetumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:4657: nāpyāgamaḥ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ na bhidyate, kiṃ tu upadeśaḥ śabda ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4658: upadeśa iti ca kārakapadam, upadiśyate jñāpyate prayojanavānartho 'neneti
GSP29nystik_u:4661: tadidamuktam---yā śabdollekhena padārthasmaraṇāvāntaravyāpārāt śabdādevārthaṃ pratyemītyanenollekhena pratipattiḥ sāgamasyārthaḥ phalamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4662: āptatvaṃ ca na vākyārthaṃ pratyāyayati api tvāgamasyāvyabhicāritām /
GSP29nystik_u:4663: na ca yataḥ prāmāṇyamavagamyate tataḥ prameyamapi /
GSP29nystik_u:4664: tathā ca sati prāmāṇyajñānahetoranumānādeva pratyakṣādiprameyāvagatiriti pratyakṣādīnāmapramāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4666: na cāptavākyaṃ kāryaṃ sad vaktṛjñānānumānadvāreṇārthe 'pyanumānameva, na tvarthasya pratyāyakamiti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:4667: yadi hi nārthaṃ pratyāyayet jñānamātramanumāpayet, tathā ca nārthaviśeṣasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4669: tasmāt vaktṛjñānaviśeṣaṇāya pūrvaṃ śabdādeva kevalād vākyārthajñānam eṣitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4670: evaṃ ca kṛtaṃ vaktṛjñānānumānenārthapratipattyarthena kevalaṃ prāmāṇyajñānāya tadupayoga iti
GSP29nystik_u:4671: na cāvinābhāva eva saṃbandho yena śabdārthayorasaṃbandhena gamyagamakatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4673: na cāvinābhāvaḥ eva pratyāyanāṅgam, cakṣurādayo nīlādibhedavyabhicāriṇo 'pi dṛṣṭāḥ tatpratipādakā ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4675: ākāṅkṣāyogyatāsattisadhrīcīnāni adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ vākyārthaṃ bodhayanti, na saṃgatigrahaṇamapi pratīkṣanta iti dūre 'numānād bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:4680: sa dvividho dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvāt iti sūtrasya tātparyamāha---niyamārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:4684: yathāha bhāṣyakāraḥ, yasyāmutra pratīyate so 'dṛṣṭārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4689: dṛṣṭo 'rtho yena saṃ dṛṣṭārthaḥ pravaktā, evamadṛṣṭo 'rthonumito yena sa tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:4694: asyārthamāha na vigrahaṃ karoti pratyakṣata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4696: sa na manyeta dṛṣṭānāṃ vākyānāṃ prāmāṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4706: aparīkṣitaṃ ca na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptamiti parīkṣā vidhāyiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4707: tatparikaraśca saṃśayādaya iti yuktaṃ teṣāṃ paścāllakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4708: tadiha prameyalakṣaṇāya tadvibhāgoddeśasūtramavatārayituṃ bhāṣyakāraḥ pṛcchati sma---kiṃ punaranena pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:4710: tadetad bhāṣyam anūdya vārttikakāra ākṣipati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4713: pratyakṣādilakṣaṇasāmarthyāt prameyamātraṃ sidvam, siśiṣṭaṃ tu prameyamadyāpi na sidhyatīti tadarthaṃ praśnaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4714: sa ca viśeṣo yathāvaditi na darśita iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4716: yeṣāṃ tattvātattvajñānābhyām apavargasaṃsārau bhavataḥ, ta etāvanta eva /
GSP29nystik_u:4723: itiśabda ādyarthe tena vṛkṣaṃ paśyati, vṛkṣeṇa candramasaṃ paśyatītyādayo
GSP29nystik_u:4726: pravartate, kiṃ tu yat tattvato jñāyamānamapavargasādhanaṃ tasmin,
GSP29nystik_u:4729: nanvasmin pakṣe na kadācidapi pramāṇatā syādityasti doṣa ityata āha---kimuktaṃ bhavatīti
GSP29nystik_u:4730: nāsya puruṣamātraṃ prati prameyatvaṃ vidhīyate, api tu mokṣamāṇaśiṣṭaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:4732: anūdyata iti pramāṇāntaramūlakatvena vidhānasya dārḍhyaṃ darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4744: na kevalaṃ pramāṇavidhānākṣiptam, api tvādyasūtragamaprameyapadādapi labdhamityāha---ādyena ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4747: bhoktā, yataḥ sukhaduḥkhasādhanaṃ sarvam, sarvaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaṃ jānāti,
GSP29nystik_u:4752: ātmanyayaṃ viśeṣo yadanena rūpeṇa heyaḥ, kaivalyena copādeyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4755: avidyamānaṃ pūrvaṃ śarīraṃ yasya tadapūrvaṃ śarīram /
GSP29nystik_u:4757: prameyatattvamaviduṣa ātmana avidyamānamuttaraṃ śarīraṃ yasya tad anuttaram /
GSP29nystik_u:4759: nanu yathā pūrveṣāṃ śarīrāṇām anāditā evamuttareṣāmapyanantatā, tathā ca mokṣamāṇānāṃ pravṛttayaśca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi cānarthakāni prasajyerannityata āha---uttareṣāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4761: nanu sūkhe 'pyuddeṣṭavye duḥkhamātroddeśaḥ kiṃ sukhaṃ pratyācaṣṭe? tathā cānubhavavirodha ityata āha--nedamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4763: punariti na cānyata ātmādipadāt, upalabdhiḥ, asmādeva ātmādibhyo bhedena
GSP29nystik_u:4765: copāsīnasya tayaiva virodhiguṇena tṛṣṇā vicchidyate, sukhānabhidhānena duḥkhapakṣanikṣepaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4766: tathā ca sukhe 'sya vairāgyaṃ bhavatīti tātparyārthaḥ //9 //
GSP29nystik_u:4770: ahamiti jñānaṃ gaurādyākāraṃ śarīrāvabhāsaṃ na śakyaṃ ghaṭādijñānavad drāgātmani pramāṇayitumityabhiprāyaḥ, paradehavartyātmābhiprāyaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:4774: tataścātpoktatvānumānasiddhamapi prāmāṇyaṃ śabdasya anena tadarthasaṃvādakenānumānena dṛḍhataraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4777: tadanena vārttikena anumānācca pratipattavya iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam icchāyā ātmaliṅgatvakathanaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ yajjātīyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4783: yaścāsāveko 'nubhavitā ca smartā cānumātā caiṣitā ca sa ātmā /
GSP29nystik_u:4791: asatyapi ātmani jñātari satyapi ca buddhyādīnāṃ bhede, tatsantānābhedena pratisandhānavyavasthopapatsyata ityata āha---niyataviṣaye iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4794: tadabhyupagame vā sa evātmeti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4799: nanvekaviṣayāṇāṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ nānākartṛkatve ko virodha ityata āha---na
GSP29nystik_u:4802: nānānimittatva udāharaṇamāha---nāpi bhavatīti, yad yasmāt nimittāt
GSP29nystik_u:4803: tvagindriyāt sparśamahamasparkṣaṃ tat tasmāt nimittāt cakṣuṣo rūpaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4804: nānākartṛtva udāharaṇamāha---na hi bhavati devadatta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4806: tadetadanupapannam, bhinnakartṛkatvād vyatirekasyopādhisaṃbhavena svābhāvikapratibandhavijñānavaikalyāt, asti hi devadattayajñadattavijñānānāṃ bhinnakartṛkatvamakāryakāraṇabhāvaśca, tatra kimakāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisandhānasya vyatireka uta bhinnakartṛkatvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:4820: kaḥ punarasau hetuviśeṣa ityata āha---viśeṣitaṃ caitatpratisaṃdhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4822: pratisaṃndhānam yajjātīyaṃ candanavanitādi sukhahetuṃ pratītaṃ smarāmi tajjātīyamimu pratyemīti pratisandhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4823: tadanena śālibījāṅgurasya paramparayā śālibījāntarajananalakṣaṇāt pratisaṃdhānāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamād vyavacchinatti //
GSP29nystik_u:4825: kāryakāraṇabhāvādevopapatsyate, kṛtamekena kartretyata āha---sā ca smṛtirbhavatpakṣe 'nupapannā
GSP29nystik_u:4826: pṛcchati---kasmāt? uttaram---anyena nimittena anubhūtasya anyena nimittena asmaraṇāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4827: na hi bhavati yenaiva cakṣuṣā ghaṭamadrākṣam, tenaiva tvagindriyeṇa taṃ
GSP29nystik_u:4829: nimittabhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamuktvā viṣayabhede 'pyāha---na hyanyena svabhāvena ghaṭatvādinānubhūtasya anyena vṛkṣatvādinā smaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4830: na hi bhavati yamahaṃ ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so 'yaṃ vṛkṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4833: na hi bhavati yo 'haṃ devadatto 'drākṣaṃ so 'haṃ yajñadattaḥ paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4834: na cedaṃ satyapi bhede kāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:4835: na hi yatra sphuṭataraḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tantupaṭayorghaṭakapālayorvā dṛśyate tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavati, ye tantavaḥ sa eva paṭa iti vā yo ghaṭākṣaṇaḥ sa eva kapālakṣaṇa iti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:4836: vastutaḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtānāmagṛhītabhedānāṃ pratisaṃdhānahetubhāvaḥ sabhāgeṣu kṣaṇeṣu tathā darśanāditi cet? tanna,
GSP29nystik_u:4837: āmalakaphalasyaikasyāpanayane tatraiva sthāne āmalakāntarāvasthāpane bhavati pratisaṃdhānam
GSP29nystik_u:4839: pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ smṛtyā sahaikaviṣayatvaṃ kartari kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaṃ na karmaṇīti cet? hanta,
GSP29nystik_u:4842: saiva cātmadṛṣṭirdeṣāṇāṃ nidānaṃ paramiti vyartho nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāvaprayāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4843: athāsadapi pratisaṃdhānaṃ kāryavaśādāharati tathāgato naṭa iva
GSP29nystik_u:4846: sa tarhi tādṛśaḥ śālibījasyotpādaṃ vāstavaṃ na niyantumarhati, na jātu kalpitavahnibhāvo māṇavako dahanapākayorūpayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4847: na ca pratyayānāṃ bhedāgrahāt pratisaṃdhānamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:4850: ahamiti ca sattvadṛṣṭeḥ kṣaṇikatvanirākṛtāvasati bādhake sthiravastuviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4851: tasmāt smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ ekaviṣayatvalakṣaṇasya pratisandhānasyānekakartṛkatvād vyatireko nirūpādhirekakartṛkatvaṃ sādhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4852: sa caikaḥ kartā śarīrendriyabuddhibhyo bhinna ātmeti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:4854: tasmād yasmin pakṣe smṛtiḥ saṃbhavati tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ nyāyyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4859: syādetat, yogicittamapi sarvajñasya cetasa ālambanapratyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4866: tamimamasmadabhiprāyānabhijñaṃ paramanyathāpi bodhayituṃ vibhavāma iti siddhāntī anyathā smṛtyanupapattimāha---na, asthiratvāt buddhīnām /
GSP29nystik_u:4867: na hyajātānanvayadhyastayorasti kaścid viśeṣa iti pūrvotpanno 'nubhavaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:4868: kāñcana vāsanāmādhāya dhvaṃsate, yayā kālāntare smṛtirādhīyate
GSP29nystik_u:4870: na cāsthirā buddhiḥ śakyā vāsayitumityātmā sthiro 'bhyupeya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4874: nāsmākaṃ kṣaṇikavastuvādināmasti tajjagati yadavasthitaṃ vāsakena vāsyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ nanu tathāpyasamānakālayatā saṃbandharahitamaśakyaṃ vāsayitumiti grahaṇakavākyavivaraṇavyājenāpākaroti---athāpīti pūrvacittaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ yattat ṣaḍvidham, pañca
GSP29nystik_u:4876: tena saha jātaḥ samānakālaḥ cenāviśeṣaḥ tadālayavijñānamityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4881: upapādayiṣyate hi bhāvānāṃ sarvajanapratītisiddhā stharatā kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇena /
GSP29nystik_u:4882: tathā ca sthirasya saṃbaddhasya ca vastrādeḥ mṛgamadādinā vāsyatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nāsthire 'saṃbaddhe ca bhavitumarhatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4884: asthirayorapi jñānayoḥ samānakālatayā asti saṃbandha iti kasmāt anyataracittavāsitamanyataraccittaṃ smṛtiṃ nādhatte ityata āha---yaścāsāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:4886: nanu vartamāne cetasi mā kārṣodupakāram, anāgate tu kariṣyati ityata
GSP29nystik_u:4904: sthirameva hi kuṇḍaṃ sthirasyaiva vadarasya gurutvena patato gurutvaṃ pratibadhnadadhaḥpatanaṃ nivārayadādhāro bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4905: yadyucyeta na smṛtirbhāvaḥ, kiṃ tu bhavitrī utpattirasyā bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4906: na tu bhaviturbhavitrantarāpekṣā yuktā anavasthāpātāditi āśaṅkate---athāpīdamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4911: svarūpamutpatterūcyamānaṃ svatantraṃ bādhate yataḥ, tasmād virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4916: tathā ca na virodho nāpyanabhyupaga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4919: api cotpatterbhāvatve 'pi na smṛtirna bhāvaḥ, bhāvatvasya kāryamātrānubandhitvāt smṛteśca kāryatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4921: tathā ca smṛteḥ bhāvasya bhavitā ātmaika nityaḥ pariśiṣyate ityāśayavānāha---yadā cotpattiriti
GSP29nystik_u:4923: tat siddhametat---smṛtiḥ pūrvāparapratyayābhyāmekakartṛkā, tābhyāṃ sahaikaviṣayatvena pratisandhīyamānatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:4924: yā punarnābhyāmekakartṛkā sā nābhyāṃ tathā pratisandhīyate, yathā devadattasya smṛtirna yajñadattapratyayābhyām
GSP29nystik_u:4930: 'nūbhūtāḥ tenaiva gandha upalabhyate iti khalu mayeti smṛtyā saha pratisandhānaṃ tasmād bharatamatābhyāsenābhinaye ye kṛtasaṅketāḥ, teṣām /
GSP29nystik_u:4936: na bhrūḥ paramāṇusamūho 'pi tu avayavidravyamekam, tadgataṃ ca recitakamapi kriyaikaiva
GSP29nystik_u:4937: bhavatu vā paramāṇusamūha eva bhrūkṣepaḥ, tathāpi samūhasya samūhibhyo
GSP29nystik_u:4940: asti ca teṣāmapi svagocarāvikalpotpādanadvāreṇa paraṃparayā mayeti pratisandhānahetubhāva iti yatkiñcidetadekatvaṃ tasya kalpitamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4941: tadevaṃ pratisandhānadvāreṇecchādīnāmātmaliṅgatvamuktvā saṃprati guṇatayā liṅgatā vārttikakṛd āha---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:4944: na hyanityo bhāvo dravyāt svatantro bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4945: tasmād guṇatvaprasādhakādeva hetoḥ pāratantryasiddheḥ kṛtaṃ guṇatvena pāratantryasādhakeneti hṛdi nidhāya vārttikakāraḥ tadapi pūrvamuktamiti siddhena pāratantryeṇa guṇatvamapi sādhayati na caitadanityasya pāratantryaṃ dravyeṇa sidhyati,
GSP29nystik_u:4950: yadyapyanityatvena dravyasamavāyamātraṃ sidhyati, tathāpi dravyakalpanamātreṇaivopapattau tadavayayavakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tad dravyamanavayavaṃ tāvat siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:4951: anavayavaṃ ca dravyaṃ dvedhā, vyāpakam aṇu ca /
GSP29nystik_u:4953: kvacidanyatarakarmaṇā kvacit svabhāvataḥ tatsaṃyogopapattau tadgatikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt siddhamasya vyāpakatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:4955: tadanayā vakroktyā nityatvaṃ paramamahattvaṃ cātmano darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4958: yat tatpūrvaṃ hṛdi sthitamicchādīnāṃ dravyapāratantrye sādhye
GSP29nystik_u:4964: tasmād aṣṭadravyātiriktaṃ dravyāntaram, tatrecchādayaḥ, sa cātmeti siddhamityāha---tatpratiṣedhāditi NyS_1,1.11: ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayaḥ śarīram //
GSP29nystik_u:4965: ātmānaṃ lakṣayitvātmano duḥkhanidānānāmindriyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca śarīramāśritya tannidānatvamiti tadevāsya duḥkhamūlakāraṇamityanantaraṃ śarīraṃ lakṣayituṃ sūtram---ceṣṭetyādi tadavatārāya bhāṣyam---tasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4971: atra ceṣṭāśrayatvenendriyāśrayatvenārthāśrayatvena ca pratyekaṃ samānajātīyebhya ātmendriyādibhyo 'samānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇasaṃśayādibhyaḥ śarīraṃ vyavacchidyate //
GSP29nystik_u:4975: sa cātivyāpakatayā avyāpakatayā ca na lakṣaṇam, vṛkṣādiṣu bhāvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4980: na ca vyāpāramātraṃ ceṣṭā abhimatā, api tu viśiṣṭo vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4982: yadyapi ca dārūyantrādiṣur idṛśo vyāpāro 'sti, tathāpi mūrtāntarāprayoge satīti viśeṣaṇāt na vyabhicāraḥ, teṣāṃ śarīreṇa mūrtena prayogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4985: pāṭite pāṣāṇe tādṛśasya tadvyāpārasya darśanāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4992: yadyapi gandhādayo viṣayā na svarūpeṇa śarīramāśrayante tathāpi yadeṣāṃ sukhādyupalambhahetutvaṃ kāryaṃ prayojanaṃ tadarthamāśrayante ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5000: atra prathame pakṣe ceṣṭāśabdo vyāpāraviśeṣe spandādivanmukhyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5001: tadetat---lokastāvadityādinā tathā cāyaṃ ceṣṭāśabda ityantena darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5005: sā ca na kriyāmātra ityanena darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:5007: evaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa svamatena ca pratyekaṃ ceṣṭāśrayatvādi śarīrasya lakṣaṇamiti varṇayitvā samastamevedaṃ śarīralakṣaṇamiti ye
GSP29nystik_u:5009: yadyādyaṃ padaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ceṣṭāśraya iti, tadā ghaṭena vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5011: tathāpi tenaiva ghaṭādinā vyabhicāraḥ, prāpyakāritvenendriyāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāmapi indriyasaṃyogitvāt
GSP29nystik_u:5014: atha samavāyābhiprāyeṇāśrayatvam, tathāpi na samavāya indriyāṇāṃ śarīre /
GSP29nystik_u:5015: ghrāṇasya pārthivatvena samavāyo na viruddha iti cet---na, tasya śarīrāvayavasamavāyitvena śarīrāsamavāyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5016: yadi nāsikāgrameva ghrāṇam, atha tadādhāramatīndriyam, tathāpi na tatsamavetaṃ śarīram,
GSP29nystik_u:5018: api ca yadā ceṣṭendriyārthasya samavāyena śarīratvam, hanta bho indriyasamavāyikāraṇeṣu paramāṇuṣu samastam etadastīti teṣāmapi śarīratvaprasaṅga ityāha---samasteti /
GSP29nystik_u:5020: bhavanmate 'pi cukṣurādibhirindriyairvyabhicāraḥ, teṣāmapi yathoktavyāpārādhāratvādityata āha---yathā tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:5022: cakṣurādayastu unmīlanānmūrtena śarīreṇa prayujyante iti na prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5023: śrotraṃ tu ceṣṭādhāra eva na bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5027: na ca viśeṣalakṣaṇamakṛte sāmānyalakṣaṇe śakyamiti bhāṣyakāraḥ prathamamindriyāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5028: anena yaccharīrasaṃyuktaṃ satkārakadoṣavyatiriktaṃ sākṣātpratītisādhanaṃ tadindriyamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5030: pāramparyeṇa ca bhogasādhanatvaṃ ghrāṇādīnām sākṣānmanasa eva
GSP29nystik_u:5041: jñātaṃ coddiśyate, ajñātaṃ ca vidhīyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5049: atra ca ghrāṇādiśabdāḥ paṅkajādipadavadavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya kvacit,
GSP29nystik_u:5050: kvacit sāmānyaviśeṣe vartante, avayavārthasaṃbandhasya pratīyamānasyāsati bādhake parityāgāyogāt
GSP29nystik_u:5057: na ca sannikarṣeṇa gandhopalabdhisādhanena ca vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5059: tadanena jighratītyādi svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇāni ityantaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:5062: tasyāpi tvaksthāne indriye sparśopalabdhisādhane eva upacāra iti //
GSP29nystik_u:5063: bhūtebhya iti sūtrāvayavatātparyavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ bhūtebhya itīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5067: uttaram---bhūtaguṇaviśeṣagrahaṇasādhanatvam ghrāṇenaiva hi pṛthivyā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandhaḥ sa gṛhyate, na rasanādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:5068: evaṃ rasanenaivāpāṃ yo mādhuryaṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ sa gṛhyate, na ghrāṇādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:5071: evaṃ śrotreṇaiva śabdo nabhasa iti hi niyamaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5072: atra ca prayogaḥ, gandhopalabdhiḥ karaṇasādhyā kriyātvāt chidikriyāvaditi
GSP29nystik_u:5075: yā yatkriyākaraṇānvayatirekānanuvidhāne sati kāryā, sa sarvā takriyākaraṇātiriktakaraṇaniṣpādyā, yathā paṭādikriyā ghaṭadikriyākaraṇacakradaṇḍādyatiriktavemādikaraṇaniṣpādyā /
GSP29nystik_u:5080: tacca pārthivam, dravyatve sati rūpādiṣu madhye gandhasyaiva vya/jakatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5083: tadidamuktam---yajjātīyamindriyaṃ pārthivaṃ pārthasīyaṃ vā bhavati, tasya pṛthivyāḥ pāthaso vā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandho vā madhura eva vā rasabhedaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5084: tena hi pṛthivī abādibhyaḥ, āpo vā pṛthivyādibhyo vyavacchidyante iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5086: na caive rasanā apāmiva pṛthivyā api rasabhedaṃ gṛhṇātīti pārthivī bhavati
GSP29nystik_u:5088: tena tenaivendriyeṇeti niyamo guṇaviśeṣamavadhārayati, na tvindriyamimi /
GSP29nystik_u:5089: atra ca karṇaśaṣkulīsaṃyogopādhinā śrotrasya nabhasaḥ kathañcid bhedaṃ vivakṣitvā bhūtebhya iti pa/yamyartho vyākhyeyaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5090: anena khalvāhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi iti yadāhuḥ sāṃkhyāḥ, tat nirākṛtam /
GSP29nystik_u:5100: yadyapyauṣṇyaṃ nimittaṃ sādhāraṇam, tathāpi gandhādyutpattau pūrvagandhādidhvaṃsānāṃ nimittānāṃ bhedādutpannaṃ bhedādutpannaṃ kāryanānātvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5101: tadidamuktaṃ ye pūrve rūpādayaḥ teṣāṃ svagato viśeṣaḥ pradhvaṃsa ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5102: atha rūpatvādisāmānyameva kasmāt svagato viśeṣo na bhavatītyata āha---evaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5105: pradhvaṃsānāṃ tu stokabhūyastvaṃ niḥśeṣatve nopadyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5121: mithyājñānaviṣayīkṛtānāṃ tu saṃsāranimittatā, ta ime ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5126: etāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryavasite suhṛdbhāvena pravibhāgābhidhānaṃ pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5129: pṛthivyādīnāmiti bhāṣyaṃ na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsajñāpanārtham, api tvarthābhidhānamātram /
GSP29nystik_u:5131: yathākramaṃ pṛthivyādiṣvanilānteṣu gandhādayaḥ sparśāntāḥ catustridvyekaniyamena viniyuktāḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5134: yena krameṇa ghrāṇādaya indriyasūtre paṭhitāḥ yena ceha gandhādaya,
GSP29nystik_u:5136: atra vārttikakāraḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ityatrānekasamāsapratibhāsanāt saṃśayaṃ kṛtvā dvandvasamāsamavadhārayati---pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5138: nanu kaṇṭhekāla itivad vaiyadhikaraṇyena bahuvrīhirbhaviṣyati pṛthivyādīnāṃ guṇā yebhyo gandhādibhyaḥ, te tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:5139: tathā hi paramāṇugatā gandhādayo 'vayavini gandhādyārabhante, nabhogataśca śabdo nabhasi samānajātīyaṃ śabdamityata āha---na cānyatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:5142: na ca gandhādīnāṃ pṛthivyādiguṇahetutvapratipādanaṃ kvacit nirvedādāvupayujyata iti bhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5147: yadyādiśabdena vāyvādayo gṛhyeran, tadarthā iti lakṣaṇamavyāpakaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5149: guṇagrahaṇena sarva iti āśritānāśritatvābhiprāyam, guṇaśabdasya dharmavacanatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5156: tatretyaniyateṣu madhye, pṛthivyaptejāṃsi dvīndriyagrāhyāṇi, śeṣaśca guṇarāśiḥ saṃkhyādirviśeṣānto dvīndriyāgrāhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5160: svasaṃvedanena vā mānasena vā jñānena rūpāddhālambanaḥ, pratyayo rūpādiviśiṣṭo yathānubhūyate, evaṃ rūpādyatiriktaghaṭādiviśiṣṭo 'nubhūyata
GSP29nystik_u:5165: rūpādiparamāṇava eva tena tenākāreṇa utpannā ekayodakāharaṇakriyayā vyavacchinnā ghaṭa ityucyante
GSP29nystik_u:5167: yathāha ghaṭa ityapi ca rūpādaya evaikārthakriyākāriṇastathā vyapadiśyante iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5169: tathārthasya yathāpadārthena nityābhisambandhāt yathā ghaṭaḥ, tathā sanniviṣṭā rūpādaya ityartho gamyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5173: na tāvad rūpādikṣaṇa eko ghaṭaḥ, kṣaṇāntare tatprayogābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5176: yathāsaṃsthānāṃ rūpādayo 'rthā anubhūyante, tathā sanniviṣṭebhyo ghaṭādipratyayā ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5187: yastu bhinnalokamaryādatayā brūte ādimān mithyāpratyayaḥ samyagjñānaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5201: rūparasagandhasparśā iti catvāri dravyāṇi, pṛthivyaptejovāyava iti catvāri
GSP29nystik_u:5208: mā bhūvan vastutaḥ, ubhaye 'pi sāṃvṛtā bhaviṣyantītyata āha---saṃhanyamānasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5209: yo hi yattantraḥ sa tadabhāvamabhyupagamyāśakyābhyupagamaḥ, na khalu saṃyujyamānānāmabhāve saṃyogaḥ śakyābhyupagama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5210: na ca saṃvṛtiḥ, sā hi pararūpaṃ svarūpeṇa saṃvṛṇoti, saṃhanyamānābhāve ca na saṃghātaḥ, nāpi saṃhanyamānā iti kimanayā svarūpeṇāvriyeteti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5211: tadevaṃ tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvād ityasya vyāghātadoṣaṃ darśayitvā svasāmarthyālocane na vivakṣitaliṅgābhidhāyitā, kiṃ tvasaṃbaddhārthatā hetuvacanasyetyāha---tadagrahe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5212: evaṃ kilātrābhimatam, pṛthivyādayo rūpādibhyo 'bhinnā, rūpādyagrahe pṛthivyādibuddhyabhāvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:5213: tannṛ tadettatadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvādityanena na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nystik_u:5214: tadagraha ityatra tacchabdaḥ pradhānaparāmarśī , pṛthivyādayaśca dharmitayā pradhānamiti ta eva parāmarṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5216: tathā ca pratijñātasteṣāṃ rūpādyabhedo na sidhyedityasaṃbaddham /
GSP29nystik_u:5217: atha rūpādayaḥ pakṣīkriyante, tathāpi rūpādyagrahe rūpādibuddhyayabhāvāditi syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5219: evaṃ śabdāntareṇāpi pratijñāprayoge tulyaḥ prasaṅga ityāha---evaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5231: bahutvasaṃkhyāmāha, samānārthānāmapi prakṛtīnāṃ rūpabhedena tatparasya pratyayasya sāmarthyabhedāt
GSP29nystik_u:5234: āpa iti na toyagatām, api tu tatsaṃbaddhagatām /
GSP29nystik_u:5236: tadgatarūpādayo vā bahava ityekasyāmapi pāthaḥkaṇikāyāṃ bahuvacanopapattirāpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5237: na ca sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi lokasyāvinivṛtternaivamiti sāmpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:5238: loko hi dṛṣṭavyavahāramātraprayojano na vivecayati, parīkṣakāstu tadanusāriṇo vivecayantyeva
GSP29nystik_u:5247: na ca nīlasya sphaṭikalakṣaṇasyotpattiriti tṛtīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5250: utpannapākajānāṃ taile sartiṣi vā bhṛṣṭamāṃsapiṇḍāvayavānām, dravyāntareṇa toyena saṃpṛktānāṃ pākajotpattau satyām /
GSP29nystik_u:5253: sa ca saṃyogabheda eva toyamāṃsayoḥ, na tvavayavī vijātīyayoranāmbhakatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:5254: nāpi yūṣajātīyaṃ toyasaṃyogi dravyaṃ kṣīrajātīyamiveti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5256: iha tu kāṭhinye na yūṣabuddhivyapadeśāviti saṃyogabheda eva toyamāṃsayoryūṣa iti nyāyyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5261: na ca parakīya sādhanadoṣodabhāvanamātrāt svapakṣasiddhiriti siddhāntinaṃ sādhanaṃ pṛcchati---atha rūpādibhyo 'rthāntare dravye kiṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5262: yato 'yaṃ paro rūpādibhyo 'rthāntaraṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣeṇa vidvānapi
GSP29nystik_u:5265: asti hi sarveṣāmeva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ brāhyaṇasya kamaṇḍaluritivat candanasya rūpādaya iti vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5267: anyathā tadbuddhyabhāvādityetāvanmātre vaktavye kathamāha tadagraha iti?
GSP29nystik_u:5273: so 'yaṃ candano vivādagocarebhyo rūpādibhyo bhinnaḥ, svayamupalabhyasya ca samastairūpalabhyairvyapadiśyamānatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:5276: pradhānaṃ tu kālpanikaṃ nopalabhyam, tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5279: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ parasparabhinnānāmanyonyaṃ vyapadeśyavyapadeśakabhāva upapatsyata ityuktam---samastairiti
GSP29nystik_u:5281: upalabhyasyopalabhyeneti vaktavye pratyakṣsya pratyakṣeṇeti vacanaṃ rūpāvagamasamaye 'numeyebhyo rasādibhya ekāntato vyapadeśaṃ vyāvartayitum,
GSP29nystik_u:5285: vidhīyamānaṃ pratiṣidhyamānamiti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ niṣedhasya vidhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā niṣedhyamekatvam aṅgīkāryam, tacca saṃkhyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5286: nanu santvamī pratyayāḥ, te tu dravyamātranibandhanā bhaviṣyanti, kṛtaṃ saṃkhyetyata āha---viśiṣṭāśceti
GSP29nystik_u:5292: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti itivad ghaṭādiviṣayanimittavyatirekabhāja ityatrāpi pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5297: sā yeṣāmasti te gajavājipadātiprabhūtayaḥ sthāninaḥ pratyekaṃ mahāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5298: tatra te kvacicchatameva, kvacit punaḥ svajātīyasthānyaṅgāntarasannidhāne
GSP29nystik_u:5301: na caitāvatā yatra śataṃ gajādayaḥ yatra ca sahasraṃ tayoḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5307: mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvābhāvāt na parvasu khadiraśca sthāṇuśca samavetau /
GSP29nystik_u:5309: yasya dravyasya yāvān saṃyogapracayo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ sa tāvānutpannamātra eva tajjanakaḥ, tasya kṣepāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5310: tasmāt parvaṇāṃ saṃsthānaviśeṣa eva sthāṇuriti gamayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5311: athāvasthitasaṃyogānāṃ dravyavināśāpekṣāṇāṃ janakatvam, tataḥ saṃyogapracayapadena sthaṇutvasāmānyaviśeṣavad dravyamupalakṣaṇīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5313: pratimāyā mahārajatamayyā avayavinyāḥ śarīraṃ saṃsthānameva, evaṃ śilāputrakasya avayavinaḥ saṃsthānameva śarīram /
GSP29nystik_u:5321: śaṅkate---grāhyābhāvāditi cet? grāhyābhāve satyagrahaṇāditi hetuḥ, na tvagrahaṇamātramityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5327: nirākaroti---na pramāṇābhāvamātrād vyatirekapratiṣedhaḥ, yastu yogyapramāṇābhāvāditi viśeṣayet taṃ pratyāha---yaśca tadagraha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5336: ātmādīnāṃ buddhihetūnāṃ lakṣaṇasyānantaraṃ hetumatī buddhirlakṣaṇīyetyāha vārttikakāraḥ---atha buddheravasaraprāptāyā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5337: lakṣaṇaṃ tāvat prakṛtatvādapadeṣṭavyameva, tadapadeśadvāreṇānyadapi kiñcit sūcanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5341: ivakāreṇa nedaṃ pratyākhyānaparam, api tu lakṣaṇaparādayamapyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5346: paryāyaśabdāśca saṃketamātrādhīnapravṛttayaḥ kva nāma na sambhavanti?
GSP29nystik_u:5350: saṃketo hi dvedhā, sarvajanīno yathā gauriti gojātīyasya vāyakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5361: tena yo 'sau nīlākāraḥ pariṇāmo buddheḥ, sa jñānalakṣaṇā vṛttirityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5362: ātmapratibimbasya tu buddhisaṃkrāntasya yo buddhyākāranīlasambandhaḥ, sa ātmano vyāpāra ivārthopalabdhirātmano vṛttirityākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5363: tadidaṃ buddhitattvaṃ jaḍaprakṛtitayā indumaṇḍalam iva svayamaprakāśaṃ caitanyamārtaṇḍamaṇḍalacchāyāpattyā prakāśate, prakāśayati cārthāniti /
GSP29nystik_u:5371: sā ca na tāvad buddheḥ, tasyā acaitanyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5373: tasmāt kṛpaṇadhanamivātmacaitanyaṃ na svaparopakārīti buddheḥ svābhāvikaṃ caitanyamāstheyam
GSP29nystik_u:5376: atha dvayoścetanayorekā vṛttirbhedāgraho vā, tenaikakartṛkatvābhimāna ityata āha---buddhivṛttyaviśiṣṭāyāmiti
GSP29nystik_u:5379: gandhādiviṣayatayā sukhaduḥkhaviṣayatayā ceyaṃ buddhirbhāvyamānā nirvedāya kalpata iti //15
GSP29nystik_u:5381: bhāṣyakāraḥ kramaprāptaṃ manolakṣaṇasūtramavatārayan utsūtramanyānyapi lakṣaṇāni āha---smṛtītyādi
GSP29nystik_u:5388: tathāpi ākāśādīnāmapi manastvaṃ māṃ bhūdityata uktam---sahakārīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5393: atra ca ya ātmano viśeṣaguṇāste sarve indriyajanmāno yathā gandhādipratyayāḥ, tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ smṛtyādayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5395: evaṃ ca saṃskārādiṣu na karaṇatvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5400: bubhutsākramaṃ gṛhītvā siddhānte 'pi manaḥparityāgo mā bhūditi bhiyā
GSP29nystik_u:5402: na hi kiñcitkaraṇaṃ sambaddhamapi saditi syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5403: yadyevaṃ dhārāvāhikajñānotvattirna syāt, dvitīyādijñāneṣvapi saiva sāmagrīti sakṛdeva yāvat kartavayakaraṇāt samarthasya kṣepāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5404: kṣepayoge vā paścādapi na janayet, aviśeṣāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5405: na ca karturapyayaṃ kramakāritādharmaḥ sa hyanekakaraṇādhiṣṭhānena yugapannānākāryāṇi karoti
GSP29nystik_u:5406: yathā yugapanmāṇavako gacchati, paṭhati, panthānaṃ vīkṣate, vahati cācāryasya kamaṇḍalumiti
GSP29nystik_u:5408: tadidamapimanaḥ smṛtyādisādhanatayā bhāvyamānaṃ nirvedāya kalpata iti
GSP29nystik_u:5412: na cāpratipādite manasi śakyā darśayitumiti manaso 'nantaratvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5416: tatra yā jñānotpādadvāreṇa puṇyapāpahetuḥ sā vākpravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5418: tena manasā iṣṭadevatādyanucintanaṃ cakṣurādibhiśca sādhvasādhudarśanādi sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5422: na ceyaṃ kṣaṇikā satī āmuṣmikaṃ janma sādhayitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5427: prava---ṣāḥ //18// rāgadveṣau mohaprabhavau puruṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ pravartayataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5430: tāvaddhi ayaṃ rāgādivaśaḥ spandate, yāvadasya moho vartate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5434: na pratyātmavedanīyeṣu samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛtteṣu sphuṭatareṣu tad yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5440: sā ca pravṛttyā kāryeṇa lakṣyata iti karmalakṣaṇā ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5441: yataḥ karmaṇā pravṛttyā pravartakarāgādiyuktāḥ puruṣā lakṣyante, ato rāgādīnāṃ pravartanāvatvattmapi lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5443: svarūpamātraṃ rāgādīnāmuktaṃ bhavati, na tu pravartanāvatvamapi
GSP29nystik_u:5445: tadetat sarvaṃ vārttikakāraḥ praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe---kā punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5447: sā punariyaṃ pravartanā pravartakānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP29nystik_u:5448: doṣā hi gamyante, na tu teṣāṃ pravṛttihetutvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5451: mauhaikārthasamavāyo hi rāgādīnāṃ mānasa pratyakṣavedanīya ityarthaḥ //18
GSP29nystik_u:5455: nanvātmano notpattiḥ saṃbhavati nityatvādityata āha bhāṣyakāraḥ---utpannasya saṃbaddhasyeti
GSP29nystik_u:5464: yadyapi śarīrendriyabuddhisukhaduḥkhopabhogātiriktaṃ gauṇamukhyaphalaṃ bhinnaṃ nāsti, te ca yathāyogaṃ pūrvaṃ lakṣitāḥ, tenāpi ca rūpeṇa te
GSP29nystik_u:5468: atra ca pravṛttijanita iti vaktavye doṣagrahaṇaṃ na kevalaṃ pravṛtti prati doṣāṇāṃ hetubhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5469: api tu pravṛttikārye sūkhaduḥkhe api prati iti darśanārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:5472: na cāsti sambhavo na tatra tṛṣyati tacca tasya sukham, na ca tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti
GSP29nystik_u:5476: avasānamātramasti, na tu paritaḥ punarapi sargahānopādānayorbhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5479: nānukte śarīrādau teṣāṃ duḥkhatvaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitumiti tallakṣaṇebhyaḥ paramidanduḥkhalakṣaṇam
GSP29nystik_u:5480: bādha---kham //21// atra ca bādhaneti bādhanāviṣayāṃ buddhimupalakṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5481: tena bādhanā ca tadanuṣaṅgiṇaśca śarīrādayo gauṇamukhyabhāvena lakṣitā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:5482: saiva hi bādhanā buddhirduḥkhe mukhyā, śarīrādau gauṇīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5483: alamebhiriti pratyayo nirvedaḥ, vaśitayā yoginaḥ svayamupalabhante
GSP29nystik_u:5489: kecid viraktaṃmānyā mānyante na sukhaṃ nāmāsti svarūpata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5494: tathāpyadhikādhikotkarṣaphalānāṃ darśapaurṇamāsādīnāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaraparyantānāṃ vidhāyakebhyo vacanebhyo bhāvaphala eva dharmo gamyate bhāvasyaibotkarṣaśālitvāditi //21 //
GSP29nystik_u:5499: mukhyameva duḥkhamiti bhramo mā bhūdata āha---janmaneti /
GSP29nystik_u:5500: anena jāyamānā duḥkhaśabdena sarve śarīrādaya ucyanate ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5503: ye tu brahmaiva nāmarūpaprapañcātmanā pariṇamata ityāhuḥ, tān
GSP29nystik_u:5505: sarvātmanā vā pariṇāma, ekadeśena vā? pūrvasmin kalpe sarvātmanā brahmaṇo
GSP29nystik_u:5507: ekadeśapariṇāme tu sāvayavatvāt ghaṭadivadanityatvaprasaṅgaḥ iti sūktam---ajaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5515: vijñānamānandaṃ brahma iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaśruteḥ brahmasvabhāvaṃ sukham, tayā ca brahmaṇo
GSP29nystik_u:5517: ātmana iti ca ṣaṣṭhī rāhoḥ śira itivat mantavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:5521: athātmani duḥkhādikaṃ nityaṃ necchati, tatrāha---anaikāntikatā vā /
GSP29nystik_u:5526: evaṃ vijñānamapyātmaguṇaḥ,na hyudayavyayavatībhyo vijñānavyaktibhyo 'nudayavyayadharmā bhavitumarhatyabhinna ātmā /
GSP29nystik_u:5527: na cātmaiva vijñānasvabhāvaḥ tattadviṣayopadhānenodayavyayadharmeva bhavatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:5528: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti mānasyāṃ buddhau trayāṇāmapi jñānajñeyajñātaṇāṃ bhedenānuvyavasāyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5530: na caitadasati bādhake bhedajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5534: na ca tadā viṣayaśūnyaṃ svaniṣṭhamātmacaitanyamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5537: na ca kiñcidapi sava prakāśamastīti caturthe vijñāna vādaṃ nirākurvan vakṣyati //
GSP29nystik_u:5538: tadevaṃ vyavasthite dūṣaṇa bhāṣyavārttikoktaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ yathāyamātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5539: saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ tāvadayamātmamanaḥsaṃyogo dharmaṃ nimittamapekṣamāṇaḥ sukhajñānam ākārṣīt
GSP29nystik_u:5540: yadi tu muktyavasthāyāṃ tadanapekṣa eva sukhajñānaṃ karoti, hanta rūpādijñāneṣu indriyāntarāṇyapi nāpekṣeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5542: na vayaṃ viṣayamātrāpekṣāṃ brūmo yena rūpādiṣvapi jñānamutpādayet, api tu saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ yat sukhajñānāyānenāpekṣitaṃ tadapekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:5543: dharmaśca tadā tenāpekṣita iti muktyavasthāyāmapi dharmamevāpekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:5545: tathā ca na rūpādivijñāna prasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5548: nanu tvanmate yathā sukhasaṃvedanaṃ jihāsitam, evamasmanmate 'pi
GSP29nystik_u:5549: sukhasaṃvedanahānāya ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha---na cāyaṃ sukhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5550: asmanmate hi duḥkhahānāyaiva tadanuṣaktaṃ sukhaṃ jihāsitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5551: nityaṃ tu sukhaṃ sarvaduḥkhavinirmuktaṃ sanna duḥkhahānāya jihāsitaṃ saṃbhavati ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5552: na kevalamānukūlyāt pratibandhakatvaṃ nāsti śarīrādīnām, pratyuta muktyavasthāyāmapi kalpanīyatā ityāha---nityaṃ śarīrādi iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5564: tasmāt nityānanda eva mokṣa ityata āha---yadi punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5567: tau ca vītarāgeṇāsaktena satā śakyau bhogena kṣetum, na tu śaktane /
GSP29nystik_u:5568: sa hi saktasteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu upāttamupāttaṃ bhu/jānaḥ tyaktaṃ tyaktaṃ copādadānaḥ saṃsārāt na mucyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:5571: anyathā tu nityasukhāvadhāraṇalāliteyaṃ tṛṣṇāpiśācī labdhaprasarā viṣayasukheṣvapi pratyāsanneṣu purūṣaṃ pravartayantī mokṣamasya sūdūraṃ pratikṣipediti manāgapi prasaro 'syā na dātavyaḥ tasmāt nityānandapratipādakaśrutirātyantike duḥkhaviyoge bhāktīti yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5574: tasya ca tvayā prasaro datta iti tulayo doṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5576: yathā nityasukhopādānaṃ mokṣam apratikūlayā saktyā sapratikūlaṃ naivamātyantikaduḥkhahānaṃ duḥkhadveṣānuṣaktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5580: alaṃ pratyayo hi sa ityapratikūlaṃ duḥkhahānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5581: tadanena nityaṃ sukhamātmano mokṣe 'bhivyajyate ityādi tasmin prahīṇe
GSP29nystik_u:5582: nāsya nityasukharāgaḥ pratikūlo bhavatītyevamantaṃ bhāṣyajātaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5584: evaṃ vairāgyeṇa mokṣamāṇasya pravṛtto satyām, muktasya yadi nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu mā vā bhūt, ubhayorapi pakṣayoḥ vītarāgasya
GSP29nystik_u:5585: pravṛttau na mokṣādhigamo vikalpyate, na sandigdho bhavatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5589: na cātmani nitye rāgādayaḥ saṃsāraṃ kartumutsahante, nityasyāvikāryatvena tādavasthyādupaneyāpaneyābhāvāt
GSP29nystik_u:5594: cittaṃ tu kāryaṃ rāgādivaśāt saṃsārī, tadviyogācca mucyate iti
GSP29nystik_u:5604: nivṛttiśceyameva tasyā yat tatsantānavartinaścetaso 'nāgatasyānutpāda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5606: utpannasyānutpādo na śakyaḥ, nāpi santānanivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum,
GSP29nystik_u:5608: sa hi antyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kiñcidārabhate na vā? ārambhe nāntya iti na
GSP29nystik_u:5609: kāryakāraṇapravāhanivṛttiḥ, pravāhaśca santāna iti na santānanivṛttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5611: tataḥ pūrve sarve 'pi kṣaṇā asantaḥ syuriti kasyoccheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5619: yathā cākṣaṇikasyopakāryatvaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge upapādayiṣyata iti saddhim //22 //
GSP29nystik_u:5627: tarhi tadānīmuddeśasamaye, kramavataḥ saṃśayasya prameyānantaramuddiṣṭasya, prameyalakṣaṇānantaraṃ sthānaṃ kramo
GSP29nystik_u:5633: atra ca vimarśaḥ saṃśaya iti saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5634: tatra saṃśaya iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ, vimarśa iti lakṣaṇapadam /
GSP29nystik_u:5635: ekasmin dharmiṇi virodhinānārthāvamarśo vimarśaḥ, kiṃ sviditi jñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5636: tadanenāsamānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyaḥ samānajātīyebhyaśca viparyayādibhyaḥ saṃśayo nivartito bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5639: atra viśiṣṭo 'vamarśo vimarśaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃśaya iti lakṣyapadam /
GSP29nystik_u:5642: trividha eveti ye pañcavidhamācakṣate te nirākṛtāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5643: tadanavadhāraṇajñānaṃ sa saṃśaya iti saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5649: jñānatvaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ saṃśayādiṣvapyastīti na virodha iti //
GSP29nystik_u:5653: mā kārṣīd dravye saṃśayam, guṇa eva kasmāt na karotīti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5658: mahatvadīrghatvasāmānyadharmayogastu sannapi na saṃśayakāraṇam, asādṛśye tadyoge 'pi saṃśayābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5661: na ca sadṛśo dharmaḥ sattāmātreṇa saṃśaye hetuḥ, api tūpalabdhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5667: asmadāyatte hi śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5670: apekṣāśabdaśca yadyapīcchāyāṃ vartate, tathāpīha jighṛkṣāyāṃ vākyasāmarthyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5671: na ca sā saṃśayasya hetuḥ, tasyāḥ saṃśaye sati bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5672: tasmād viśeṣāpekṣayā vighṛkṣālakṣaṇayeha viśeṣayoḥ purovartivastusādṛśyāt smaraṇe satyagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇīyam, yathā gaṅgāśabdastīraṃ saṃbaddhameva
GSP29nystik_u:5678: tathā ca vinigamanāyāṃ ko heturityata āha---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5679: nanvabhāvaḥ pramāṇālambanamuktaḥ, tat kuto na virodha ityata uktam---svatantramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5683: yathā ca dhūmo na sattāmātreṇa hetustathoktaṃ prāgiti //
GSP29nystik_u:5685: te kila manyante vyavacchedaheturapi dharmaḥ samāno bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5686: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi śabde dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi ca ghaṭādau samānam, na cāsau nityānityatvasaṃśayahetuḥ, api tvanityatvasyāyogaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi vyavacchinatti /
GSP29nystik_u:5699: pramāṇam, taddhi purūṣa evāyaṃ vā, idantayā vyavatiṣṭhate, idantāniṣedhena vā /
GSP29nystik_u:5707: viśiṣyate hyanena purūṣaḥ sthāṇoriti anupalabdhasāmānyasyāpi kvacidupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāstīti
GSP29nystik_u:5708: yathā saptame rase, daśame vā dravye /
GSP29nystik_u:5709: na hi tatra sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vāsti pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5712: tad yathā hastinaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsaṃbandhino sthūṇāhastipakau smarati na ca tatra saṃndigdhe //
GSP29nystik_u:5714: naudolārūḍho hi gacchan vidūre ārohapariṇāvadvastudarśane 'pi satyapi ca sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve viśeṣasmṛtyamāvāt naga iti vā nāga iti vā na
GSP29nystik_u:5719: asti hi tadā viśeṣasmṛtiḥ sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvaśca, no khalvanupalabhyamāne samānadharme dharmiṇi tadgatā vakrakoṭarādayo vā śiraḥ pāṇyādayo vā śakyagrahā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5726: asti ca karitarurūpaviśeṣasmṛtiḥ, na tu sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāva iti na saṃśete /
GSP29nystik_u:5732: viśeṣaṃ bubhutsamāna iti viśeṣāpekṣa ityasya vivaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5735: saṃśayottarakālā bubhutseti, kathaṃ bubhutsamānaḥ saṃśeta ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā, samānamanayoriti
GSP29nystik_u:5737: seyaṃ sādhakabādhakapramāṇānupapattau satyā samānadharmopalabdhirvinaśyadavasthā viśeṣasmṛtyā sahāvinaśyadavasthā ekasmin kṣaṇe satī saṃśayajñānasya heturiti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:5741: anekadharmopapatterityatra bhāṣyakṛto vyākhyāṃ grahītum ekadeśivyākhyānamupanyasya dūṣayati---aneketi
GSP29nystik_u:5743: saṃyogajatvaṃ hi kārye dravye guṇe ca rūpādau śarīrādikriyāyāṃ cāstīti dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5746: triṣu, saṃyogajatvaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ sattvādinā nirbhaksya, nirguṇatvaṃ guṇakarmaṇāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5756: tadanena samānajātīyam asamānajātīyaṃ cānekamiti bhāṣyaṃ tasmād viśeṣa ityadhyāhṛtya vyākhyātam
GSP29nystik_u:5765: tadevaṃ lakṣaṇābījadvayopanyāsena asādhāraṇo dharma iti grahaṇakavākyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:5767: ekaṃ cāneka ca tadubhayamanekaṃ tasyānekasya pratyayaheturdharmo
GSP29nystik_u:5771: tadidamāha---yato vibhāgajatvāt eṣa pratyayo bhavatīdaṃ vibhāgajaṃ śabdajātam ekam /
GSP29nystik_u:5773: tatra ya eva ekapratyayahetuḥ dharmo 'bhedaḥ sa eva anekapratyayaheturviśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5774: jātyabhiprāyaṃ caikavacanam, sadādirhi dharmo duvyaguṇakarmaṇāmabhedapratyayahetuḥ, sāmānyādibhyaśca śabdaṃ nirbhajati /
GSP29nystik_u:5775: tadidamāha---yataḥ sadādereṣa pratyayo bhavatīdamekaṃ yataśca vibhāgajatvādepa pratyayo bhavatīdamanekamiti, tasmāt siddhamekaṃ cānekaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5784: yad yena sahacaritaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat kkacid dṛśyamānaṃ tat smārayat tadviyaruddhenāpi ca saṃbandhānaniścāyayat saṃśayaheturbhavati, yathā samāno dharmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5785: asādhāraṇastu dharmo vibhāgajatvaṃ narte śabdāt kkacit pṛthivyādau vā utkṣepaṇādau vā gandhādau vā dṛṣṭa iti kathra smārayet, asmārayad vā kathaṃ tatra saṃśayaṃ janayet? tasmāt ko 'yaṃ bhavedityayo dharmāditi jijñāsāmātramutpādayet na tvayaṃ vāyaṃ veti saṃśayamityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5789: nanvata evoktaṃ na saṃśayaheturityataḥ āha---vibhāgajatvaṃ saṃśarye karoti sarvato vyāvṛtteriti
GSP29nystik_u:5790: ayamarthaḥ, yadyapi vibhāgajatvaṃ na dravyādau kvacid dṛṣṭam, tathāpi tadvyatirekaḥ pratyekaṃ dravyādau dṛṣṭa iti vibhāgajatvena sadādyaviśeṣavān śabdo dravyakarmabhyā vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ guṇaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5791: guṇakarmabhyāṃ vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ dravyam, guṇadravyābhyāṃ vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ karmeti vyatirekamukhena tattat smārayan asādhāraṇo dharmo bhavati saṃśayakāraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5794: vaṃśe pāṭyamāne vaṃśadalayoḥ kriyā, tatastayormitho vibhāgaḥ, tato vaṃśadalāvaruddhanabhobhāgavibhāgaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5796: avayavakriyā hi tadavayavāvaruddhanabhobhāgavibhāgajanikā dravyārambhakasaṃyogāpratidvandvivibhāgajanakatvena vyāptā vikasatkamalakuṅmaladaleṣu dṛṣṭā /
GSP29nystik_u:5797: na hi tatra tatra mukulitād vikāsi kamalamanyat,
GSP29nystik_u:5800: tathā ca dravyaṃ kāryamapi na naśyet /
GSP29nystik_u:5806: anabhyupagamabījaṃ ca kutaḥ punarevadevamavagataṃ padmapatrāvayavakriyā vibhāgadvayajaniketi, vibhāgadvayakramakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāditi cet?
GSP29nystik_u:5810: athaṃ viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavatīti vaṃśadaladvayakriyaiva
GSP29nystik_u:5813: yadi tu padmapatrāvayavakriyā ubhayajanikā bhavet, vaṃśadalakriyaiva dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvinaṃ vibhāgaṃ janayediti /
GSP29nystik_u:5816: kriyāvailakṣaṇyāt tu svahetuvailakṣaṇyajanmanaḥ kāryasya vibhāgasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ syāt, yadeko dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvī apratidvandvī
GSP29nystik_u:5817: cetaraḥ, tathāpi caitadvailakṣaṇyaṃ kriyāyā abhyupetavyam yadekā vibhāgamekaṃ janayati
GSP29nystik_u:5821: śarīrataruvibhagāśca daśyate, tatrāṅgulitaruvibhāgamaṅgulyāśrayā kriyā karotu, hastataruvibhāgaṃ tu na śaktā janayitum, tasyāḥ svāśrayasamavāyāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5824: kāryaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā nimittīkarotīti vibhāgajavibhāgasiddhiṃ manyate, taṃ pratyāha---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5825: astu vā vibhāgajo vibhāgaḥ, tathāpi vibhāgajatvamīdṛśamasādhāraṇamevetyata āha---astu vā tasya abhyupagatavibhāgasya api vibhāgajatvamasādhāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:5827: pāṭyamāne hi vaṃśe śabdotpattau vaṃśadalayormitho vibhāgo nimittakāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5829: tathā hi prayogaḥ, yo 'yaṃ vaṃśadalavibhāganimittaḥ śabdaḥ, sa
GSP29nystik_u:5842: sa hi kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgapūrvako, na tu kāraṇamātravibhāgapūrvakaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5844: nanu sahacarito dṛṣṭaḥ smārayan viśeṣasaṃśayaheturbhavati, na tu yo
GSP29nystik_u:5849: yat khalu sadādirūpasaṃpannaṃ viśeṣavat tatsamānajātīyebhyo 'samānajātīyabhyaśca vyāvṛttam, yathā pṛthivīdravyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5850: abādibhyaśca dravyāntarebhyāṃ guṇakarmabhyaśca vijātīyebhyo gandhavattvena vyāvṛttaṃ dravyajātīyam
GSP29nystik_u:5853: tathāvidhaḥ śabdaḥ sadādirūpasaṃpanno vibhāgajatvena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo viśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5854: tasmād bhavati dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti saṃśaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5858: samānaṃ hi pratigogitayā asamānaṃ buddhau sannidhāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5859: tatra dvayasyāpi samānaśabdena śrutyarthābhyāmupāttasya samānasya dharmasyāsamānasya ca, samānasya saṃśayakāraṇatvenopayogāditi yojanā /
GSP29nystik_u:5861: asmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5865: sā ca lākṣaṇikānekapadādhīnā nāsamānapadāt labhyata iti prayojanavallākṣaṇikapadopādānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5866: lakṣaṇaiva ceyam anekasmādvyāvṛtto dharmo 'nekadharma iti vigraheṇa nirvarṇyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5875: sa cet saṃśayasya kāraṇam, hanta, samānadharmopapattireva sarvatra saṃśayakāraṇamiti kṛtam anekagrahaṇenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5884: hetuḥ1 anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi cāyamaparaḥ pañcarūpopapanno
GSP29nystik_u:5888: na cāyaṃ prativādinaḥ prayogo 'pi yuktaḥ iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5891: saṃśayasya hi viśeṣādarśanaṃ janakam, viśeṣadarśanaṃ ca nivartakamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5892: sa cet tvanmate nivartakādutpadyata, avyabhicārihetujanitādviśeṣadarśanāt nāsya nivṛttiḥ syādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5893: na ca yadā nivartakatvamasyāsti tadā janakamapītyāha---na hi viśeṣadarśane satīti //
GSP29nystik_u:5895: pratyakṣameva sa evāyaṃ gakāra ityevamākāraṃ pratyabhijñāsamājñātaṃ śabdasya sthemānamākalayat,
GSP29nystik_u:5897: iti nityatvaṃ paricchetsyatītyata āha---nāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5898: tadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ saṃśayasya nivartakaṃ yadananyathāsiddham,
GSP29nystik_u:5900: idaṃ tu sādṛśyenāpi saṃbhavāt svayaṃ sandigdhaṃ sanna saṃśayocchedāyālamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5901: mā bhūt pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ, bhavati tvāgamasya /
GSP29nystik_u:5905: tasmād yadyapi sākṣānnityo 'ham ityāgamo nābhidhatte, tathāpi viditasaṃgaterarthapratyayaṃ kurvannātmano nityatāmākṣipannityatāviṣayo bhavati /
