GSP29nystik_u:5908: yadyapi varṇavyaktayaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ, tathāpi svasvasāmānyaviśeṣagatvādyupahitā gavādivyaktaya iva gotvādyupadhānāḥ śakyasaṃketā iti na
GSP29nystik_u:5911: na khalu candramasaḥ parabhāge hariṇasadasadbhāvasandehaḥ śakyaḥ kadācidapyucchettumasmadādīnāmityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5913: sandigdhanityānityabhāve śabde kṛtakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nānityatvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddham
GSP29nystik_u:5918: yadi ca pañcarūpo 'pi hetuḥ, saṃśayakāraṇaṃ sarvamevānumānamiti sarvamapramāṇaṃ syādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5923: sautrāntikamate hi rūpaṃ sapratighamiṣyate mūrtaṃ ca, nitya eveti vā
GSP29nystik_u:5924: anitya eveti vā abhilāpo nopapadyeta, sthāṇureveti vā puruṣa eveti vā abhilāpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5930: yadi punarasatpratipakṣarūparahitayorekatra saṃbhavo 'ṅgīkriyate, tathā ca saṃśayahetutvamityabhiprāyeṇa śaṅkate---atha kṛtakatveti,
GSP29nystik_u:5934: tathā ca bahu vyāhataṃ bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati---yadā
GSP29nystik_u:5937: nanu kṛtakatvasya sādhyatvāt śrāvaṇatvasya ca siddhatvāt prathamabhāvinā nityatvānumānena siddhāṅgakenāpahṛtaviṣayaṃ caramabhāvisādhyaṅgakamanityatvānumānameva bādhyatām ityata āha---yatnaśca
GSP29nystik_u:5939: siddhamapi śravaṇatvamanumānasikatādyanityadharmasādhāraṇatayā savyabhicāraṃ sannityatvasya sādhanaṃ na bhavitumarhatoti /
GSP29nystik_u:5943: yadyapi viruddhā pratipattirjñānaṃ vipratipattiḥ, tathāpi tasyā vādiprativādigatāyā atyantaparokṣatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:5945: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ upalabdhyavyavasthāyā anupalabdhavyavasthāyāśca pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatvaṃ matvā samānadharmopapatterityanena gatārthatāṃ pariharannāha sma---purvaḥ samāno 'nekaścetyādi tadupanyasya vārttikakāro dūṣayati---tatreti /
GSP29nystik_u:5946: no khalu samānānekadharmopalabdhau satyām, satyāṃ ca viśeṣasmṛtau
GSP29nystik_u:5950: nanu yadi nāsita bhedaḥ, tat kimidānī sarveṣāṃ jñātṛsthatvāviśeṣaṇa trayāṇāmapi saṃśayakāraṇānāṃ samānānekavipratipattīnāmabhedaḥ, tathā ca pṛthagupādānavaiyarthyamityata āha---samānānekadharmayoriti punaścodayati---samānadharmaḥ sarva evāyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5952: asādhāraṇo hyadṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kvacidapi na saṃśayaṃ kartumutsahate, yat punarasādhāraṇavattvaṃ saṃśayahetutvenopavarṇitaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā tat samānameva, na tvasādhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5957: yacca vārttikakāreṇa sarvato vyāvṛttyā asādhāraṇasya saṃśayakāraṇatvamuktam, tatrāpi tadabhāvasya sādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutve
GSP29nystik_u:5964: sa ca sādhāraṇe niviśate iti sūktam sarva evāyaṃ samānadharma evābhidhīyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5966: na vayaṃ sarvatra sādhāraṇamapajānīmahe anvayavyatirekavyabhicāravaktṛgatatvabhedamātramādriyamāṇāḥ kāraṇabhedena trividhaṃ saṃśayamācakṣmahe ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5969: api caitayoḥ pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatve 'tiprasaṅgāt niścayapūrvaṃ na pravarteta lokaḥ, tathā ca lokavirodha iti
GSP29nystik_u:5972: na cānabhyāsadaśānne upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthayāṃ saṃśaya iti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:5973: anabhyāsadaśāpanne hi dūrād vahnijñāne upalabdhyavyavasthāyā api na nāgo vā nago veti saṃśerate, kiṃ tu kiṃśukakusumanicayo vā uṣarbudho veti,
GSP29nystik_u:5977: sāmagrībhedena bhede trevidhyaṃ saṃśayasya sāmagrīniveśikāraṇabhedena tu
GSP29nystik_u:5984: upalabdhapūrvāyāṃ vyaktau saṃśaye tadgatā viśeṣāḥ susmūrṣitāḥ tajjātīyavyaktyantarasaṃśaye tvanyagatāste sāmānyadvāreṇopalabdhā
GSP29nystik_u:5987: yathā sāmānyo 'yaṃ dharmaseturnṛpāṇām iti sāmānyaścāsau pratyakṣaśceti dharmī tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5993: bauddhānāṃ hi rāddhānte na rūpādidharmāśrayaḥ kaścidasti dharmī /
GSP29nystik_u:5995: yadi tvāha bhavatu rāddhāntavyākopo na hi śāstrāśrayo vāda iti, tatrāpi
GSP29nystik_u:6003: sāmānyaviśeṣatadvadabhyupagame 'pi tadvato 'śravaṇāt sādharmyasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti gamyeta, na ca sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti viruddhārthamabhidhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6008: tadevaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamekaṃ, trīṇi ca viśeṣalakṣaṇānīti sthitam //
GSP29nystik_u:6010: yadi tāvat saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇe sthite trīṇi viśeṣalakṣaṇāni tataḥ saṃśayatvenopagṛhītānāṃ trayāṇāṃ parasparavyavacchedakamātraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6014: tathā cānyānyapi saṃśayakāraṇāni santīti tānyapi vaktavyāni /
GSP29nystik_u:6015: yadā khalvayamātmanaḥ śamādau saṃśete, kimahaṃ candanavanitādisannidhāne rajye virajye veti, so 'yamasyātmanaḥ sannikarṣajanmā saṃśayaḥ āntarasya
GSP29nystik_u:6017: yadyapi tāvanmātreṇa samānajātīyavyavacchedasiddhiḥ, tathāpi vijātīyanirṇayādivyavacchedāya sāmānyalakṣaṇamanuvartanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6018: tathā ca pratipattigauravaṃ syāditi tallāghavāya śeṣāpekṣā yuktā /
GSP29nystik_u:6025: vipratipanno na śiṣyaḥ, kiṃ tu jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ śiṣyato nītvā sandigdha
GSP29nystik_u:6029: tatra mukhyaṃ sukhaduḥkhāpitaparihārau, gauṇaṃ tu tatsādhanam /
GSP29nystik_u:6033: na ca sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārau svarūpeṇa pravṛtti nivṛttigocarāviti tadupāyapravṛttyaiva cetanapravṛttigocarāviti darśayati---tadāptihānopāyamanutiṣṭhatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6035: yadyapi sukhaduḥkhāptihāne tadupāyāśca santi, tathāpi sāmānyena jñāyamānānīcchādyupahāramukhena pravṛttihetavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6036: nanu sūtre 'dhikṛtyetyasti, bhāṣye ca vyavasāyeti, tat kuto na virodha ityata āha---vyavasāyo 'rthasyādhikāra ityādi /
GSP29nystik_u:6051: yathā ca pramāṇasya pramāṇopapannatā na cānavasthā, tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6052: na ca prasiddhataratayā na prayojanaṃ lakṣaṇīyam iti yuktam, kathamasya prayuktau sādhanatvam, kva ca prayojayati, kathaṃ ca vyāpakamiti sarvasya parīkṣakapravedanīyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6058: yadapyuktaṃ nyāyasyāṅgaṃ prayojanaṃ na bhavati, tasmāt na vaktavyamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:6060: yā khalu niṣprayojaneti na brūmaḥ prayojanaṃ nyāyasyāṅgamityapi, mukhyaṃ prayojanameva hi tanna syād yadṛte puruṣādanyārthamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6061: prayojanavāṃstu nyāyo niṣprayojanāṃ tadgatāṃ cintāmaṅgī karoti,
GSP29nystik_u:6063: tasmādanaṅgamapi prayojanaṃ parīkṣāyā mūlaṃ svarga iva setikartavyatākasya yāgādyanuṣṭhānasyeti siddham //24 //
GSP29nystik_u:6064: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣadāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6065: kramaprāptaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ lakṣayati---lauki---ntaḥ//25// dṛṣṭānta iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ, śeṣaṃ lakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6072: tadviparītāḥ tadubhayaṃsapannāśca parīkṣakāḥ pratipādakā iti yāvat kathābahutvācca bahuvayanam
GSP29nystik_u:6079: lakṣitaśca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇalakṣaṇāya kalpate ghaṭate iti bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6086: na khalvasiddhaḥ sādhyena sādhanasyāvinābhāvo dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate
GSP29nystik_u:6090: tatra idamitthaṃbhūtamiti vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---idamiti sāmānyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6091: bhāṣye ca saṃsthitiritthaṃbhāvavyastheti sāmānyopakramasya abhyupagamasya pramāṇato viśeṣaparyantatāparisamāptiḥ saṃsthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6095: sāmānyalakṣaṇārtham, na khalu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa śakyo vibhāga ityuktam//26 //
GSP29nystik_u:6100: tadevādhikaraṇam āśrayo jñāpakatvena yeṣāmarthānāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6102: ābhimānikaṃ ca prāmāṇikatvam, tena siddhāntabhedināmarthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ na prāmāṇikatvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6109: sākṣācchāstre nopātto yathā manasa indriyabhāva iti //27 //
GSP29nystik_u:6117: na caivaṃ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ, tasya sarvaireva niścitatvāditi,
GSP29nystik_u:6119: saṃbandhagrahaṇāśrayāvanumānāgamau, yatra ca saṃbandhagrahaḥ sa dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ //28
GSP29nystik_u:6123: naiyāyikānāṃ hi samānaṃ tantraṃ nyāyaśāstram, paratantraṃ ca sāṃkhyādiśāstram /
GSP29nystik_u:6124: cetanā ātmanaḥ niratiśayā apariṇāmino na kenacid dharmeṇopajanāpāyadharmeṇa yujyante /
GSP29nystik_u:6125: prākṛteṣu ca dehādiṣu tatkāraṇeṣu mahadahaṅkārapañcatanmātrabhūtasūkṣmeṣu viśeṣo 'tiśaya ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6129: yat---ntaḥ//30// yasyārthasya sādhyasya vā hetorvā siddhau iti
GSP29nystik_u:6134: tatsiddheḥ, sa pakṣo vā bhavatu heturvā anena rūpeṇa adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6136: atra hi pṛthivyādigatenotpattimattena upalabdhimatpūrvakatvaṃ tadgataṃ sādhyamānaṃ svasiddhyantargatānuṣaṅgisarvajñatvādyupetameva
GSP29nystik_u:6141: pūrvo 'rtho yaḥ sākṣāddhikṛtaḥ tasya siddhāvantargata iti bhāṣyārthaḥ//30
GSP29nystik_u:6143: athābhyupagamasiddhāntasūtram---apa-ntaḥ//31// tad vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---aparīkṣito 'sūtrita iti, sūtritasya prāyeṇa parīkṣāsaṃbandhāt,
GSP29nystik_u:6146: sūtraṃ caivaṃ cojanīyam, asūtritābhyupagamāt hetoryatastadviśeṣaparīkṣaṇaṃ kriyate, tasmād viśeṣaparīkṣaṇāt jñāyate asūtritamapyabhyupagataṃ sūtrakāreṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:6148: evaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakāravyākhyānaṃ dūṣayati---śāstrānabhyupagata iti
GSP29nystik_u:6150: pramāṇatāntrābhyupagamasaṃsthitiriti hi siddhāntasāmānyalakṣaṇam, na ca pramāṇānadhīnābhyupagamastadanvetīti nāyamīdṛśo 'bhyupagamasiddhānto
GSP29nystik_u:6152: ajñaṃ pratyasadācāratvāt pramāṇikaṃ ca puruṣaṃ pratyaśakyatvāt buddhimato
GSP29nystik_u:6157: nanu yadyupapannaḥ pramāṇatayā abhyupagamaḥ siddhāntaḥ, tarhi siddhāntabhedināmarthānāṃ prāmāṇikatvena viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitā bhāvāḥ prasajyerannityata āha---tatpratyayāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6161: karmatayā vyajyamānatayā vā upādānaṃ svārthasya pakṣa iti padam /
GSP29nystik_u:6164: kriyāviśeṣayukta iti avāntaravyāpārayukte tena hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ kārakāṇāṃ vaicitryaṃ bhavatīti
GSP29nystik_u:6166: yāvadabhyupagataṃ nyāyyasya sādhanaṃ nyāya iti, tāvabhyupagataṃ bhavati prameyasādhanaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6167: na ca dharmiṇi anabhyupagate tadāśrayo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6169: atha saṃgrahaḥ pakṣaśabdeneti, yathā daṇḍiśabdena daṇḍasaṃbandhopahitasīmānaḥ samānāsamānajātīyāḥ sarve saṃgṛhyante, tathā pakṣaśabdenāpītyarthaḥ ayaṃ tu kalpaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntāvyāpakatvakathanenaivārthādapākṛta iti na pṛthak nirākṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6170: pakṣaśabdo hi vyajyamānatvopādhinibandhanapravṛttiḥ, na ca vyajyamānatvamasti nisargavyakte sarvatantrasiddhānta iti bhāva /
GSP29nystik_u:6172: pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte iti vākyasya divābhojananiṣedho 'rthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6174: sā ca na yathā pramāṇāntarulaṃ tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6181: anyaparādapi vākyāt pratīyamāno 'rtho 'pekṣita svīkriyata eveti śābdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6185: tasmāt tathāvidhārthapratyāyanameva pratijñādīnāmavayavasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ siddhamiti sūtramityanena darśitaṃ vārttikakṛtā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6192: tasya pravarttikā utpādikā jijñāsā pratyayasādhanānusaraṇadvāreṇa pratyāsattiḥ saṃśayatattvajñānayorviśeṣagatā na tu svarūpagatā,
GSP29nystik_u:6201: yadi śabdo nityaḥ syāt, na syāt kṛtaka iti anityatvasya nityatvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6207: vyudasyate hi tena pramāṇābhyanujñānadvāreṇa itikartavyatābhūtena saṃśaṃya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6208: tadetad bhāṣyajātaṃ praśnapūrvakaṃ vārttikakṛd vyācaṣṭe---kathaṃ punariti
GSP29nystik_u:6210: atha mā bhūvan parapratipādakāḥ, svapratipādakā eva kasmāt na bhavantītyata āha---niścitatvācceti
GSP29nystik_u:6211: sādhanādeva gamyate prāpyate, prāptaṃ ca jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6213: tat kiṃ sarvathaivānaṅgaṃ jijñāsādaya ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakatā, prakaraṇe tu jijñāsādayaḥ samarthā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6217: te ca jijñāsādaya utpannāḥ prakaraṇasyotthāpakāḥ svarūpeṇa, na punaḥ svajñānena yena śabdapratipādyāḥ santaḥ prakaraṇe 'pyaṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ, yathā pratijñādayaḥ svajñānena svārthān pratipādayantaḥ tasmāt sarvathaiva vijñāsādivācakapadaprayogo 'narthaka iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6228: sa ca parvate 'gnimati sādhyamāne viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhalakṣaṇo niyamo 'rthāt sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:6232: atrānyayogavyavacchedaṃ vākyārthaṃ manvāno bhadantaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇamativyāptyavyāptibhyām ākṣipati---ubhayeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6233: ubhayoravadhāraṇayoḥ prāptau saṃśayena kimidamavadhāryate kiṃ cedamiti prasaktāvityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6235: yata evakaraṇaṃ na tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti hi śābdā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6241: yathendriyārthasannikarṣotpannamityukte jñānaṃ sukhādi ca sāmanyena prāptam /
GSP29nystik_u:6246: tat kri loke na kpacidavadhāraṇam ityata āha---yatra ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:6253: tasya nivṛttiḥ sādhyaśabdādavagamyate, na tu prajñāpanīyo 'rtha ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6262: prajñāpanīyena dharmaiṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanam iti
GSP29nystik_u:6264: abhyupagamya vyavacchedaṃ śabdārthametaduktam, paramārthatastvaniyamaḥ kvacit saṃsargaḥ, kvacid vyavaccheda ityata āha---yaccedamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6265: ito 'pi nāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅga ityāha---sādhyanirdeśa iti ca pratijñāyāmiti
GSP29nystik_u:6267: na ca cākṣuṣatvādiṣu pramāṇamūlatā, tadabhimāno 'pi bādhakādapākṛta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6268: nanu yadi sarvatantrasiddhāntātiriktānāṃ siddhāntāntarāṇāṃ sādhyatvaṃ tarhi sādhyenaiva caritārthatvād apārthakaṃ pṛthagabhidhānameteṣāmiti, ata
GSP29nystik_u:6272: dhibhāgasūtreṇa prakaraṇotthānahetavo vākyāvayavatayā nirākāryatvena jijñāsādayo buddhisthīkṛtāḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6274: na ca cākṣuṣatvādiṣu pramāṇabādhiteṣu santi ta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6277: evaṃ tāvad vyutpattyādyālocanayā sādhyaśabdasya na hetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6280: anyatarāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgo mā bhūditi karmatayā te upādīyanta ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6288: tathā ca na sākṣāt tatpratyāyanāya te vibhavantīti tadarthaṃ sādhane vyāpriyante /
GSP29nystik_u:6289: tena siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī teṣāṃ pradhānaṃ viṣayaśca /
GSP29nystik_u:6290: pradhānaṃ ca prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate iti sādhyaśabdena sa evocyate, na tu hetudṛṣṭāntāvapradhāne ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6291: tadevamaduṣṭamasmallakṣaṇamiti yadasmallakṣaṇamanena doṣeṇa bhaṅktvā bhadantena anyathā lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam, tadeva duṣṭamityāha---na cedayamiti
GSP29nystik_u:6292: nanu yatra sādhyapadam asti bhavatu tatreṣṭagrahaṇamanarthakam, na tvasmistadastīti kathamiṣṭagrahaṇamanarthakatamityata
GSP29nystik_u:6296: tadapi hi pacyamānaṃ vyajyamānaṃ sādhyamevāha---tacca karma, karma cepsitamiti prāptumiṣṭamityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6306: no khalu mahatī pradīpe ghaṭo mahān alpe vā alpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6307: mahati tu kāraṇe mahān śabda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6308: tasmāt kāraṇato vikārāt kāryaḥ śabdaḥ, yathā mahadbhiḥ sthūlapiṇḍairārabdho 'vayavī mahāniti
GSP29nystik_u:6309: tadanena pratyayabhedabheditvaṃ heturupalakṣito bhavati, ādiśabdena ca sataḥ śabdasya abhivyaktau doṣāt //
GSP29nystik_u:6313: yadyapyāgamo 'pi śabdānityatve 'sti yathā somaṃ rājānamasṛjata tatastreyo vedā asṛjyanta //
GSP29nystik_u:6315: tathāpi nāsadāsīnno sadāsīdāmnāya eva khalvayamagra āsīt //
GSP29nystik_u:6318: prasiddhivirodhaṃ tu na budhyamāhe pramāṇavirodhād bhedena /
GSP29nystik_u:6324: asmākaṃ tu mānasapratyakṣavirodha iti sarvathā na pramāṇādanyā prasiddhiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6328: vastu hi yādṛśaṃ svakāraṇādutpannaṃ tādṛśameva tat /
GSP29nystik_u:6329: na tasyānyathābhāva iti na tatra doṣo niviśate /
GSP29nystik_u:6331: yā punaḥ ṣauruṣeyī dṛṣṭamanyatrārthamanyatra samāropya bhrāntyā vā paravipralambhāya vā pratijñādirūpeṇa vākyakriyā, sā svavacanavirodhādiśālinī duṣṭā /
GSP29nystik_u:6332: taddvāreṇa puruṣo nigṛhyate, nārtho na padānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6333: svārthāpavādaḥ svavacanavirodhaḥ kartṛdoṣo bhramo vā vipralambho vā kriyāyāmupacaryate /
GSP29nystik_u:6334: na ca kriyāyāṃ bhramo vā vipralambho vā, tayorabhiprāyabhedatayā puruṣadharmatvāt kriyāyā vastubādhanāt puruṣābhiprāyāvagatiriti kriyādvāreṇetyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:6339: sa triṣu rūpeṣvanyatamena rūpeṇa rahito nyūno 'siddho vā viruddho vā
GSP29nystik_u:6340: anaikāntiko vā bhavatīti so 'yaṃ nyūnatādoṣo hetoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6346: sa hi vādino vā prativādino vābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6349: pratijñāgatā hi doṣā yadi tadgatatvena udbhāvyamānā na vādino nigrahamāpādayeyuḥ, tatastatra niṣprayojanatvenāsaṃbhavāt pakṣa
GSP29nystik_u:6350: evopacaryeran, pārayanti tu pratijñāgatāni dūṣaṇāni nigrahituṃ vādinamiti
GSP29nystik_u:6352: kasmāt punarmañcasthā ityevaṃ na prayu/jate ityata
GSP29nystik_u:6356: iṣṭagrahaṇamanakṣarārūḍhamapyabhiprāyavyāptaṃ sādhyaṃ tathā syādityevamarthaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6358: na ca tanmātramasya sādhyam, api tvātmapārārthyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6359: tacca noccārayati mā bhūdananvayo hetuḥ saṃghātatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:6366: tātparyaṃ cāsya kvacid vācye kvacillakṣya iti sarva evāsau vacanārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6367: yastu naivaṃvidhaḥ kathamasau vacanārthaḥ? kathamasau vādyabhiprāyavyāpta ityavagantavyam? na ca kvacidapi pakṣaḥ pratijñāpadavācyaḥ, tasya vākyārthatvena lakṣyatvād eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:6372: tataśca saṃśayaviṣaya iṣyamāṇo jijñāsyamānaśca sādhya eva bhavati, na sādhanādirityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6377: tathā pakṣo yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ ityatrāpi vasubandhulakṣaṇe viruddhārthānirākṛtagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6378: etaduktaṃ bhavati---na kevalamasmākrametad viruddhārthānirākṛtapadamanarthakaṃ pratibhāti, samānatīrthānāmapi tathā vibhāti, yatastairnopāttamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6379: ata evaṃ vaktavyaṃ pakṣo yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6380: yadyapyatrāpi prayojyaprayojakavyāpārayoḥ sādhayitumiti samānam, tathāpi tumunā ya eva sādhayitā vādī sa evaiṣitetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6381: na punarvādino niyoktā sādhayitā vādī caiṣiteti /
GSP29nystik_u:6382: eṣitṛtvaṃ ca vādino dhruvaṃ kṛtvaitaducyate, yadā panureṣitṛtvamapi prayojake saṃcāryate, tadā svayaṅgrahaṇenāpyapratīkāra ityabhiprāyaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6385: sa hi sidhyantaṃ sādhyaṃ vādī tasminniyaṃ sādhanā samavetā /
GSP29nystik_u:6386: yastu tasyāpi prayojakastṛtīyasthānapatito na tasmin sādhanā samavaitīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6387: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti kathañcidasya bhaktyā kartṛtvam, taccāyuktaṃ sati mukhye kartarītyabhiprāyaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6391: yastāvat śāstrāviruddho 'rthaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ sa śāstrīya eva
GSP29nystik_u:6392: śāstrābhyupetapramāṇasiddhatvāt, taṃ vyutpādayan na śāstraṃ bādhate /
GSP29nystik_u:6393: yastu pramāṇīkṛtavaiśaṣikatantraḥ śabdanityatvaṃ sādhayati so 'navadheyavacanaḥ na hetvabhidhānaṃ yāvat pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ nīyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6395: yastu vaiśeṣikatantrādhyayanamātrād vaiśeṣikatvamātmano darśayitvā śabdanityatāṃ pratijānīte nāsau pramāṇīkṛtavaiśeṣikatantra iti na nigṛhyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6405: tathā hi parapratyāyanāya vacanam uccārayanti prekṣāvantaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6406: tadeva ca pare bodhayitavyā yad bubhutsante /
GSP29nystik_u:6408: no khalvāmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārānācakṣāṇaḥ praṣṭuravadheyavacano bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6409: anavadheyavacanaśca kathaṃ pratipādako nāma? yathā ca māṭhara
GSP29nystik_u:6410: samidhamāhareti guruṇā preṣita eṣohamāharāmītyanuktvā tadarthaṃ tadaryaṃ yadāyaṃ dātrāya gṛhaṃ praviśati, tadāsmai kupyati guraḥ āḥ śiṣyāpasada chāndasavacara māṭhara māmavadhīrayasīti bruvāṇaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6411: evamanityaṃ śabdaṃ bubhutsamānāyānityaḥ śabda ityanuktvā yadeva kiściducyate kṛtakatvāditi vā, yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityamiti vā, kṛtakaśca śabda iti vā tat sarvamasyānapekṣitam āpātato 'saṃbaddhābhidhānabuddhyā,
GSP29nystik_u:6413: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvamanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ, kṛtakaśca śabdaḥ iti
GSP29nystik_u:6418: na ca pariṣatprativādinau pramāṇīkṛtavādinau yadetad vacanaṃ saṃbandhāya
GSP29nystik_u:6419: pratīkṣete, tathā ca sati na hetvādyapyapekṣetām, tadvacanādeva tadarthaniścayāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6420: anityaḥ śabda iti tvapekṣita ukte kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ kṛtakatvāditi heturupa tiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:6421: so 'yaṃ pañcāvayavaprayoge ca tallakṣaṇe ca pratijñānantarakāla evāvasaro
GSP29nystik_u:6427: sa ca vibhāgoddeśe vākyāvayava iti vacanarūpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6428: tasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyasādhanamiti sādhyate 'neneti vyutpattyā yadyapi pārārthyāpannaṃ kṛtakatvādikamartham āha, tathāpi tasya vacanātmakahetusāmānadhikaraṇyānupapatterviṣayi kṛtakatvādityādikaṃ vacanamupalakṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6429: yadi ca vacanaṃ heturityucyeta tatsādhyena samabhivyāhṛtaṃ pratijñā syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6432: upanayādapi sādhanaṃ na parāṅgatayā gamyate, kiṃ tu prātipadikārthapradhānatayā svaniṣṭhamiti na tatrāpi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6438: heturiti yadyapi sāmānyapadam, tathāpi prakaraṇādanvayavyatirekihetuviśeṣaparaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSP29nystik_u:6444: sādhyasyeti dharmimātre buddhirmā bhūdityata uktaṃ dharmasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6451: yo dharmo dhūmādi---sādhye bhavati sa tathābhūta evodāharaṇe 'pīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6452: udāhniyata ityudāharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmī tasmin na punaḥ sa eva /
GSP29nystik_u:6454: yadi tarhi nānyasya dharmo 'nyatra vartate, kathaṃ tarhi samānatā? sā hi tattvānyatvavirodhinītyata āha---kiṃ tu tattulyaḥ sa evetyucyate, yathā tāneva śalīn upayuṅkte tāneva tittirīnīti tadanena sāmānyād iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam //
GSP29nystik_u:6456: sādharmyamātratvaṃ hi viruddhe cāsādhāraṇe savyabhicāre cāstīti teṣāmapi vacanaṃ hetuḥ syāt
GSP29nystik_u:6458: nanu tathāpi savyabhicāre 'pyudāraṇasādharmyamiti kathaṃ nivartyate ityata
GSP29nystik_u:6462: sādharmyādityato viśeṣeṇa sarvasādharmyaprāptau udāharaṇasādharmyamapi prāptameveti vidhānānarthakyaṃ parisaṃkhyāyakaṃ sadavadhāraṇārthameva bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6463: tadavadyotanāya ca evakāraḥ sādharmyameva ityatra sādhyapadaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6468: sādhyaṃ khalvatra prakṛtaṃ pradhānam, taduddeśena avayavānāṃ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6469: sādhyasādhanamiti ca padena sannidhāpitamiti tadeva dvitīyam avadhāraṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6480: etat kila hetulakṣaṇa bhadanto dūṣayāṃbabhūva sādhanaṃ yadi sārdhmyaṃ na
GSP29nystik_u:6483: yadi sādhanasādharmyayoratyantābhedo yadi vā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena kathañcid bhedaḥ ubhayathāpi na pañcamī, sādhanasāmānādhikaraṇyena prathamāprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6487: tadviśeṣyaṃ syāt na hi vākyamevārthādutthitam, api tu vivakṣādyapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6491: na tatrāpi dvidhā doṣāt sākṣād vā sādhanaṃ pāramparyeṇa vā? yadi
GSP29nystik_u:6492: pāramparyeṇa, vaktṛjñānaṃ tarhi sākṣāt sādharmyasamutthaṃ pāramparyeṇa ca
GSP29nystik_u:6494: atha sākṣāt sādhanam, tarhi śrotṛjñānaṃ pāramparyeṇa sādharmyasamutthaṃ sākṣāt sādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6507: viśeṣātiriktaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcidasti, tasya kalpanāmātratvād bhedasya ca vastvadhiṣṭhānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6509: yadā hi sādhyasādhanaṃ nāmodāharaṇasādharmyādatiriktaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu
GSP29nystik_u:6511: tathā ca sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā ityanena virodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6517: tadetallakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ parihṛtamiti na parihārāntaraṃ prayojayatītyāha---tatra tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:6518: uktaṃ yathā hetupadasannidhau sādhanapadaṃ hetupade pravartate, na
GSP29nystik_u:6521: sādharmyasya liṅsya kṛtakatvādihetupadavācyasya vyabhicāritvādiyogādudāharaṇaviśeṣaṇayogo na punaḥ sādhyasādhanapadavācyasya kṛtakatvādityāderhetuvacanasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6524: vacanamapi darśanabhedena ubhayathāpi bhavati, yathā mīmāṃsakānāṃ nityaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6528: tathā prātisvikamapi bhedaṃ sarveṣāmeva śabdānāmitikaraṇo darśayatītyāha---dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:6531: anabhyupagato 'rthāntaraṃ vipakṣo yasya hetoranityatve sādhye kṛtakatvādeḥ sa tathoktaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6532: yadabhyupagataṃ bhadantena tasmāt ṣaṣṭyastviti tad dūṣayati---yadapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6535: na tu ṣaṣṭhī vā hetupañcamī vā kārakavibhaktiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6541: sato vināśo vā anityatvam, tadyogo vā? taccebhayamayuktam, na hi sadasatoḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6543: tataścānityaḥ śabda iti samānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6544: api ca śabdasya bhūtvā yadabhavanam, na tadeva piṭharasya /
GSP29nystik_u:6545: na hyabhavanatvaṃ nāmāsti sāmānyam, yena dṛṣṭānto na sādhyavikalaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6546: na ca sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastvantaraṃ dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:6551: aparānteti vaktavye ubhayāntagrahaṇena pūrvāntaniveśanaṃ hetorutpattimattvasyātyantiṅkīṃ pratyāsattimavinābhāvopayoginīṃ darśayitumiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6553: taccāparāntasya bhinnakālasya saṃbaddhasyāpi virodhitayā buddhisthasya saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6554: tathā ca yaivāparāntāvacchinnasya sattā piṭharasya saivāparāntāvacchinnasya śabdasyāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:6565: tenāsadviśeṣaṇasya sata ityetāvataiva pūrvāntaparicchinnasya sattāsaṃbandhaḥ sattā vā tadviśeṣaṇotpattirdarśitā
GSP29nystik_u:6566: paścedṛśastasya gaganavat nātyantaṃ saṃbhavaḥ, nāpi gaganakusumavadatyantābhāva iti svarūpamuktamutpattimuparlakṣayitum
GSP29nystik_u:6568: na caivaṃ labdhotpattini vastuni utpadyata iti pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6570: tasmāt pūrvāntāvacchinnavastusattayā tatsaṃbandhena vā tasyaiva vastuno
GSP29nystik_u:6571: 'parāntāvacchinnā sattā vā tatsaṃbandho vā jñāpyate iti sarvaṃ ramaṇīyam //
GSP29nystik_u:6572: nanu bhāṣyakṛd abhūtvā bhavatītyasya vākyāsyārthamutpattiṃ vakṣyati, tvaṃ punarasadviśeṣaṇasya sato 'tyantamabhāvabhāvapratiṣedha ityasya vākyasyārthamutpattim /
GSP29nystik_u:6573: ataḥ kuto na virodha ityata āha---vākyārtheti /
GSP29nystik_u:6574: ya evārtho bhāṣyakāreṇa utpattiśabdārthatayābhyanujñāto 'ṅgīkṛtaḥ, sa evāsmābhirapi /
GSP29nystik_u:6575: nātyantamabhāvabhāvapratiṣedha utpattiḥ, api svasadviśeṣaṇasya sataḥ sattā vā tatsaṃbandho NyS_1,1.35: tathā vaidharmyāt //
GSP29nystik_u:6577: tathā---t //35// atra yadi vedharmyādityucyate tataḥ sakalakesarādimatpadārthapakṣīkaraṇenāśvatvaṃ yadā viṣāṇitvena sādhyate tasyāsti pakṣavaidharmyamiti hetuḥ syādityata āha---udāharaṇena
GSP29nystik_u:6580: tathāpi yadā śarīramātraṃ pakṣīkṛtya sātmakatvaṃ sādhyate prāmādimattvena,
GSP29nystik_u:6581: tadāsti tasyodāharaṇena vaidharmyamiti so 'pi hetuḥ syādityata āha---eveti
GSP29nystik_u:6584: tathāpi anvayavyatirekiṇo hetāranaikāntikasya vipekṣaikadeśavyāpinaḥ saṃgrahaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6585: yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ, utpattidharmakatvād anityo mūrtatvādityata
GSP29nystik_u:6591: mā bhūt prayogamātrabhedād bhedaḥ, udāharaṇabhedād bhedo bhaviṣyatītyata
GSP29nystik_u:6596: prayatnecchādyupalakṣayati---yadubhayapakṣasaṃpratipannaṃ nirātmakaṃ ghaṭādi tatsarvamaprāṇādimad dṛṣṭam iti vyatyāsena yojanā /
GSP29nystik_u:6600: yaścāsau icchādisamavāyikāraṇaṃ pṛthivyādivilakṣaṇo dravyāṇāṃ navamaḥ, sa ātmetyucyate ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6601: anvayivyatirekiṇastadvivekasya ca tantrāntaraprasiddhena nāmnā tantrāntaraprasiddhatāṃ darśayati---so 'yamavīta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6602: vividhena prakāreṇa itaḥ prāpto vītaḥ, pakṣavyāpakatve sati sapakṣavyāptyā
GSP29nystik_u:6608: gṛhītāvinābhāvo hi hetuḥ sādhyena tasya paricchedakaḥ, sa ca dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi hetusādhyadharmayordarśane satyavinābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6609: na ca sātmakatvaṃ kvacid dṛṣṭam, tat kathaṃ tenāvinābhāvadarśanaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6610: prāṇādimattvasya, darśane vā nāvītaḥ kiṃ tu vīta evetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6619: atrāpi yāvannirātmakaṃ tat sarvam aprāṇādimad dṛṣṭamiti vyatyāsena yojanā,
GSP29nystik_u:6621: vyāpakanivṛttau ca vyāpyaṃ nivartate, yathā vṛkṣatvanivṛttau śiṃśapātvam
GSP29nystik_u:6623: yadi punarevamucyate nivartatāmaprāmāṇādimattvaṃ jīvaccharīrāt prāṇādimattvasya pramāṇata upalabdhermā nivartiṣṭa nairātmyam, tasmād vyabhicārādaheturiti śaṅkate---atha punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6625: kiṃ jīvaccharīre sādhye nairātmyaniścayād vyabhicāra uta tatsandehāt? yadi
GSP29nystik_u:6627: atha sandehāt, tathā satyanvayino 'pyahetutve sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6631: na tāvadayumātmā nāma pramāṇena kvacidupalabdhaḥ, yasya pratiṣedho nairātmyamavagamyeta, tadupalambhe vā kṛtamanayā kusṛṣṭyā /
GSP29nystik_u:6632: tasmāt kalpayitvātmānamaprāmāṇikaṃ tatpratiṣedhasya ghaṭādāvaprāṇādimattvena vyāptiṃ gṛhītvā jīvaccharīre vyāpakasyāprāṇādimattvasya nivṛttyā nairātmyasya vyāpyasya nivṛtterātmā avagantavyaḥ evaṃ ca sati kalpanākoṣasyāparimeyatvāt yad yadeva kalpyate tattadabhāvasyadhaṭādau sulabhatvād aprāṇādimattvena vyāpterjīccharīre 'prāṇādimuttvasya vyāpakasya nivṛtterātmasadbhāvavat sakalakālpanikaḍitthādimattvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6638: akṣaṇikatve ca vyavasthite kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇāpekṣamitīcchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇena bhavitavyam, kāryatvād ghaṭādivat, śarīrendriyādīnāṃ ca samavāyikāraṇatvaniṣedhe sati yad icchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ pariśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6639: tad dravyamātmeti ca kṣetrajña iti ca jīva iti cākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6644: so 'yaṃ jīvaccharīre kāryasyābhāvo vyāpako nivartamānaḥ svavyāpyaṃ tatkāraṇābhāvamādāya nivartate iti siddhaṃ jīvaccharīre prāṇakāraṇam, sa cātmeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6645: yadi ca ḍitthādayo 'pi tādṛśāḥ, tadā ātmano nāmāntarāṇi nārthāntarāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:6647: avadhāritaṃ kāryaṃ prāṇādyupalakṣitamicchādi yasya so 'vadhāritakāryaḥ, sa eva svabhāvo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6651: ye 'pi hi nairātmyavādino buddhiṃ vā bhūtapatiṇāmabhedaṃ vā
GSP29nystik_u:6655: so 'yaṃ jīvaccharīre kāryābhāvo vyāvartamānaḥ kāraṇābhāvaṃ vyāvartayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6656: na ca kāryeṇaiva kāraṇamanumīyatāṃ jīvaccharīre, kiṃ vyatirekiṇā,
GSP29nystik_u:6657: ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyantaṃ ko nu vakreṇa sādhayet iti vācyam, kāraṇamātrasya tataḥ siddherityuktam
GSP29nystik_u:6658: pariśeṣād viśeṣasiddhiriti cet? sa eva vyatirekītyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:6659: yadi hi pṛthivyādisamavāyikāraṇā icchādayo bhaveyuḥ, ghaṭādiṣvapi prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:6660: tasmād ghaṭādiṣvicchādikāryanivṛttyā dravyāṣṭakātiriktakāraṇanivṛttirvyāptā dṛṣṭetīcchādayaḥ śarīre dṛśyamānā vyāpikāṃ svanivṛttiṃ nivartayanto vyāpyadravyāṣṭakātiriktakāraṇābhāvanivṛttimukhena navamaṃ dravyaṃ sādhayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:6661: na caiṣāṃ buddhireva samavāyikāraṇam, dravyasyaiva samavāyikāraṇatvaniyamād buddheścādravyatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:6662: yathā ca bhūtānāṃ pariṇatibhedo na kāraṇaṃ tathā hi tṛtīye upapādayiṣyate
GSP29nystik_u:6663: vyatirekamukhenāpi prāmādeḥ sātmakatvenānvayasiddhau na kevalavyatirekīti cet? na svābhāvavikaṃ sādhyena pratibandhamanvayavyatirekiṇi vyāsedhāmaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6664: kiṃ tu sapakṣābhāvena vidhimukhenāsya pratibandhaṃ nirākurmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6666: na ca pakṣa eva sapakṣaḥ, jijñāsitaviśeṣasya jñātaviśeṣādanyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6667: śarīrādiṣu ca satsu nairātmyaniṣedha evātmasadbhāvaḥ, asanniṣedhasya sadbhāvalakṣaṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6668: sapakṣābhāvastu nairātmyenāpyavyapadeśya iti kathaṃ nairātmyaniṣedhena vyapadiśyatām? asato 'dhikaraṇatvāyogādityuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:6680: nanu mā bhūd gandhavattvaṃ heturvyatireka vyabhicārād anityādivannityādapyasya vyatirekāt, tasya tu pakṣa eva kevalaṃ na tu
GSP29nystik_u:6681: sapakṣavipakṣau, na tasaya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'stīti sa kasmāt na
GSP29nystik_u:6687: yadi hi pakṣaikadeśavṛttirapi vipakṣābhāvāt na vyatirekī hetuḥ, tarhi tasya pakṣaikadeśavṛtterapi sato vipakṣanivṛttirasti sa hetuḥ prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:6691: atra ca yena pakṣaikadeśavṛttervyatirekyābhāsasya nirākaraṇaṃ tadavadhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ darśitam
GSP29nystik_u:6693: asya tu pakṣeṇāpīti vyatirekyapi na hetuḥ, na punarvaidharmyameveti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6694: tathā sati savyabhicāramātrasya nivṛttiḥ syāt, na tu pakṣaikadeśavṛtterityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6701: yadā tu sapakṣādisādharmyanirākaraṇam, tadā aniṣṭasya viruddhādeḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6706: sapakṣādapi viśeṣe sati vipakṣād viśeṣaḥ, pakṣādapi viśeṣe sati vipakṣād
GSP29nystik_u:6707: viśeṣaḥ, vipakṣamātrād vā viśeṣaḥ iti prakārāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6708: tatra pūrvayoḥ prakārayoryathākramamasādhāraṇasya cāsiddhasya ca hetutvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6712: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣe cāviśeṣe ca prasṛta iti vipakṣekadeśavṛtterapi pakṣasapakṣasādhāraṇasya hetutvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6717: viśeṣa evetyavadhāraṇena vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ gaurayaṃ viṣāṇitvāditi hetutvena pratiṣiddhaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6719: tathā ca vipakṣādeva yo viśeṣa eva sa hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6720: sapakṣāttu yo viśeṣa eva sa na heturityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6721: yathā ca aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇitvāt iti sapakṣād viśeṣa eveti hetutvena
GSP29nystik_u:6723: yastu sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnanāntarīyakatvādiḥ sa sapakṣād viśeṣa eva na bhavati, api tu sāmānyamapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6726: yadi sapakṣādapi yo viśeṣaḥ sa sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6727: prayatnānantarīyakatvādirhetuḥ, evaṃ sati vipakṣādeveti avadhāraṇaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6729: na vipakṣādevetyetanmātramavadhāryate yena sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādinarna hetuḥ syāt, api tu yo viśeṣa eva sa heturiti prāpte vipakṣādeveti niyamyate, tena sāvadhāraṇasya viśeṣasya
GSP29nystik_u:6730: vipakṣavṛtterhetutvaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati yathā aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇītvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:6731: yaḥ punarviśeṣaścāviśeṣaśca sapakṣe hetuḥ, tasya hetutve 'pi na vipakṣādeveti bādhitaṃ bhavati
GSP29nystik_u:6732: yadyapi caivaṃ satyapi sapakṣaikadeśavṛtterhetutvaṃ na śrutam, tathāpi vipakṣādevetyanenāvadhāraṇenāniṣiddhamityanumatameva
GSP29nystik_u:6735: yathā tattulyaikadeśavṛtteravihitamapi hetutvamaniṣedhānumatam, evaṃ pakṣaikadeśavṛtterapīti so 'pi hetuḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6737: pakṣadharmatve sati viśeṣa eva vipakṣādeveti niyame kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prāptiḥ, apakṣadharmatvāt tasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6748: atyantāyogo niṣiddho bhavati, na tvayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6756: heturvipakṣād viśeṣa iti ca yadā sautrāntikapakṣamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6757: yadā tvanityatvahetau lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ vicāryate iti vipakṣaśabdārtho vācyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6758: nanu ca nityo vipakṣa ityata āha---na hyasatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6760: na cāsyāpādānatvaṃ nāpyadhikaraṇatvaṃ yena pañcamī vā saptamī vā prayujyeteti āha---na cāsatīti
GSP29nystik_u:6761: na cāsato vipakṣād vyāvṛttyabhāvena viśeṣo 'pītyāha---vipakṣāsaṃbhave ceti
GSP29nystik_u:6764: pakṣasyaiva dharma iti hetulakṣaṇe asādhāraṇa eva hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6765: samāna eva siddha iti tu hetulakṣaṇe aśvasya viṣāṇitve sādhye gotvādirhetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6767: tathā ca pakṣasya dharmaḥ samāne ca siddhaḥ ityatra savyabhicāro hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6768: pakṣasya dharmo vipakṣe ca nāstītyatrāsādhāraṇo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6769: samāne ca siddho vipakṣe ca nāstītyatra anityaḥ paramāṇuḥ kṛtakatvāditi hetuḥ syāditi trayaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6772: atra dignāgena sapakṣe sannasan dvedhā pakṣadharmaḥ punastridhā /
GSP29nystik_u:6774: iti nava pakṣadharmān hetutadābhāsān darśayitvā tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye
GSP29nystik_u:6778: yaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ sa sapakṣe san asan dvedhā iti trividhaḥ, sa punarasapakṣe sadasaddvividhatvataḥ pratyekaṃ tridhā bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6789: tadeteṣu hetutadābhāseṣu heturnirdhārito yena tadupanyasya vārttikakāro
GSP29nystik_u:6792: tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye ityetāvanmātrāt na labhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6797: na punaḥ pakṣadharma evetyarthaḥ, avadhāraṇam abuddhvā śaṅkate---athāpīti
GSP29nystik_u:6799: nanu apakṣadharmatvanivṛttyaiva pakṣavyāpakatvaṃ gamyate, na hyavyāpako bhavatyapakṣadharmatvanivṛttimānityata
GSP29nystik_u:6804: hetuhetvābhāsāveva pakṣadharmau nānya iti niyamajñāpanārthamavadhāraṇamiṣṭaṃ bhavadbhirityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6810: san sajātīya iti nopādātavyamiti yaduktam, tatra śaṅkate---atha manyeteti
GSP29nystik_u:6812: yadyavadhāraṇaṃ yujyeta avadhāraṇārtho yukta ārambhaḥ syāt, tadeva tvayuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6814: pakṣasya dharma eva ityetasmin pada ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6819: sajātīye dvedhā ceti padopādāne cānupādāne cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6820: sajātīya eva dvidhetyanenaiveti hetutadābhāsayorautsargike pakṣadharmatve sthita ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6821: śaṅkate---atha mā bhūditi sajātīya eva dvidheti nāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6828: yadi ca tadatyaya eveti nāvadhāryeta tato 'naikāntiko 'pi hetuḥ syāditi doṣaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6830: tadaṃśena tasyaiva pakṣasyāṃśena sādhyadharmasāmānyena, vyāpto heturiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6833: yathāśrutalakṣaṇe pakṣāvyāpakasya hetutvam, tadaṃśena vyāpta ityasya
GSP29nystik_u:6845: yastu tādṛśavinābhāvīti vipakṣe sattāpratiṣedhāt sapakṣe sattvaṃ gamyate
GSP29nystik_u:6852: vauddhānāṃ rūpatvādijāternityāyā abhāvād na cākṣuṣatvamanityatvena vinā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6854: tathā copadarśanapadena pakṣe hetoḥ sattopadarśanaṃ bhavatīti taṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6859: prayatnanāntarīyakatvaṃ prayatnakāraṇakatvaṃ tat sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā?
GSP29nystik_u:6868: yat tāvadupalabdhikarma tatsarvaṃ prayatnādeva puruṣavyāpādādevopalabhyate nānyathetyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6872: asmaddarśanaṃ cedāsthāya tvayā bauddhenocyate, tat prayatnagrahaṇenāpyanaikāntikatvaṃ tadavasthamevetyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6878: pāramparyeṇāpi prathama eva varṇaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ, na dvitīyādayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6879: atipāramparyāśrayaṇe tvatiprasaṅgaḥ, prāyeṇa tasya tatra tatra sulabhatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6881: viśeṣaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ dharmiviśeṣaṇam, prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ ca heturityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6883: na hi bhavatāmasmākamiva viśeṣātiriktamasti sāmānyaṃ vastu sad yo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6884: na ca kalpanāropitaṃ hetuḥ samyagjñānasya bhavitumarhati, na cātyantāsataḥ kalpanāpi saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6889: tasya dharmayogaḥ saṃbhavatyeva, na tvasyāpyaprayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ tvapratyayābhidheyaṃ hi janma, tat prayatnenada prayatnādanyena vā
GSP29nystik_u:6890: viśeṣaṇīyam, yasya tu janmaiva nāsti tasya tadviśeṣaṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6894: tasyāpi hi prāgasataḥ savakāraṇena samavāya iti janma nāstīti na tadviśeṣaṇayoga ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:6897: hetāvukte nāvyāpto 'sau sādhyadharmeṇa hetubhāve vyavatiṣṭhate, na ca vyāptipradarśanamudāharaṇamantareṇeti hetulakṣaṇānantaraṃ kramaprāptamudāharaṇalakṣaṇamāha---sādhya---raṇam //36//
GSP29nystik_u:6899: asya tātparyamāha---asyeti, dṛṣṭānto 'rtharūpo nodāharaṇasya vacanātmakasya svarūpato lakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6900: tasmāt svābhidhāyakavacanopalakṣakatvena lakṣaṇatvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca bhajata ityabhisandhinoktam---udāharaṇopalakṣaṇamiti
GSP29nystik_u:6901: anena ca samānajātīyebhyaḥ pratijñādibhyaḥ asamānajātīyebhyaśca pramāṇādibhya udāharaṇaṃ vyavacchinnaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6903: tasyārthaḥ, sādhyena dharmiṇā śabdena, sādharmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya sthālyādeḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6905: kaddhyanityatvena sādhye ca śabde dṛṣṭānte ca sthālpādau samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:6906: tasmāt kāraṇat prayojakāt, taddharmabhāvī tasyaiva sādhyasya śabdasya yo dharmo dharmāntaram, yena viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ siṣādhayiṣito 'nityatvena,
GSP29nystik_u:6911: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sūtrapadaṃ vyācakṣāṇa eva phalato bhāṣyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6915: sādhyaśabdenaiva kṛtakatvaṃ sādharmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya, nāsādhyena vipakṣeṇākāśādinā nityena, tato hi kṛtakatvaṃ vyāvṛttamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6918: yasmāt sādhyasādharmyāt saddharmabhāvī bhavati, so 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta
GSP29nystik_u:6920: yāvad vākyaṃ na samāpyate, tāvadardhokta eva pṛcchati---kiṃ kutaściditi /
GSP29nystik_u:6921: avadhāraṇadvayayoginaḥ sādhyasādharmyād dṛṣṭānto 'vaśyameva taddharmabhāvī bhavatīti gatārthaṃ taddharmabhāvītyetaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6923: yathā nitye śabde sādhye amūrtatvādeḥ sādhyena śabdena karmaṇaḥ sādharmyāt karma na taddharmabhāvi bhavati, nityaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6928: atra ca sādhyasādharmyagrahaṇena sādhanavikalamanudāharaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6934: pañcamyupādānena ca sādhyasādharmyaprayuktaṃ taddharmabhāvitvaṃ yatra vacane pradarśyate tadevodāharaṇaṃ nānyaditi darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6935: prayojakatvaṃ ca sādhyasādharmyasya hetoḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho vyāpyatvamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:6939: yo yo 'nityaḥ sa sarva utpattimān yathā ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6940: samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyāt sāmānyalakṣaṇamapyanena sūcitamityāśayavatā bhāṣyakṛtā samākhyāyā niruktiḥ kṛtā /
GSP29nystik_u:6949: tadetad bhāṣyam anubhāṣya vyācaṣṭe---tasya dharma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6950: tasya dharmastaddharma iti hi dharmasya saṃbandhitvena pṛthagvacanam /
GSP29nystik_u:6951: na ca dharma eva dharmasya, nāpi dharmāntaraṃ dharmasya, kiṃ tu dharmiṇa
GSP29nystik_u:6958: taddharmabhāvī bhavatīti, tadanupapannam, na hi kṛtakatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:6959: sthālyāderanityatvaṃ bhavati, jāyate bījādivāṅkura ityata uktam---bhavati
GSP29nystik_u:6961: vaidharmyodāharaṇasya lakṣaṇam---tadvi---tam //37// anuvṛttena pūrayitvā savyākhyānaṃ sūtraṃ paṭhati---sādhyavaidharmyādataddharmabhāvī ca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6962: sātmakatayā sādhyena jīvaccharīreṇa vaidhamyād ghaṭāderdṛṣṭāntasya sātmakatvasādharmyavirahāditi yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:6963: yasya sādhyasya jīvaccharīrasya dharmaḥ prāṇādimattvaṃ taddharmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6966: na taddharmabhāvī ataddharmabhāvī, prāṇādirahito ghaṭādiriti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:6970: sūtrasthaśca vāśabdaḥ samucceye veditavyaḥ, vyatirekaviṣayatvād vaidharmyodāharaṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6977: anyathā sapakṣaikadeśavartī na hetuḥ syāditi manyamāno vārtikakāra
GSP29nystik_u:6984: yadā tu dṛṣṭāntasyodāharaṇamiti pāṭhaḥ, tadā nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6985: dūṣaṇaṃ cāpareṣām, yathā na dṛṣṭāntasya udāharaṇena sāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP29nystik_u:6986: evaṃ taddharmabhāvitvasyārtharūpasya, svaviṣayavacanopalakṣaṇatvena tu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭānte 'pi tulyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6992: na ca jñāpanādanyā kriyā saṃbhavatīti gamakatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:6995: anye tu taddharmabhāvītyetad vikalpya dūṣayantītyāha---anye tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:6998: tasmāt na kiñcidetat taddharmaṃ bhāvayituṃ śīlamasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7002: tadidaṃ pareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍinyāyamālambya pariharati---na vaktavyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7006: sā ca bahuvrīhiṇai labhyata iti kṛtamatreninetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7013: yathā ca sa eva sādhyo viśiṣṭaḥ pratyayabhedabheditveneti, pratyayaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7016: prāgabhāvo hi sthālyāḥ kṛtakatvaṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvaścānityatā rāddhānte bauddhānām /
GSP29nystik_u:7017: na caivamubhayaṃ sthālyāmasti, tasyāḥ svābhāvavirodhitvāditi dūṣayati---atra visphūrjatāpīti
GSP29nystik_u:7021: asmadrāddhānte tu yathā tayoḥ sthālyādau saṃbhavaḥ tathoktaṃ hetulakṣaṇasūtra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7023: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7024: svapratipattau vyāptismaraṇānantaraṃ tathā cāyaṃ na tatheti vā parāmarśajñānotpādādudāharaṇavacanasya ca vyāptipratipādakatvāt parāmarśajñāne hetorupanayasyodāharaṇapūrvakatvaniyamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7025: udāharaṇānantaramupanayaṃ lakṣayati---udā---yaḥ //38// apekṣāpadaṃ bhāṣyakṛd vyācaṣṭe---udāharaṇatantra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7027: vaśyata iti vaśaḥ, vaśina udāharaṇasya vaśya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7028: etadeva karmaṇo bhāvaṃ niṣkṛṣya vivṛṇotti---vaśaḥ, sāmarthyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7036: tathā na tatheti sāmānyalakṣaṇāpekṣe viśeṣalakṣaṇe iti bodhyavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:7037: atra kecit āhuḥ hetuvacanādeva sodāharaṇāt sādhyasiddherasādhanāṅgamupanaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7040: tadanena vyutpannāvyutpannatayā pareṣāmaniyatapratipattisādhanatvāt svapratipattyanusāreṇa pare bodhayitavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7047: yadyapi sādhanatayā kṛtakatvamuktam, pratijñānantaraṃ pratipattra sādhanasyaivāpekṣitatvat, tathāpi tannāsiddhaṃ tatra sādhanatvena vyavatiṣṭhata iti svasiddhimākṣipati sāmarthyāditi bhāva /
GSP29nystik_u:7049: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7052: asyāpi sādhanasāmarthyādākṣepāt avyāptasya sādhanatvāyogāt tadvidhasyāpi prameyatvādeḥ śabdanityatvādau sādhanatvabhrameṇa prayogo 'siddhepi tulya iti vyāptipradarśanārthodāharaṇaprayogavaddhetoḥ siddhatvapratipādanāya upanayasyapi prayoga iti ramaṇīyam //38 //
GSP29nystik_u:7055: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa dvividhānāmapi hetūdāharaṇopanayānāṃ samānaṃ nigamanalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7057: hetvapadeśāt taddhetukam anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyā punarvacanam /
GSP29nystik_u:7058: yadyapi ca siddhanirdeśo nigamanam, sādhyanirdeśaśca pratijñā, tathāpi yasyaiva pratijñāyāṃ sādhyatvamāsīt, tasyaiva nigamane siddhatvamityavasthāvantamekamāśritya samānaviṣayatayā nigamanaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7065: atra prathamasūtravadeva yathāsvamavayaveṣu pramāṇānāṃ paramanyāyaṃ stotuṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7070: nanu kasmāt pratijñaivāptopadeśo na bhavati, kṛtamasyā āgamāntaraviṣayatvenetyata āha---anṛṣeśceti
GSP29nystik_u:7078: sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhaṃ saṃdṛśya samyag dṛṣṭvā liṅgasya pratīteḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7079: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yadyapi trayāṇāmapi liṅgadarśanānāṃ sasmṛtīnāmanumānatvam, tathāpi tadekadeśe madhyame 'pi liṅgadarśane samudāyopacārādanumānavyapadeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7081: kasmāt? dṛṣṭena udāharaṇe pratibandhena adṛṣṭasya sādhyadharmiṇyanumeyasya siddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7082: yadi punarna mūlaṃ pratyakṣamāsthīyeta, avyavasthayā nādṛṣṭaṃ sidhyediti
GSP29nystik_u:7086: anumeyaṃ vā, tasya pratipattiḥ, tasyāṃ sāmarthyapradarśanaṃ nigamanamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7094: taduttarakālaṃ hi sādhanākāṅkṣāyāṃ pratijñāmāśritya hetupadaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7100: avayavānāṃ prātisvikaṃ prayojanamuktamapi śiṣyahitatayā bhāṣyakāraḥ pratipādayati---atheti
GSP29nystik_u:7103: vyavasthāpite tu na jāteravasara ityāha---vyavasthite hīti //
GSP29nystik_u:7106: tanmatam apākartuṃ vārttikakāraḥ saprayojanaṃ nigamanaṃ darśayati---pratijñāviṣayasyārthasyeti
GSP29nystik_u:7107: caturbhiḥ khalvavayavairhetostrīṇi rūpāṇi dve vā pratipādite, na tvabādhitaviṣayatvāsatpratipakṣitatve
GSP29nystik_u:7108: pañcasaṃ vā caturṣu vā rūpeṣu hetoravinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7114: na ca pratijñāvacanādeva tatsiddhiḥ, tasya sādhyaparatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7118: yathā ca trairūpyātiriktametadrūpadvayaṃ tathopapāditam asmābhiḥ prathamasūtre /
GSP29nystik_u:7120: etasmin sūtrārthe parasya pratijñāyāṃ nigamanaṃ gatārthaṃ manyamānasya avakāśo nāstīti //
GSP29nystik_u:7121: yastu manyeta na hetoravinābhāvasiddhimantareṇa siddhanirdeśo nigamanaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7122: bhavati, na ca pāñcarūpyaṃ vinā avinābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7123: nigamanāttu tatsiddhau na siddhanirdeśo nigamanam, api tu tadapi
GSP29nystik_u:7124: sādhyanirdeśa eveti, taṃ pratyupetya taddoṣanirācikīrṣayā pareṣāṃ vākyamupakṣipyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7127: yathāśruti hi nigamanopanayayorabhedaṃ sādhayati, arthagataṃ cāviśeṣaṃ hetumāha---taccaitadālokatamasoraikyaṃ kākasya kārṣyādivadāpatitam /
GSP29nystik_u:7135: sidhyatyekaprayojanatve sādhye hetoravirodhaḥ, hetustu na pratijñārthādatiticyate ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7140: yacca paraiḥ upanaye dūṣaṇaṃ vikalpyābhyadhāyi tat
GSP29nystik_u:7142: sarvasāmānyayoge hi tadeva syāt, na tu tatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:7144: na hi yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaḥ, tathā śabdo 'pi kṛtakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7146: tasmāt sāmānyapratiṣedhe viśeṣapratiṣedhe ca kṛtakatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7148: tathā ca na hetorvyatireka upanayaḥ syādityāha---pariśeṣāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7154: sādhye śabde sādhanasya kṛtakatvasya sthālīgatasya yaḥ sarvathābhāvaḥ sthālītvādyekārthasamavāyaḥ tamāśritya na pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7155: tathā ca śabdasthālyoḥ abhedaprasaṅgād yathā tathetyeva na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7157: nanvevamapi kṛtakatvasāmānyamātraṃ śabde syāt, na tu yathā tathābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7158: tathā ca na hetoratireka ityuktamityata āha---kṛtakatvasāmānyaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:7159: na hi jātu śāvaleyasannidhau gotvasāmānyamātraṃ bhavati, api tu viśeṣasahitam /
GSP29nystik_u:7161: etena yat parairupanayasya dṛṣṭāntādabhinnatvaṃ varṇitam, tadapi
GSP29nystik_u:7165: vyāptipradarśanaviṣayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāvyāptikasya hetoḥ sādhyadharmiṇyupasaṃhāra upanaya iti mahān bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7167: pratyuktam, pratijñāyāḥ sādhyaparatvāt nigamanasya ca viparītaśaṅkānivṛttiparatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7169: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa ekasminnanvayavyatirekiṇyeva vītāvītavākye pañcāvayave udāhṛte /
GSP29nystik_u:7170: tatra kadācid bhrāntiḥ syādekodāharaṇatayā dve api vākye parasparāpekṣe eveti, tannirākaraṇāyāha---te ete iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7177: //40// tarkapravṛttikramamāha---avijñāyamānatattve 'rthe iti yadyapi saṃśayasya paścādeva jijñāsā bhavati, tathāpi jijñāsāyāḥ parastādapi
GSP29nystik_u:7180: tarkeṇa hi prasaṅgāparanāmnā dvayoḥ pakṣayorekataraniṣedhenaikataraḥ pramāṇaviṣayatayā abhyanujñātavya iti viṣayapratyāsattyā tarkapravṛttiṃ pratyaṅgatā saṃśayasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7186: etaduktaṃ bhavati, yasmin viṣaye pramāṇaṃ pravartitumudyataṃ tadviparyayāśaṅkāyāṃ na tāvat pramāṇaṃ pravartate, na yāvadaniṣṭyāpattyā viparyayāśaṅkā apanīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7187: tadapanaya eva ca svaviṣaye pramāṇasaṃbhava iti copapattiriti vyākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7188: tayā pramāṇasyopapattyā itikartavyatayā pramāṇaviṣayamabhyanujānatyā viśodhite viṣaye pramāṇāmapratyūhaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7189: na copapattirevāstu niścayahetuḥ kṛtaṃ pramāṇeneti vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7193: svakṛtasya karmaṇa ityādinā pūrvasya kāraṇamityantena saṃsāro darśitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7195: tena saṃsārāpavargāvicchantau vādiprativādinau prati ātmanityatvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravartamānamanena tarkeṇānugṛhyata iti pramāṇaviṣayaviparyayānanujñaiva ca pramāṇaviṣayābhyanujñā,
GSP29nystik_u:7197: ata evānte bhāṣyakāra upasaṃjahāra---yatra kāraṇam anupapadyamānaṃ paśyati, tat nānujānātīti
GSP29nystik_u:7198: nanu yadi tarka evametat, netaradityevamākāraḥ, kathaṃ punarayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tu tattvajñānameveteti deśayati---kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7201: bhāvitāt cintitāt, ata eva prasannāt nirmalānditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7203: syādetat---yadi na tarkastattvaniścayasādhanamapi tu pramāṇameva, hanta bhoḥ kimarthaṃ tarhi vāde pramāṇatarkasādhanetyuktamityata āha---so 'yaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7210: yadyapi saṃśayajijñāse apyavijñātatattve 'rthe pravartete, tathāpi na kāraṇopapattita iti tayorvyavaccheda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7222: yuktamiti pratijñāmātreṇocyate, na tvatra hetuḥ abhidhīyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7225: jñeyena hi jñānaṃ nirūpyate na jñātrā, tasya sādhāraṇyāditi sāmarthyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7229: nādyāpi anena svābhiprāyo darśita iti mattvā punaścodayati---anukte 'pīti
GSP29nystik_u:7232: etaduktaṃ bhavati, sāmarthyaprāptasyānabhidhāne 'tiprasaṅga iti na sāmarthyamāśritya lakṣaṇe saṃśayo nirākaraṇīya iti tannirākaraṇārthamarthagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:7234: na hi tattve jñāte tattvajñānārthitā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7240: yadyapi nāsmākaṃ rāddhānte śuśrūṣādayo buddhidharmā buddhitattvasyaivābhāvāt, tathāpyātmaguṇā api sāṃkhyābhiprāyeṇa buddhiguṇā uktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7241: etaduktaṃ bhavati, yadyūhastarka ityetāvaducyeta, yadi vā tattvajñānārthamūhastarka ityetāvanmātram, tato vijñāte 'pi tattve ya ūhaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7242: pūrvānubhūtaparicchedātmā jāyate punastattvajñānārthaṃ so 'pi tarkaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7244: yadyapi kāraṇopapattita ityetasmādayamartho 'pi gamyata eva, tathāpi kāraṇopapatterevaivaṃrūpatvaṃ nāvijñātatattvagrahaṇamantareṇa bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7245: tathā hi adhigataparicchedātmāpyūhaḥ kāraṇasyopapattyā saṃbhavena jāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7248: tathā ca sati pramāṇamapi tarkaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7250: ukte sati prayojanānusaraṇam, na tviha lāghavādaraḥ sūtrakārasyeti mantavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:7258: nityatvādayo viśeṣāḥ samavāyino vahnyādayaśca dhūmādisaṃyogina iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7262: anye tvanumānameva yuktyapekṣaṃ viparyaye 'niṣṭaprasaṅgāpekṣaṃ tarka iti varṇayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:7264: ākṣipta ākṣiptahṛdayaḥ, na tu tarkapratyayasvarūpaṃ cetayata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7265: viśeṣadarśanāditi viśeṣadarśanāt niścayaḥ pramāṇena bhavati na tarkeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:7268: yadi saṃśayāt pracyuto nirṇayaṃ cāprāptaḥ, tarhi tasya svarūpaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7280: nanu yadeva kiścit svaviṣayādhigame anumānamapekṣate saivāpekṣaṇīyā yuktiranumānasya bhaviṣyatītyata āha---svaviṣayadhigame ceti //
GSP29nystik_u:7283: yadyutpattau pratyakṣāgamāpekṣam anumānam, na vaktavyaṃ yuktyapekṣamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:7288: anumānabhedasya cedṛśasya pramāṇa evāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7295: yuktaṃ vyatirekiṇi jīvaccharīre dharmiṇi prāṇādimattvasya sādhanadharmasya
GSP29nystik_u:7296: darśanāt, na tu yadyutpattimān ātmā abhaviṣyat, na saṃsārāpavargāvupapatsyetāmityatrātmani dharmiṇi sādhanadharma utpattirasti yaddarśanataḥ saṃskārodbodhe sati liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhasmṛtirbhavedityarthaḥ na kevalaṃ prasaṅgasādhanaṃ sādhyadharmiṇyasiddham, api tvanyagatameva prasaṅgahetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7297: na tvanumānamanyagatād dharmāt pravartate, tasmādanumānādasya sphuṭo bheda
GSP29nystik_u:7302: sa ca nirṇayabhedo vimarśānantarotpannatarkasahāyapramāṇanibandhanastarkaviṣaya eveti nirṇayabhedalakṣaṇamiti nāvyāpakaṃ tatra tallakṣaṇamiti darśayituṃ bhāṣyakāro nirṇayalakṣaṇamavatārayati---etasmiśca tarkaviṣaye //
GSP29nystik_u:7303: vimṛ---yaḥ //42// atra pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ karmatayā na nirṇayasādhanatvamityanupapattyā sādhanopālambhau vādasūtragatau lakṣaṇīyaviti tāveva tāvad bhāṣyakṛd vibhajate---sthāpanā sādhanam,
GSP29nystik_u:7306: yadyapyupālambho na pratipakṣāśritaḥ, tathāpi taduddeśena pravṛttastadāśrita ityucyate
GSP29nystik_u:7313: yasya sādhanasya vā upālambhasya vāvasthānam, tasya sādhanasya vā
GSP29nystik_u:7314: upālambhasya vā yo 'rthaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā tasyāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7319: dvitīyasya prativādinaḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ vādyuktasya hetordūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:7321: dvitīyena tu prativādinā vādyuktasya hetoḥ sthāpanāhetutvaṃ pratiṣidhyate
GSP29nystik_u:7323: sa vādino vā prativādino vā heturvopālambho vā nivartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7324: tasmin nivṛtte yo 'vatiṣṭhate ekaḥ, tenārthanirṇayaḥ, na dvābhyām /
GSP29nystik_u:7326: na tāvat saṃśayaviṣaye nirṇaye vādiprativādinau staḥ, tayorniścitayoreva pravṛtteḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7328: vādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavaḥ prativādina upālambhasya asaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7329: evaṃ prativādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavo vādina upālambhasyāsaṃbhava iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7336: na nirṇayamātrasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamapi tu parīkṣāviṣayasyetyāha---na cāyaṃ nirṇaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7339: na hi jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ svargādisaṃbandhanirṇaye āgamena kartavye vimarśo
GSP29nystik_u:7340: 'sti, nāpi vādajalpavitaṇḍāsu vimarśaḥ, niścitayoreva vādiprativādinostatra pravṛtterityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7346: nanu bhavatu pakṣaśabdalakṣitasya sādhanasya nirṇayaṃ prati karaṇatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:7347: pratipakṣalakṣitasya tu taddūṣaṇasya na sākṣātsādhakatvamityata āha---pratipakṣācceti hetutvaṃ pāramparyeṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7351: atra pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeveti prathamaḥ kalpaḥ, tadā hi yata evakāraḥ tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇamiti nirṇaye niyamo bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:7352: nirṇaya eveti dvitīyaḥ kalpaḥ, tadā hi pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmityatra niyamaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7353: vimṛśyaiveti ca tṛtīyaḥ, tadāpi nirṇaye niyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7355: tasmin vikalpe nirṇayaḥ pakṣapratipakṣavimarśātilaṅghanenānyatra na pravartata iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ nirṇayaphalaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7356: na hi tatra pakṣapratipakṣau, nāpi vimarśa iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7360: tadā nirṇayasyāniyamāt pakṣapratipakṣau ca tadabhāvaśceti tadubhayam,
GSP29nystik_u:7364: na nirṇayamātrasyedaṃ lakṣaṇam, api tu nirṇayaviśeṣasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7365: na nirṇaya iti na nirṇayamātra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7369: pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeva vāde nirṇayo na tu vimarśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7370: śāstre tu nirṇaya eva na tu tatra śāstrātiriktaṃ sādhanāntaramāśrīyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7372: lakṣaṇāyāṃ hi yena yat lakṣyate tadavacchedakatayā tadapi buddhau sannidhīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7373: tataśca tena niyamo bhavati lakṣyamāṇasya, yathā gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7377: arthagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe kālpanikatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, na cākalpitaṃ viruddhadharmavadityekataranirṇayaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7380: pṛcchati--etasminniti, prathamaṃ sādhanam, dvitīyaṃ dūṣaṇam, tṛtīyaṃ samādhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:7382: kadācit prathame kadācid dvitīye kadācit tṛtīye ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7386: taṃ nivartyaṃ vādinaḥ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇena nivartya prativādī svapakṣe sādhanaṃ bravīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7392: yadi nirṇayamātramanumānamucyeta, tadā na tasya sarvasya liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhasmṛtyapekṣatvamiti
GSP29nystik_u:7393: yadi tu liṅgaparāmarśo nirṇayaḥ, tasya cāsti liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhāpekṣeti
GSP29nystik_u:7395: sāmānyavyāpto viśeṣaḥ sāmānyanivṛttyā nivartate, śiṃśapātvamiva vṛkṣatvanivṛttyā /
GSP29nystik_u:7396: na ca phale pramitirūpe nirṇaye pramākaraṇatvaṃ phalatve nāstīti nānumānatvaṃ tadviśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7397: itaścānumānāt nirṇayo bhidyate ityāha--nirṇayaḥ svaviṣaya eveti na hi nirṇayo nirṇayatvena pratipattyanubandhibhūtād viṣayādanyatra, anumānaṃ tu tatra cānyatra ca /
GSP29nystik_u:7398: yadānumeyo 'gnireva heyatvādibhiḥ paricchidyate 'gnijñānenānumānena, yadā tu dhūmajñānenāgniranumīyate tadānyatra ceti gamayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7401: NyS_1,2.1: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7408: vādādayaśca kathāviśeṣā ityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7409: nāyaṃ kathāmātraniyamo yena bṛhatkathādīnām akathātvaṃ syāt, api tu yannānāpravaktṛke vicāre vasati tad vicāravastu /
GSP29nystik_u:7411: tasyāḥ kathāyā eṣa niyamaḥ tisra eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:7412: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkavicāraviṣayā vākyasaṃdṛbdhiḥ katheti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha iti sūtrāvayavena sūcitamityetadapyarthāduktaṃ bhavatīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7413: yad vastu vicāryate ityarthābhidhānamātram, na tu vicāravastvityasya
GSP29nystik_u:7426: anena tasya viśeṣaṇam ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:7427: yadyapi vitaṇḍāyāmapi pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho 'sti, tathāpi pratipakṣasādhanaṃ nāsti tasyāḥ sthāpanāhīnatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7428: yadyapi ca jalpe 'pi pakṣapratipakṣasādhanamasti, tathāpi na pramāṇamūlairavayavaistarkeṇa ca sādhanopālambhāviti jalpavitaṇḍabhyāṃ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhagrahaṇena vyavacchedaḥ yathā caitat tathopariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate //
GSP29nystik_u:7431: tarkasyetikarttavyatārūpasya pramāṇānugrāhakatayā pramāṇamūlā avayavāstarkamūlā api bhavanti
GSP29nystik_u:7432: tathā ca tarkasyāpi sādhanopālambhahetubhāvaḥ siddho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7436: na ca te pramāṇatarkābhyām, tayoḥ svapratipattihetutvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7443: na pratipakṣaviṣaya upālambho nāpi tatsādhanaviṣayaḥ, tayorvastunoḥ svakāraṇādutpannayoḥ sadā tadrūpatvena puruṣadharmopālambhānāspadatvādityākṣepārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7445: dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā karma, tasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7446: tasya dharmiṇo vāstavaṃ tādṛśatvamatādṛśatvaṃ vā karaṇasya tu karmaiva viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7447: tatra ca karmakaraṇe samarthe eva, nāsamarthe /
GSP29nystik_u:7450: yathā ākāśe niśātamasiṃ vyāpārayataḥ puruṣasyāparādho nākāśasya śabde
GSP29nystik_u:7455: vacana upacaryate na tu pakṣe pakṣadvāreṇānudbhāvanāditi siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:7456: yathāyamarthaḥ sūtrapadebhyo labhyate tathā praśnapūrvakaṃ darśayati---kathaṃ punariti
GSP29nystik_u:7464: evakāreṇa chalādisādhanopālambhatvaṃ vādasya vyavacchidyate, tathā ca jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ vyavacchedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7465: etaduktaṃ bhavati, tarkānugṛhītapramāṇamūlā avayavāḥ paramārthato bhavantu mā bhūvan,
GSP29nystik_u:7470: yathā cāsya śāstre vyutpādanaṃ nāsadṛśaṃ yathā caiṣa satāmācāraḥ, tathā jalpalakṣaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7477: yadyupālambhagrahaṇasya nigrahasthānavidhānaṃ prayojanam, hanta bho na
GSP29nystik_u:7478: jalpād vādasya viśeṣaḥ, kṛtaṃ cottarābhyāṃ padābhyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7484: bhāṣyamate dūṣite pṛṣṭvā svamatena vyācaṣṭe---atha kimidaṃ padamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7488: adhikaṃ tu na yadyapi tattvapratipattiṃ sākṣād
GSP29nystik_u:7489: vyāhanti, tathāpi tatprayojanānusaraṇe paraḥ pratipattā samākulitabuddhirna tattvaṃ pratipattumarhatītyadhikasyāpi tattvapratipattividhātahetutvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7490: tattvabubhutsuriti jigīṣutāṃ nirākaroti, na hi gurvādiṣu jigīṣāsaṃbhavaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7493: pratidvandvini tu na vādaḥ, api tu jalpavitaṇḍe /
GSP29nystik_u:7495: pāramārthikāt tarkasahitāt pramāṇādekasmin viṣaye sādhanopālambhayoḥ saṃbhave viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitamekadā vastu prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7497: vāde 'bhiprāyo niyamyate vādiprativādinoḥ prāmāṇikadhiyā sādhanopālambhau tābhyāṃ prayoktavyau, nāprāmāṇikadhiyā jalpavitaṇḍayoriva /
GSP29nystik_u:7499: tathā ca vāde abuddhipūrvaṃ chalādiprayoge tadudbhāvanamapi saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7507: na hi pañcāvayavopapannatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca tadanugrāhakaṃ ca tarkamantareṇa bhavatīti pañcāvayavopapannatvādeva pramāṇatarkapratilambhe sādhanopālambhayorvyatiṣaṅgajñāpanāyāvaśyaṃ sādhanopālambhagrahaṇaṃ tāvat
GSP29nystik_u:7509: anyathaikaḥ svasthānasthita eva śabdasyānityatvaṃ prati pañcāvayavopapannaṃ vākyaṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP29nystik_u:7510: aparo 'pi tādṛśaḥ śabdanityatā prati tādṛśameva vākyaṃ prayuṅkte iti so 'pi vādaḥ prasajyeta
GSP29nystik_u:7520: vādagato nigraho na jalpe, jalpagataśca nigraho na vāda iti sa mā vijñāyati /
GSP29nystik_u:7524: tadevaṃ svābhimataṃ vādalakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyāya vāsubandhavaṃ lakṣaṇa
GSP29nystik_u:7530: pūrvaḥ pakṣo 'yuktaḥ, pakṣa uttarastu yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7535: na tāvad bhūmidhanādiṣviva svocitāsu arthakriyāsu yatheṣṭaviniyogayogyatvaṃ svatvamarjanāpāditamanityatvādinā pratijñāte śabdādau saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7540: api copakārakatvena vyāptaṃ satvaṃ goghaṭādiṣu tathā darśanāt, pakṣāt nivartamānamupakārakatvaṃ svatvamapi svavpāpyaṃ nivartayati vṛkṣatvamiva
GSP29nystik_u:7545: api cedaṃ viśeṣaṇapadaṃ viśeṣyaṃ sāmānyataḥ prasṛtaṃ viśeṣe 'vasthāpayati
GSP29nystik_u:7546: na vā? avasthāpayatīti cet? na sādhanīyamātrārthatā svapakṣaśabdasya, na ced viśeṣaṇaṃ vyarthamityāha---vyavacchedārthaṃ cedamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7547: nanu ca viśeṣyaśabdo viśeṣaṇayogāt viśeṣe vartamāno 'pi sāmānyaśabda eva,
GSP29nystik_u:7548: tataśca śaknoti samānamarthaṃ vaktumiti codayati---sāmānyaśabdā apīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7551: varuddhopadarśanena sphuṭā pratītirbhavatīti ayuktapratipādanārthaṃ yuktasyāpyupanyāsa iti
GSP29nystik_u:7552: yadi na pakṣeṇa dūṣaṇaṃ saṃbadhyate kastarhi tasya viṣaya iti
GSP29nystik_u:7561: narte prayojanādiṣṭaṃ mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanam iti hi gāthā bhavatāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7563: lakṣaṇe tato varamevaṃ kriyatāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lāghavāyetyāha---yadi ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7570: nanu na dūṣaṇamātraṃ saṃbadhyate, asiddhyarthamiti ca dūṣaṇamātrābhidhānam,
GSP29nystik_u:7575: te sādhanadūṣaṇaiḥ svaparaśabdāḥ saṃbadhyante iti sūtre hi niyameva svapakṣe sādhanaṃ parapakṣe dūṣaṇamuktam, tathā cottarapakṣe dūṣaṇīya
GSP29nystik_u:7577: evaṃ pūrvapakṣo 'ti sādhanīya eveti, uttarapakṣavādino 'pi sādhanīyo na dūṣaṇīyaḥ syādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7578: api cāyuktasya pūrvapakṣasya sādhaṇaṃ yuktasya cottarapakṣasya dūṣaṇamiti viparītaprasaṅga ityāha---svapakṣaścottarapakṣavādinaḥ pūrvapakṣāt ayuktapakṣāt anyaḥ yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7585: na kevalaṃ viśeṣyāt pṛthak svārtho viśeṣaṇaṃ nāvadhāryate, api tvanyasmādapi na bhidyate ityāśayavānāha---bhedācceti
GSP29nystik_u:7587: na kevalaṃ patyurviśeṣyāt senā na bhidyate 'pi tu tato 'nyebhyo 'pi
GSP29nystik_u:7589: evaṃ pānakamapi na kevalaṃ tadaṅgebhyo jīrakādibhyaḥ, api tvanyebhyo 'pi phalasalilādibhya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7591: uktaṃ nismṛtya śaṅkatī---atha manyase svārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7595: api ca svaḥ pakṣo yasya sādhayituḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7598: sādhanīyārthatā tu bhaviṣyati, yathā ca samāsopapattiriti codayati---nanu
GSP29nystik_u:7601: api ca pakṣāt svapakṣabhede sūtrāntaravyāghāto 'bhede vā etasya vyāghāta
GSP29nystik_u:7603: api ca vākyasamāsayoḥ samāso jyāyān lāghavādityāha---āstāṃ tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7605: siddhyasiddhyarthamityayaṃ samāsaḥ svaparapakṣayoḥ pratyekaṃ na saṃbandhārtha ityarthāt kasyacit siddhiḥ kasyacidasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7610: anityatve 'pi samāsavidheḥ samāsa eva vigrahāt jyāyāniti codyasamādhānābhyāṃ darśayati---anitya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7611: bhavatu goravamevamapi ko doṣa ityata āha---arthaṅgatyarthaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7614: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP29nystik_u:7616: iti atarthakaprayogaścānapekṣitaḥ śiṣyairiti teṣāmaśāsanāt na śāstraṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7625: siddhirjñānaṃ tasya pakṣo viṣayaḥ, āśrayāstu prāśnikā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7627: na tāvat jñānaṃ pakṣaviṣayaṃ prāśnikādhikaraṇaṃ ceti bauddharāddhānte
GSP29nystik_u:7639: yāvat pakṣaviṣayaṃ sādhanaṃ na prayujyate tāvadyadyadhikaraṇapratyāyanaṃ tataḥ sādhanaprayogāt prāgadhikaraṇapratyāyanamastīti vādavaiyarthaṃ sādhanadūṣaṇaprayogo 'narthakaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7646: mañcasthāḥ krośantīti vaktavye vināpi prayojanaṃ mañcāḥ krośantītyupacāro dṛṣṭa ityata
GSP29nystik_u:7649: nanvihāpi vināpi prayojanaṃ pramāṇāsaṃbhavamātreṇopacāro mañcāḥ krośantītivadbhaviṣyatītyata āda---lokaprayukteti lokaprayuktaśabdārthavat
GSP29nystik_u:7650: upacāro 'pi laukiko na prayojanābhāvena śakyo 'pavadituṃ na lokaḥ paryanuyojyo yataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7651: idānīntanastu asmadādiprayogaḥ prayojanābhāve na śakyaḥ paryanuyoktumityāśayenāha---na cedaṃ laukikamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:7658: yataḥ tayoḥ pakṣadharmatvāt etadbhavati siddhaḥ pakṣo 'siddhaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7660: naiva draṣṭrādhāratā jñānasya viṣayatā ca bauddharāddhānte saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7662: asti khalvālayajñānaṃ yadupāśritya ṣaḍapi pravṛttijñānāni jāyante /
GSP29nystik_u:7665: na pakṣasya tadviṣayatvāt tasyāpīti cet, kaḥ punarayaṃ viṣayabhāvaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:7668: jñānaprakāśyatvaṃ viṣayatvamiti cet---na, jñānenārthe prakāśājananāt tasmāt jñānasya tadasamavāyinaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7671: punaḥ śaṅkate---atha tathātathāne iti pramāṇayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7677: tatraivābhidhānapratyayāviti prameyadharmāvucyete vyaktyavyaktī, na tu pramātṛdharmāviti
GSP29nystik_u:7681: iha sūtre dhananimittādivacanatārthaśabdasya na saṃbhavatīti trayamavaśiṣyata iti tredhā pravartata ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:7682: sādhanaṃ sādhanābhāso dūṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti caturvidhaṃ vākyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7685: granthāntare yuktāyuktatvena viśeṣaṇāt caturvidhavākyasaṃgrahārtho hyuddeśe arthaśabdo vyākhyātaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7686: na ca yuktāyuktatvaviśeṣaṇe caturvidhavākyasaṃgraho bhavati sādhanābhāsasaṃbandhinaḥ pakṣasya yuktatvābhāvāt dūṣaṇābhāsaṃbandhinaśca pratipakṣasyāyuktatvābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7687: atha na sādhanādiyogo 'pi tu sādhyadharma eva sādhanānapekṣo yuktāyuktatvamiti śaṅkate---atha punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7690: yadi pratyāyanaṃ siddhiḥ pratītiḥ, tathāpi sā pratyāyyā na saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7691: atha karaṇam? tathāpi karma karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7695: na hi vahniriti gṛhītaḥ khadyoto dahati pacati vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7704: na cānyo 'rthaśabdasya viṣayaḥ saṃbhavati, na hi siddhirdhanaṃ vā svaparapakṣayoḥ sādhanaṃ vā nivṛttirvā saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7711: avācakapadaprayogāt sādhanadūṣaṇābhāsavādinaśca vāditvena lokasiddhasyāvāditvāpādanāt siddhyasiddhiśabdayośca vādatvāpādanārthatvādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7715: na hi pakṣavyatirekeṇaṃ pakṣādhāraṃ sādhyaṃ jñānamanyad vā siddhiśabdābhidheyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7717: pakṣādhāratvānupapatteḥ, pakṣasya tu bhavet kenacit saṃbandhena yādṛśatādṛśenetyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7722: api ca yuktāyuktārthābhyāmabhede sādhanadūṣaṇapadamanarthakaṃ te ityanenaiva yuktāyuktatvāvamarṣiṇā gatārthatvādityāha---yuktāyuktatvaśabdābhyāṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7723: atha na paryāyatā, api tu sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7724: yuktāyuktatve sāmānyam, sādhanadūṣaṇe ca viśeṣa iti śaṅkate---atha manyase iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7728: na khalu yogo nāma bauddhānāṃ sādhyasādhanavṛttirdūṣyadūṣaṇavṛttirvā kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7729: api ca sāṃvṛto 'pi yogaḥ sādhyasādhanajñānādhīnanirūpaṇatayā nānirūpite
GSP29nystik_u:7730: sādhye nirūpito bhavati, nirūpaṇaṃ ca nirṇaya iti yoganirūpaṇāt prāk
GSP29nystik_u:7736: yuktāyuktatvenādhikaraṇapratyāyanamiti yuktāyuktatvayoḥ karaṇatvaṃ darśitam tat tathātvātathātvapakṣe na saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7739: na tu vyavacchedasya paricchedasya sādhane iti //
GSP29nystik_u:7747: na khalvādhyātmikaśaktisaṃpannaḥ samāhitaḥ samagre sādhanaprayoge sati santamarthaṃ na pratipadyata iti saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7748: tathāvidhenāpi cet pratipattrā so 'rtho 'nyathā pratipannaḥ, kathamasau tathā sinnatyabhidhīyate ityāha---kathaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7753: na cāyamunajñāniṣedho na pratipadyate iti vāde vītarāgakathātvena jigīṣāyā abhāvāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7760: vādasya jalpavitaṇḍābhyāmabhedam abhipretya codayati---yadā tu nāyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7769: sūtroktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vṛttau āha---tadarthaṃ vacanaṃ siddhyasiddhyarthamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7772: prāśnikā eva tāvad vāde na santi, abhyupetya uktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7779: na hi daivamilitaṃ kāraṇam, mā bhūd gardabho 'pi dhūmasya kāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7780: codayati, yadi prāśnikā na santi tadvāda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7781: tayorvādiprativādinorvādasya parīkṣā kā kasya ca tayorvādasya kva ca, asau parīkṣā prāśnikābhāve hi vādatatparīkṣātadadhikaraṇānāmajñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7783: vītarāgau hi vādiprativādināveva vādasvarūpajñānaṃ ca tatparīkṣāṃ ca kartuṃ śaknutaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7784: tat kimatra prāśnikaiḥ? sādhanaprayogaḥ pakṣaviṣayaḥ, dūṣaṇaprayogaḥ sthāpanāviṣayaḥ iti vādasvarūpam
GSP29nystik_u:7786: tadarthaṃ parīkṣārthaṃ tasmin vāde 'dhikāro vītarāgayoreva vādiprativādinoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7788: tasmāt saptamyartho 'dhikaraṇārthaḥ parābhimataḥ prāśnika iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:7790: yadapi vṛttau coditaṃ yadi siddhyasiddhyarthaṃ vacanaṃ vādaḥ, tataḥ prāśnikaprativādinoḥ priyāpriyavacasi rathyāvāde prasaṅga iti
GSP29nystik_u:7792: na hi priyāpriyavacasaḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā siddhyasiddhyarthatā, nāpi sādhanadūṣaṇayuktāyuktatvaviśeṣaṇasaṃbandhaḥ tasmādevaṃvādī nottarārhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7799: yadi tvavaśyam uttaraṃ vācyam, tato varamevaṃ vaktavyamityāha---yadi tviti
GSP29nystik_u:7800: seyaṃ sūkṣmekṣikā parairiha kṛteti tadanubandhena vārttikakṛtāpi kṛteti//1
GSP29nystik_u:7803: atrāpi samānajātīyābhyāṃ vādavitaṇḍābhyāmasamānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyo vyavacchedo jalpasya sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7806: nigrahasthānaniyamasya pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhābhiprāyaniyamasya ca jalpe 'bhāvāt, bhāve vā vādajalpayorabhedaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7807: vādalakṣaṇasya ca jalpavyāpakatvena vyabhicāraprasaṅgād yathoktopapanna ityetadanupapannamityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7811: na hyasau sūtrapadaśravaṇamātrāt pratīyate, api tu tadarthe pratīte tasyānyataḥ siddhau satyāṃ gamyata iti pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha ityetadatidiśyata iti uktamātropalakṣaṇaparam /
GSP29nystik_u:7812: tena pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha pañcāvayavopapannaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha ityetasya vādapadavarjaṃ samastasya lakṣaṇasyātideśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7816: na niyamārthe pade ityupalakṣaṇam, na pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhapadalabhyo 'bhiprāyaniyama
GSP29nystik_u:7819: yathā gobhiryukto ratho goratha iti yuktapadalopa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7821: iha vādalakṣaṇaṃ paṭhatā bhāṣyakāreṇa niyamo 'pyatidiṣṭa iti
GSP29nystik_u:7825: jalpalakṣaṇānukūlo yaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ, tato 'rthasvarūpamātraṃ pratīyate na tvārtho 'rtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7827: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa chalādīnāṃ niṣedhārthatayā sādhanāṅgabhāvamākṣipya parapakṣavighātena svapakṣarakṣaṇādaṅgabhāva iti darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:7829: tat kiṃ nigrahasthānānyapyayuktāni, ca caitacchakyamityata āha---chalaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7835: na hi sahasreṇāpyandhaiḥ pāṭaccarebhyo gṛhaṃ rakṣyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7839: tathāpi teṣāṃ tattvam avidvān ebhirahaṃ sādhanaṃ vihaniṣyāmītyanayā buddhyā upahṛtaḥ vyāmohitaḥ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7841: yatra tveṣāṃ tattvaṃ vidvān pravartate, na sa vādaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7842: kiṃ tu jalpo vitaṇḍā vetyāha---yatra caitānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7843: nanu jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ prayogāt sādhanamaṅgaṃ vā syādata
GSP29nystik_u:7845: nanu yadi na sādhanamaṅgaṃ vā, kasmāt tarhi jalpavitaṇḍayoreṣāṃ prayoga ityata āha---sādhusādhanopādāne ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7846: sādhusādhanopādāne ca vādinā kṛte pareṇa prativādinā jigīṣuṇākulitabuddhirdrāk pāramārthikamuttaramapratipadyamānaścchalādīni prayuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:7858: pūrvavādipakṣāpekṣayā prativādina ātmīya eva pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7863: tayorekataraṃ prativādī ātmīyaṃ pakṣaṃ na sthāyapatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7868: pratipakṣaḥ, evaṃ vādipakṣo 'pi prativādipakṣāpekṣayā pratipakṣa ityubhayapakṣasthāpanāhīnā vitaṇḍeti syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7871: prathamapakṣavādino hi sthāpanāyā abhāve kiṃ vaitaṇḍika
GSP29nystik_u:7872: āhanti? na ca pakṣaḥ śakya āhantum /
GSP29nystik_u:7873: tasmāt prathamapakṣavādino 'sti sthāpaneti dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ sthāpanāhīna iti samārthyād yuktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7878: vaitaṇḍiko 'pi hi vādī pāriśeṣyāt matpakṣaḥ setsyatīti buddhyā
GSP29nystik_u:7880: tasmāt parapakṣapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyam asya pakṣaḥ parapakṣaniṣedhena pāriśeṣyāt pakṣasiddhihetutvādupacārataḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7891: na tāvadasthāpyamānasyāpi sthāpanārhatālakṣaṇā pakṣatā na yujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7894: tathā ca caturvargābhyupagame virodho 'nabhyupagame vā nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka iti prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7896: yastu manyate caturvargābhyupagame 'pi dūṣaṇamātraṃ vitaṇḍetyeva vaktavyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7901: tadanenārthato yad vai khalvityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam //3 //
GSP29nystik_u:7903: uddeśakramānurodhena vitaṇḍānantaraṃ hetvābhāsesu lakṣayitavyeṣu arthākṣiptasāmānyalakṣaṇameṣāṃ vibhāgoddeśaparaṃ sūtram---savya--sāḥ // 4
GSP29nystik_u:7904: tadvyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ samākhyāniruktivaśena sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayan vārttikāraḥ paṭhati---hetulakṣaṇābhāvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:7906: na hyanyasyānyatvamātreṇa sādṛśyam, mā bhūt sarvasya sarveṇa sādṛśyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7914: tadetat catuḥṣaṣṭidvitayamaṣṭāviṃśaṃ śataṃ pūrvayā triṣoḍaśyā saha ṣaṭsaptaṃ śatam /
GSP29nystik_u:7929: yadi bāhyakaraṇapratyakṣe vāṅmanase iti sādhyeta tadā nānityatvaṃ sapakṣavyāpakaṃ syāt, sāmānye bāhyakaraṇapratyakṣe 'bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7933: tajjātīyaikadeśavṛttitvamamūrtatvasya darśayituṃ yatra na vartate tatpuraḥsaramudāharaṇaṃ rūpādivaditi //
GSP29nystik_u:7943: nanu cākṣuṣatvaṃ vipakṣavṛtti samavāyasyānāśritasya cākṣuṣatvādityata uktam---aulūkyapakṣe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7947: nirapekṣaṃ khalu kṛtakatvamanityatve sādhye samartham, prameyatvaṃ tvanyāpekṣam asamarthamityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7949: vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena tu dviṣoḍaśī yadā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāsiddhyā cobhayasaṃpratipannayā asamarthaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā sandigdhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā cobhayasaṃpratipannayā vikriyate tadā catuḥṣaṣṭhitrayeṇa dvānavataṃ śataṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7951: tadidam anyatarāsiddhā ityanena vārttikakṛtā sūcitam, dvābhyāmūnā triṃśad dvātriṃśaditi kathañcid vyutpattyā /
GSP29nystik_u:7952: te punarvyāpakāvyāpakā vyadhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavyadhikaraṇasandigdadhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavyadhikaraṇāsamarthaviśe ṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedena catuḥṣaṣṭitrayeṇa dvānavataṃ śatamaparam //
GSP29nystik_u:7956: te punaraprasiddhāśrayāḥ pūrvavadbhedena vyadhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasandigdhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasamarthaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedena catuḥṣaṣṭitraye sati dvānavataṃ śatam /
GSP29nystik_u:7957: tadevamanantarābhyāṃ dvānavataśatābhyāṃ śatatrayaṃ caturaśītaṃ yat tadevāṣṭāviṃśakaśatābhyāṃ dvānavatena ca śatena saṃpiṇḍitaṃ dvātriṃśaduttarāṣṭaśatī vikārabhūtā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7961: uktaṃ hi prāg yathā na deśo 'gnimattayā sādhyo 'pi tu dhūmaviśeṣa eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:7966: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatve sati kṛtakatvāditi kṛtakatvasyaiva viśeṣyasya sāmarthyādasamarthamanityatve
GSP29nystik_u:7968: vyadhikaraṇatayā asiddhaṃ ca koṣṭhavāyutālvādikriyāyāṃ eva prayatnānantarīyakatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:7969: na tvādyasyāpi śabdasya, prāgeva tu śrotrasamavāyina
GSP29nystik_u:7977: kevalavyadhikaraṇaviśeṣyāṇāmudāharaṇam asti pradhānaṃ bhedānāṃ goghaṭādīnāṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvenānvayadarśanāditi
GSP29nystik_u:7981: candanaśabdādatyantaṃ vibhinnārthāḥ samudāyasamudāyyasaṃbhave sati rūpādīnāmarthānāṃ rūpādiśabdānāṃ ca tena candanaśabdena vyapadiśyamānatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:7982: candanasya rūpādaya iti samudāyasamudāyyasaṃbhavo rūpādiṣu vyapadeśaśca rūpādiśabdeṣviti vyadhikaraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7985: seyaṃ kriyābhyāvṛttiryathā śabdānityatve 'pyupapadyate tathā dvitīye darśayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7987: viśeṣaṇaśabdaḥ tantreṇa viśeṣaṇe viśeṣye ca karmakaraṇasādhanatayā prayukto vartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7988: tena sandigdhaṃ viśeṣaṇam aprasiddhaṃ vyadhikaraṇatayā viśeṣyaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāmudāharaṇamityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7989: yathā sandihyamāne dhūmādibhāve 'gnimān deśo dhūmavattve sati
GSP29nystik_u:7997: ye ye sandigdhāsiddhā vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena dvātriṃśat ta evobhayānyatarāsiddhyā catuḥṣaṣṭirbhavanti tataḥ kimityata āha--te
GSP29nystik_u:8005: punaśca sa evānyathāsiddha āśrayāsiddhavyadhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasandigdhāsamarthaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedāt catuḥṣaṣṭitrayamiti dvānavataśatayugmeva śatatrayaṃ caturaśītam /
GSP29nystik_u:8010: tadevamebhistribhiścaturaśītaiḥ śatatrayairdvipañcāśacchatottaraṃ sahasramekam, dvātriṃśaduttarayā aṣṭaśatyā sahasramekaṃ caturaśītisahitā ca navaśatī /
GSP29nystik_u:8011: tadevaṃ prakṛtibhūtāṣṭā catvāriṃśatprakṣepeṇa saṃpiṇḍitaṃ dvātriṃśe dve sahasre bhavata iti
GSP29nystik_u:8018: vyatirekyekaḥ, anvayavyatirekyapi sapakṣavyāptpavyāptibhyāṃ dvedheti pañca hetavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8019: pañcānāṃ hetūnāṃ sarūpāsarūpapratibandhāt pañca pañcakā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:8023: anvayyādāvekaikasmin sarūpāsarūpāḥ pañca hetavaḥ pratibandhakā iti pañcabhiḥ pañcakaiḥ pañcaviṃśatirviruddhāvyabhicāriṇa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8026: yatparo hi śabdastatrāsau pramāṇam, samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedakaṃ ca lakṣaṇasūtramiti tatraiva pramāṇam na tviyattāyāmatatparatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8029: tadevamarthākṣiptasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgaṃ darśayitvā viśeṣalakṣaṇamavatārayati bhāṣyakāraḥ, teṣāṃ hetvābhāsānāṃ madhye
GSP29nystik_u:8033: taṃ pratyanaikāntika iti lakṣyatirdeśaḥ, savyabhicāra iti lakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:8037: tatra savyabhicāra iti lakṣaṇapadaṃ kakṣīkṛtyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ vyabhicāra ekatrāvyavasthitiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8041: tad vārttikakāraḥ paryudāsābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---ekasminnante niyata aikāntika iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8042: na heturaikāntiko yena tadanyatvena hetvābhāsamātrasaṃgrahādekajātīyatvena hetvābhāsānāṃ vibhāgasūtravirodhaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8043: kiṃ tvekasminnante yo niyataḥ sa aikāntikaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8044: tadviparyayādanaikāntiko 'niyato 'nityatve ca nityatve cānvayena ca vyatirekeṇa cobhayapakṣagāmīti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8046: tadevam anaikāntikaḥ savyabhicāraḥ iti sthite pṛcchati---kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:8048: avagata eṣa vyabhicāra iti, anaikāntikapadavācyatāsya kathamityata āha--anyatra sarvo 'yamiti
GSP29nystik_u:8051: atra bauddhaiḥ yad vikalpya dūṣaṇamuktam, tadupanyasyati--anaikāntika
GSP29nystik_u:8059: bhāvadharmau hi vyabhicārāvyabhicārau nābhāve sarvopākhyāvirahiṇi yujyete ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8062: kevalamayaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhavallabhastamāsthāya sarvaṃ dūṣayatīti tamevāṅgīkṛtya sarvatra brūma ityāśayavataḥ samādhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:8063: na punarabrāhmaṇādāvapi vārtikakārasya prasajyapratiṣedho 'bhimataḥ, kiṃ tu paryudāsa
GSP29nystik_u:8066: na hi prasajyapratiṣedho 'pi tucchaḥ, api tu kasyacid vastuno 'bhāvena
GSP29nystik_u:8070: anityaḥ kumbhaḥ sparśavān dṛṣṭa iti yojanā /
GSP29nystik_u:8072: vaidharmyavyabhicāramāha---dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvamanityatvaṃ ca dharmau na sādhyasādhanabhūtau gṛhyete /
GSP29nystik_u:8073: na hi yadanityaṃ tat sarvaṃ sparśavad buddhyādibhirvyabhicārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8079: tathāpi yadasparśavanna bhavati tannityamapi na bhavatīti vaidharmyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:8089: yadi hi kvacit śāstrapradeśe anaikāntikaḥ kathitaḥ, taddeśātilaṅghanena atrātidiśyamāno viditarūpa iha savyabhicāraṃ lakṣayet,
GSP29nystik_u:8102: no khalūdāharaṇamādriyante parīkṣakāḥ kiṃ tu lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ// 5 //
GSP29nystik_u:8105: na khalu heturacetanaḥ siddhāntamabhyupagacchati, yaścābhyupagacchati cetano nāsāvanyatamena hetulakṣaṇena yujyate iti na hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8106: na ca pakṣaḥ siddhānta iti tadvirodhī na viruddhaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8109: abhyupagamaviṣayamātravivakṣayā ca siddhāntaśabdaḥ prayukto na punaḥ siddhānta eveha vivakṣitaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8110: tena pekṣo 'bhyupagamaviṣaya iti tadvirodhī hetvābhāsaḥ saṃgṛhīto bhavati viśeṣaviruddhasya ca na hetvābhāsatetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8111: na hi viśeṣo 'bhyupagamasya viṣayaḥ, na khalvayaṃ pratijñāpadagocaraḥ, kiṃ tu pratijñārthasya siddhyanuṣaṅgīti nābhyupagamagocara iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8118: yadi hetutvabādhād viruddha ityuktaḥ, hanta, savyabhicārādayo 'pi viruddhāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8120: abādhe vā na hetvābhāsā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8132: tasya vyākhyānam---na nityo vikāra upapadyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8137: virodhasya dvyāśrayatvāt siddhāntena virudhyate ityabhisaṃghāya siddhāntaṃ vyāhantītyuktamityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8139: nanu nityatvapratiṣedhāditi heturvināśapratiṣedhena siddhāntena viruddha iti bruvāṇaḥ śāstravirodhamāpādayati
GSP29nystik_u:8140: tathā ca kālātyayāpadiṣṭo hetvābhāso na viruddha ityata āha---ete te vākye parasparārthabādhite iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8141: dṛḍhatarapramāṇabādhito hi hetuḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭo bhavati, yathā brāhmaṇena surā peyā dravadravyatvāt kṣīravadityayaṃ hetuḥ gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā /
GSP29nystik_u:8142: yathaibaikā tathā sarvā na peyā brahmavādibhiḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8144: prakṛte tu vākye parasparaviruddhārthatayā na pratiṣṭhāṃ labhete, na punaranyataradanyatareṇa śakyaṃ bādhituṃ dvayostulyabalatvāt tasmāt nāyaṃ kālātyayāpadiṣṭa ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8146: so 'yaṃ vikāro vyakterapaitīti pratijñā nityatvapratiṣedhāditi hetunā virudhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8147: vyaktimātrādapaiti, na tu vinaśyatīti hi pratijñārthaḥ apeto 'pyasti
