GSP29nystik_u:16950: tadevaṃ jātyuttaravādinaṃ prati sādhanavādinā sarvatraiva samyak samādhānaṃ svasādhanasya vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:16953: yadi punarvādyapi jātivādinaṃ prati sādhanābhāsena pratayavatiṣṭhate tataḥ ṣaṭpakṣyāṃ satyāṃ na tattvanirṇayāvasānā kathā bhavediti śiṣyahitaḥ sūtrakāraḥ samādhānābhāsavādinaṃ prati ṣaṭpakṣīmavatārayati pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaḥ (sū. 39) //
GSP29nystik_u:16955: yadi cānaikāntikatvādasādhakaṃ vādino vacanaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaḥ /

GSP29nystik_u:16962: evamanityapakṣe utpādo nābhivyaktirityayaṃ viśeṣo na sidhyatyayaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ityarthaḥ // 39 //
GSP29nystik_u:16964: na kevalamasyāṃ jātāvayaṃ samādhānābhāso vādino 'pi tu sarvatraiva jātāviti śiṣyān śikṣayati sūtrakāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:16965: sarvatraivam (sū. 40) // asminsamādhāne prayukte vādinā punarjātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:16967: pratiṣedho jātivādinastasya vipratiṣedho mūlasādhanavādinastasmiṃstulyo doṣa iti jātivādinaḥ pratyavasthānamityarthaḥ // 41 //
GSP29nystik_u:16968: NyS_5,1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā
GSP29nystik_u:16969: atha pañcamaṃ pakṣaṃ sādhanavādinaścaturthapakṣavādinaṃ prati matānujñāpāpādanamāha /
GSP29nystik_u:16970: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā (sū. 42)
GSP29nystik_u:16971: NyS_5,1.43: svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:16972: seyaṃ matānujñā tṛtīye pakṣe pañcamapakṣavādino 'pi sādhana vādina iti jātivādī ṣaṣṭhapakṣasthita āha /
GSP29nystik_u:16973: svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhārahetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamātsamāno doṣaḥ (sū. svapakṣaṇe lakṣyate tadutthānatvājjātiḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇā anaikāntikatvodbhāvanalakṣaṇā tāmabhyupetya anuddhūtya pratiṣedhe 'pi jātilakṣaṇe samāno 'naikāntikatvadoṣa
GSP29nystik_u:16976: tatra cānaikāntikaṃ hetuṃ brūte tadevaṃ svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirddeśe parapakṣe yatsvayaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dattaṃ tasyābhyupagamādvādino 'pi samānova doṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:16977: jātivādino vacanaṃ ṣaṣṭhe pakṣe sthitasya tadevaṃ vistīrya saṃkalayyāha /
GSP29nystik_u:16979: seyaṃ ṣaṭpakṣī samānadoṣāpādanenānirṇāyakatvātpaunaruktyācca na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptā, tasmātsamādhānābhāsena jātivādinaṃ prati na
GSP29nystik_u:16980: pratyavastheyaṃ, kiṃ tu samyak sādhanena, tathā ca ṣaṭrapakṣī
GSP29nystik_u:16983: yadi tvasya kadā citsamyaksādhanavādino 'pi pratibhākṣayātsamādhānaṃ na sphurati tato 'tyantaparājayādvaraṃ saṃśayo 'pīti nyāyena samādhānābhāsenāpi pratyavastheyamevetyāśayavānāha /
GSP29nystik_u:16986: etāstu jātayo na tattvavivekamupakurvanti prayujyamānatayā nirākaraṇīyatayā tvāsāmapyupakāra iti // 41 //

GSP29nystik_u:16991: nyūnamadhikaṃ punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogopasiddhānto hetvābhāsāśca nigrahasthānāni //
GSP29nystik_u:16993: tatra ya evamāhuḥ sarvo 'yaṃ sādhanadūṣaṇaprakāro buddhyārūḍho na vāstava iti /
GSP29nystik_u:16996: kālpanikatve kalpanāyāḥ sarvatra sulabhatvātsādhanadūṣaṇavyavasthā na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:16999: ya āhurasādhanāṅgaṃ vacanamadoṣodbhāvanaṃ dvayornigrahasthānatvamanyattu na yuktamiti tān pratyāha /
GSP29nystik_u:17001: sāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ pratijñāhānyādayo dvārviśatirapi na bhidyante tattvasādhanāṅgaṃ vacanamadoṣodbhāvanamiti bhavadbhiḥ saṃgṛhītamṛṣiṇā ca vipratipattyapratipattibhyāmiti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17004: (549/13) yathā pakṣoddeśena sādhanaṃ pravartamānaṃ pakṣasya evaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:17007: nyūnatādayo hi sarve pakṣoddeśena pravartamānāḥ pakṣasyaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17009: pakṣoddeśena pravṛtteḥ pakṣaviṣayatāṃ nāpajānīmaḥ sākṣāttu tadviṣayatāṃ nirākurmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17011: evaṃ sādhanamapi yatrāsamarthaṃ tatra prayujyamānaṃ na svato duṣyati yatra tu samarthaṃ tatsādhayatyeva tasmātkartureva doṣa ityāha /
GSP29nystik_u:17015: nanu vākye nyūnatādayo doṣā na puruṣāśrayā ityata āha /
GSP29nystik_u:17017: na svarūpeṇa vākyaṃ duṣṭaṃ tasya tādavasthyādityuktaṃ kiṃ tu puruṣasya vipratipattyapratipattibhyāṃ tathā pratibhāti tena vākyagatanyūnatādidarśanātpuruṣe vipratiprattyapratipatī pratīyete tena dvāreṇa puruṣo nigṛhyate na tu vākyametāvatā ca pratijñādoṣa ityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17018: nacāyamapi niyamo yadvākyadvāreṇa puruṣī nigṛhyate ajñānādiṣu tadabhāvādi tyāha /
GSP29nystik_u:17021: sāmānyaṃ vivakṣyate viśeṣo vā sāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ nigrahasthānamityevāstu tasya sarvatrāviśeṣākuto dvaividhyaṃ viśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ pratijñāhānyādīni bahūnītyayuktaṃ dvaividhyābhidhānamubhayathā 'pītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17026: bhedānāṃ tu vistaravivakṣayā pratijñāhānyā dayo 'pi prapañcitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17040: samyam sādhane jātyuttare datte tasya jātitvamanudbhāvayaṃstattvavādyapi nigṛhyataityarthaḥ NyS_5,2.2: pratidṛṣṭāntadharmābhyanujñā svadṛṣṭānte pratijñāhāniḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:17043: tadetatsūtraṃ bhāṣyamatena tāvad vyācaṣṭe pratidṛṣṭāntasya yodharmastaṃ yadā svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānātīti
GSP29nystik_u:17045: etattu na budhyāmahe kadhamatra pratijñā hīyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17046: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavaditi sādhane prayukte prativādinā cānaikāntikatve sāmānyenodbhāvite tṛtīyasthānapatito vādyāha /
GSP29nystik_u:17048: tathā satyaindriyakatvamanaikāntikaṃ na bhavati nityamātrāgāmitvād ghaṭādīnāmapi nityatābhyupagamādityāśayena yadyapapi tathā 'pi
GSP29nystik_u:17050: pratipadyate, nityatāpratipatteścāsiddhatā dṛṣṭānte doṣo bhavati sādhyavikalatetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17051: so 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣeṇa hetudoṣeṇa vā viruddhatvena ghaṭādīnāmapi nityatvābhyupagamenaindrinayakatvasya hetoḥ sādhyānityatvaviruddhena
GSP29nystik_u:17052: nityatvena vyāptatvād nigraho vādino na pratijñāhāniḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17053: na khalvanenāstu śabdo nitya itipratijñā parityaktā kiṃ tvastu ghaṭo 'pi
GSP29nystik_u:17055: yadi dṛṣṭāntaparityāgena pratijñātārthasyāsiddheḥ pratijñāhānirityucyate tataḥ sarva eva doṣaḥ pratijñāhāniḥ sarvasmādeva doṣātpratijñāhānerupapatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17056: tasmātkathaṃ cid dṛṣṭāntaparityāgena pratijñāhānirupacaritavnayā ca cāsau pradhānaṃ pratijñāhāniṃ vinā bhavitumarhatītyāha /
GSP29nystik_u:17058: (552/3) tadevaṃ bhāṣyakarīyaṃ vyākhyānaṃ dūṣayitvā svamatena vyācikhyāsuḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17064: pratidṛṣṭāntasya pratipakṣasya sāmānyasya yo dharmo nityatvaṃ taṃ svapakṣe śabde 'bhyanujānāti
GSP29nystik_u:17067: dvitīyapakṣavāditi sāmānyena pratayavasthitaidamāha tṛtīyapakṣe sthito vādī yadi sāmānyamaindripayakaṃ nityaṃ śabdo 'pyevaṃ bhavatviti /
GSP29nystik_u:17069: atra cānaikāntikatvena pratyavasthitaityupalakṣaṇaṃ yena kena citgnakāreṇa svapratijñātārthānirvāhaṃ paśyan pratijñārthañjahatpratijñāhānimāpnotīti paramārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17070: yadapyucyate svayameva ghaṭamanityamaindriyakamudāhṛtya ghaṭasyaindriyakatvaṃ paśyan kathamanunmataḥ san sāmānyasya nityasyaindriyakatvadarśanamātrācchabde nityattvamabhyupagacchetkintūbhayatradarśanātsaṃśayittaḥ syāt tatra sarvaṃ nitya miti sāṃkhyīyarāddhāntāvaṣṭambhenāpi svapakṣanirvāhaṃ paśyato
GSP29nystik_u:17074: tasmādyathā jaḍaṃ prati vicāro nāstyevaṃ prāmāṇikamapi prati nigrahāvatātāro nāstīti madhyamo jano nigrāhyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17078: nirākaroti tacca na ata eva tatprāpteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17079: hetudoṣamuddidhīrṣuḥ prasañjayannabhyupagacchatyeva na hi sāṅkhyīyaṃ rāddhāntamanabhyupagacchannanaikāntikatvamuddhartumarhatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17087: yadā hi sāṃkhyapakṣāvalambanena śabdanityatvamabhyupa iti tadā pratijñāhāniḥ na viruddho heturnāpyanaikāntiko vipakṣābhāvāt kevalaṃ pratijñātārthahānamevāsya parājayasthānaṃ, vipratipatteḥ svasādhyaviruddhapratipatteriti sarvamavadātam // 2 //
GSP29nystik_u:17089: etadvyācaṣṭe pratijñāto mīmāṃsakaṃ prati vaiśeṣikeṇānityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tasya sādhanamainrdiyakatvāddhaṭavaditi evamuktasya pratiṣedho mīmāṃsakena kriyate pratidṛṣṭāntena hetuvyabhicāraḥ tamāha sāmānyamaindriyakaṃ nityamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:17090: tasminpratiṣedhe mīmāṃsakena kṛte dharmavavikalpāttathā nirddenaśa iti yāvannocayate tāvadardhokta eva dharmavikalpādityanūdya vyācaṣṭe /
GSP29nystik_u:17091: dṛṣṭāntapratidṛṣṭāntayor dhaṭasāmānyayoḥ sādharmyamaindriyakatvaṃ tadyoge taddharmabhedāt sāmānya maindriyakaṃ sarvagatamaindriyakastvasarvagato ghaṭa iti dharmavikalpāttadarthaṃ prati jñātārthasiddhyarthaṃ śabdasyāsarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ pratipādayituṃ nirddeśaḥ tasya hi
GSP29nystik_u:17096: idaṃ hi pratijñāvākyam anityaḥ śabda itivadasarvagataḥ śabda iti mīmāṃsakaṃ vipratipannaṃ prati nirddeśānna tu kṛtakatvāditivadudāharaṇasādharmyādasya hetulakṣaṇamasti sādhyanirdeśaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17097: pratijñeti tu pratijñālakṣaṇayogātpratijñāntarameva yadyapyasya manasiviparivartate asarvatatvaṃ sādhayitvā mayā asarvagatatve satīti aindriyakatvaṃ heturviśeṣaṇīya iti tathāpyetadanena na kṛtaṃ kiṃ tvasarvagataḥ śabdo ghaṭavadityuktvaiva virataḥ parārthānumāne ca vacanagatā guṇadoṣā vicāryante na tu vacanānapekṣaṃ vastu, tadidamāha asarvagataḥ śabda iti dvitīyā pratijñā heturahitā asya praśnapūrvakaṃ nigrahasthānatvamāha tatkathamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:17099: vārttikaṃ tatrānityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāpa prathamā /
GSP29nystik_u:17100: asyāṃ sāmānyenaindriyakeṇa hetoranaikāntikatvātpratihato vādī prativādinā asarvagataḥ śabdo
GSP29nystik_u:17105: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavadityetāvavaduktvā nirākāṅkṣo vādī na tvasarvagatatve satīti sādhanaṃ viśeṣitavān na cāviśiṣṭaṃ sādhanamatrārthe 'samarthaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:17106: viśiṣṭaṃ tu samarthaṃ tasya sāmarthyamaparijñāyāviśiṣṭe tadāropyāviśiṣṭasādhanaṃ prayuktavān
GSP29nystik_u:17107: tatra nirākāṅkṣo vādī savyabhicārahetuprayogādeva parājīyate na tu pratijñāntaraprayogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17108: yadi tu vādinyaparyavasitavāda eva madhye prativādinā hetoranaikāntikatve udbhāvite tamevahetumasarvagatatve satīti viśeṣṭuṃ mīmāṃsake prati śabdasyāsarvagatatvaṃ pratijātīte /
GSP29nystik_u:17109: asarvagataḥ śabda iti pratijñāya ca na hetuṃ bravīti tadānaikāntikatvoddhārāya pratijñāntarakaraṇānnānaikāntikatvena parājīyate api tu pratijñāntarādeva, na hi pratijñā pratijñāntaraṃ sādhayitumarhatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:17111: tadetadāha na ca pratijñā pratijñāntaraṃ sādhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:17112: tena pratijñā yatrārthe samārthā tadaparijñānātpañcāvayavasādhye ca sāmarthyāropaṇādaparijñānāditi śliṣṭanirddeśaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaparyudāsau vivakṣitau tenājñānādviparītajñānācca pratijñāntaraṃ nigrahasthānamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:17113: yatpunarucyate paraiḥ atyantāsambaddhametad yatpratijñā pratijñāsādhanāyeti yo hi prāk pratijñāmuktvā hetūdāharaṇādikaṃ vaktuṃ jānāti sa kathaṃ cidanukramaṃ sādhanasya jānātyeva jānan kathamavi kalāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pratijñāmeva pratijñānasādhanāyopādadīteti /
GSP29nystik_u:17114: tatra brūmaḥ nāyaṃ pratijñayā pratijñā sādhanīyeti buddhyā pravṛttaḥ kiṃ tvasarvagatatvaṃ śabdasya mīmāṃsakaṃ prati sādhayitvā tenaindriyakatvaṃ viśiṣyānaikāntikatvamuddharaṇīyamiti manorathena pravṛttaḥ pratijñāṃ kṛtavān asarvagataḥ śabda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17115: athāsya prativādyavaṣṭambhātpariṣaddarśanādvā stambhitatve sādhanāpratibhanayā tūṣṇīṃ bhavataḥ prekṣāvato 'pi pratijñāntaraṃ bhavati nigrahasthānam /
GSP29nystik_u:17116: ayaṃ ca vikalāntaḥkaraṇasya nigraho bhavadbhirapyukta eva tadabhyupagamyāpratibhayā tūṣṇīṃbhāvāditi vadadbhiḥ so 'yamīdṛśo
GSP29nystik_u:17117: 'satpralāpo bhavadbhiḥ śāstre nibandhanīyona tvasmābhiriti vyaktamiyaṃ rājakulasthitiriti sarvaṃ caturasam // 3 //
GSP29nystik_u:17121: etaduktaṃ bhavati yeṣāṃ vākyagatānāṃ padārthānāṃ mitho vyāghātaḥ pratīyate pramāṇāntaraṃ ca virodhakaṃ sa virodho nāma nigrahasthānam1
GSP29nystik_u:17123: nacaivaṃ bhāṇḍālekhyanyāyaḥ ekadeśenāvyāpakena samudāyasaṃgrahe sa hi
GSP29nystik_u:17124: bhavati, na tu vyāpakena saṃgrahe vyāpakaṃ cānavayavena
GSP29nystik_u:17125: idaṃpratiyogimithunayorvirodhaḥ ato yathāśruti tāvitsūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe vārtikakāraḥ yatra pratijñā hetunā virudhyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17126: dvayorvirodhe yasya pramāṇāntarānugrahastena tadbādhyata iti tena tadvirudhyataityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17129: atra hi bhedenāgrahaṇādityanena grahaṇapratiṣedhena grāhyābhāva upalakṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17134: tatra hi kṛtakatvasya nityatvena vyāptismaraṇāpekṣa eva virodhaḥ pratīyate na tvayaṃ tathā astināstivatsvabhāvavirodhāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17136: pramāṇāntaramanusṛtya pratipattavyā pratijñāvirodhastūccāraṇamātrādeva prathamata eva gamyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17137: tenaiva dūṣitenāsiddhiḥ paścāttanī na dūṣaṇatvāya kalpate bhasmīkṛte dahanavat /
GSP29nystik_u:17138: pratijñāhetuvirodhamātreṇa ca nigrahasiddheḥ suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa pratijñāyā balavattāsmaraṇam
GSP29nystik_u:17140: tathā hi darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthapratisaṃdhānādrūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ sidhyatīti tadanugṛhītā pratijñaiva hetvarthaṃ bādhata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17143: śramaṇā garbhiṃṇīti śramaṇā brahmacāriṇī nāntarvatnī bhavitumarhati jitendrayasyopasthasaṃyamo hi brahmacaryaṃ, na--cāsādhanāṅgasya pratijñāyā vacanādeva nigṛhīta iti kṛtaṃ virodhodbhāvanena niṣpāditakriye karmaṇi aviśeṣābhidhāyino dūṣaṇasya dūṣaṇanyāyātipātāditi sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:17145: hetuvirodho 'pi yatra hetunā pramāṇāntareṇānugṛhītena pratijñā bādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17146: yathā sarvaṃ pṛthagiti pratijñā na kiṃ cidekamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17148: nāstyekamekasamuccayaśceti vacanaṃ mitho virudhyate vinaiva vyāptyanusmaraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:17151: na ca kalpitasya hetoḥ sādhanāṅgateti tatra tatra niveditam /
GSP29nystik_u:17152: atra caikasamuccayasya pramāṇānugrahānnaikaṃ kiṃ ciditi pratijñā hetunā bādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17154: yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād yatprameyaṃ tannityaṃ yathākāśamiti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17155: yadyapyatra vastuto heturanaikāntikastathā 'pi dṛṣṭāntasya pratijñāvirodhenaiva nigṛhyate virodhasya vākye prathamamavagateḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17157: hetośca dṛṣṭāntādibhirvirodha etena vaktavya ityanuṣajyate yathā nityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvādanaindriyadvyaṇukavaditi
GSP29nystik_u:17158: atrāpyaindriyakatvānaindriyakatvayāḥ śabdato virodhaḥ pratīyate sādhanavaikalyaṃ tu vastusvabhāvālocanayeti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17160: atrāpi vastusvabhāvālocanayā 'naindriyakatvāsiddhiḥ pratīyate śabdatastu virodha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17162: (554/1) yadyapi bādhitaviṣayaṃ hetvābhāsāntargataṃ tathāpīhāpyastīti virodhahetvābhāsayoratra nigrahasthānayoḥ samāveśo 'stu na kva cidviṣaye
GSP29nystik_u:17168: yadā hi bauddhena prābhākaraṃ prati sādhyate anityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:17169: yadyanityatvaṃ na bhavecchrāvaṇatvaṃ na syāditi prābhākaro
GSP29nystik_u:17170: 'naikāntikatvamudbhāvayati śrāvaṇaṃ śabdatvaṃ nityaṃ ceti tadāsyānaikāntikatvodbhāvanaṃ svakīyaśabdatvanirākaraṇaviruddhamiti
GSP29nystik_u:17171: parapakṣasiddhaṃ gotvādyapīdṛśa eva viṣaye viruddhe draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:17174: nanu yadyanaikāntikodbhāvanamapi viruddhaṃ kastarhyanaikāntikatvāpādanasya viṣaya ityat āha
GSP29nystik_u:17178: avayavāntaraṃ hi pratijñāhetpavādibhya udāharaṇe tena hetvābhāsoktyā tasya
GSP29nystik_u:17183: upalakṣaṇe heturuktaḥ hetvābhāsapūrvakatvāddhetvābhāsapradhānakatvād dṛṣṭāntābhāsenāpi hetureva dūṣyate yataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17185: na hi yatra yatra nimittamasti tatsarvamupalakṣaṇīyaṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:17186: kiṃ tu yadupalakṣyate tatrāvaśyaṃ nimittaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:17187: na ca sūtrakārasya sarvatra lāghavādaro dṛḍha ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:17190: aindriyakatvasya hetoranaikāntiṅkatvodbhāvanena śabdānityatvapakṣe pratikṣipte vādī prativādinaṃ brūyādanaikāntikatvamuddidhīrṣuḥ kaḥ punarāhānityaḥ śabda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17191: yadyahamanityaḥ śabda iti pratijñātamapahvotuṃ śaknoti tadā na sāmānyena nityena me heturanaikāntiko bhavatīti buddhyā 'hnupate so 'yamevaṃvādī na śakyo 'naikāntikatvena jetum /
GSP29nystik_u:17196: tasmādyaduktaṃ kīrtinā kimidānīṃ hetvābhāsāduttarapratijñāsaṃnyāsāpekṣayā tasya prativādino hetvābhāsa evādyaṃ nigrahasthānamiti tadapyapāst /
GSP29nystik_u:17198: yadapi tenoktaṃ pakṣapratiṣedhe tūṣṇīṃbhavatastūṣṇīṃbhāvo nāma nigrahasthānaṃ pralapataśca pralapitaṃ nāmetyādyapi vācyaṃ syāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:17200: na hi tūṣṇīmbhāvena pralapitādibhirvā śakyamanaikāntikatvamuddhartuṃ yathā
GSP29nystik_u:17201: pratijñārthāpahnavena, na caite hetvābhasodbhāvanasya purastāttanāḥ tasmādetadapyanirūpitābhidhānādyatkiñciditi NyS_5,2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣamicchato hetvantaram //
GSP29nystik_u:17202: vyākhyātuṃ nidarśanamāha nidarśanamekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktaṃ bhūtabhautikendriyamekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17203: tadyathā ekamṛtpūrvā ghaṭaśarāvodañjanādayaḥ parimitā dṛṣṭāḥ yāvān prakṛtervyūhaḥ saṃsthānaṃ tāvānvikāra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17208: nānāprakṛtīnāṃ ghaṭarucakādīnāmekaprakṛtīnāṃ ca ghaṭaśarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:17209: evaṃ pratyasthite prativādini vādī paścātparimitatvaṃ hetuṃ viśinaṣṭi ekaprakṛtisamanvaye sati śarāvādivikārāṇāṃ parimāṇadarśanāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:17212: sukhaduḥkhamohasamanvitaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17214: metradāreṣu narmadāyāṃ maitrasya sukhabuddhirbhavati tatsapatnīnāṃ ca duḥkhabuddhiḥ caitrasya tāmavindato raṇaraṇakavato moho vibhādaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17216: tadevaṃ yatraikasvabhāvasamanvaye sati parimāṇaṃ tatraikaprakṛtitvameva tadyathaikamṛtpiṇḍasvabhāveṣu ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādiṣu /
GSP29nystik_u:17218: nidarśyātra sūtraṃ yojayati tadidamaviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17221: api ca yadi hetvantaravacane viśvamekaprakṛti sādhyate tadā nidarśanaṃ nāsti sarvasya pakṣe nikṣepāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17225: hetuḥ sādhanam arthaḥ sādhyaḥ tau hetvarthau nidarśayati vyāpyavyāpakabhāveneti /
GSP29nystik_u:17226: nidarśanaḥ nidarśanaḥ hetvarthayornidarśano hetvarthanidarśano dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa yadyupādīyate tato nedaṃ vyaktamekaprakṛti bhavati dṛṣṭāntasya prakṛtyantaropādānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17228: dattottarāvasara eva vādini yadi prativādī hetvarthaṃ vyabhicārayati vādīca tṛtīyapadake sthito hetuṃ viśeṣayati tadā sādhanāntaropādānānnigṛhyatāmutānaikāntikasādhanopādānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17234: vyācaṣṭe yathoktalakṣaṇe pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahe sati vāde jalpe vitaṇḍāyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17235: hetutaḥ sādhyasiddhau prakṛtāyāṃ vādī sādhanaṃ brūyād nityaḥ śabdo 'sparśatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:17236: atrāntare sūkhādibhirvyabhicāreṇa hetorasāmarthyaṃ paśyana tatpracchādanārthaṃ prasaktānuprasaktyā taṃ tamarthamupanyasyannarthāntareṇa nigṛhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17237: abhidheyasya kriyāntarayogāt kriyāviśeṣasya yogādviśiṣyamāṇarūpo bhidyamānarūpaḥ śabdo nāmeti yathā vṛkṣastiṣṭhati vṛkṣaṃ chinatti vṛkṣeṇa candramasaṃ paśyati vṛkṣāyodakamāsiñcatītyādi tadevamabhidheyasya kriyāviśeṣayogādviśiṣyamāṇarūpaḥ śabdo nāmeti /
GSP29nystik_u:17241: pacati pacyataityevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ kriyāṃ kartāraṃ karma cābhivadanti tadetallakṣaṇamasiddhamativyāpakaṃ ca, na hi kartā karma vā ākhyātenābhidhīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17245: ativyāpakaṃ ca pācakaḥ pākya ityādernāmno 'pi kriyākārakasamudāyābhidhāyitvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17248: pacati pacyataityādau kartuḥ karmaṇo vā saṃkhyayā kālena vartamānādinā viśiṣṭā kriyā pratīyate
GSP29nystik_u:17250: na tu vivakṣito lakṣaṇe pacata yajetetyevamādau tadyogāpratīteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17251: anena lakṣaṇena sthīyate supyataityādīnāmākhyātānāmasaṅghahaḥ kārakatatsaṃkhyayorapratīteḥ tatsaṃgrahāya dvitīyaṃ lakṣaṇamāha /
GSP29nystik_u:17255: yathā samuccayavikalpādināmapadaiḥ samuccayādayaḥ samuccetavyānnāmārthādākhyātārthādvā bhedenocyante tatra ṣaṣṭhīprayogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17256: teṣāṃ samuccayo vikalpo veti naivaṃ cādayaḥ svārthānnāmārthādākhyātārthādvā bhedenābhidadhati
GSP29nystik_u:17257: rūpyante pratipādyante rūpāṇi arthānnāmārthādākhyātārthādvā bhidyamānaṃ rūpaṃ pratipādyamānaṃ yeṣāṃ nipātānāṃ te tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17258: upasūjyamānāḥ samīpe prāk prayujyamānāḥ kriyāvadyotakā upasargāḥ avadyotanaṃ copalakṣaṇam
GSP29nystik_u:17267: atra yadā drāviḍaḥ svabhāṣayā tadbhāṣānabhijñamāryaṃ prati śabdanityatvaṃ pratipādayati tadā tannirarthakaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ sa khalvāryabhāṣāṃ jānannasāmarthyapracchādanāya tadbhāṣānabhijñatayā vā svabhāṣayā sādhanaṃ prayuktavān so 'yaṃ pūrvasminkalpe vipratipattyā nigṛhyate
GSP29nystik_u:17271: atraiva dṛṣṭāntamātratayā vatinā atra varṇakramo darśito na punaretadudāharaṇaṃ nigrahasthānasya yena kapolavāditrādāvapi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17272: yathā hi drāviḍasyārthabhedavivakṣotthāpitaṃ vacanaṃ naivaṃ varṇakramanirddeśaḥ kapolavāditraṃ vā apratipādakatvasāmānyādvarṇakramanirddeśavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17279: parapratipādakaṃ pañcāvayavaṃ vākyaṃ sādhanaṃ tattena nopāttaṃ tasya svasamayena pratipādakatve 'pyāryān pratyapratipādakatvādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17281: yadvākyaṃ pariṣadā prativādinā ca na vijñāyate samānasaṃketena vādinā trirabhihitaṃ yāvadbhirvāraiḥ pariṣatprativādinorarthapratyayo bhavati sa ca prāyeṇa tribhiriti trirabhihitamityuktam nanu samānasaṅketena vādinā trirabhihitamavijñātārthaṃ ceti na saṃbhavati
GSP29nystik_u:17282: sambhave vā pariṣatprativādinai jaḍau na ca jaḍānavabodhe pratipādakasya kaścidaparādhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17283: na hi badhiro gītaṃ na śṛṇotīti gāyanasya kaścidaparādha ityata āha /
GSP29nystik_u:17284: śliṣṭaśabdamasati prakaraṇādau niyāmake yathā śveto dhāvatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:17291: yatrānekasya padasyāśliṣṭasya pratītayogasyādrutoccāritasya vākyasya cānekasya paurvāparyeṇāyogaḥ sambandho nāstīti tasmādasambaddhārthatā gṛhyate tadapārthakaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ niṣprayojanaṃ, kasmāt? /
GSP29nystik_u:17293: 'pāyādvākyamahāvākyārthapratyāyanaprayojano hi padānāṃ vākyānāṃ vā prayogo 'sati tasminnapārthakamityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17303: parapratyāyanaprayojanaṃ hi vacanoccāraṇaṃ tatra nirarthakenevāpārthakenāpi na paraḥ pratipādyata iti ubhayorabhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17304: na ca varṇakramamātramekatrānyatra ca padānītyetāvatā bhedenopādanaṃ yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:17311: tatrānarthake varṇamātram abhidheyaśūnyam iha tvapārthake padāni padyate gamyate 'bhidheyamebhiriti padāni vākyāni cābhidheyavanti asambaddhāni nirabhidheyaniṣprayojanayornirarthakāpārthakayormahānviśeṣaḥ na tvīdṛśo vākyapadayorniṣprayojanayorviśeṣo yenāvāntarabhedamādriyāmahe /
GSP29nystik_u:17315: vyācaṣṭe pratijñādīnāmavayavānāṃ yathālakṣaṇamarthavaśāt kramaḥ lakṣaṇānatikrameṇa kramaḥ uktametadasmābhiḥ prathamādhyāye /
GSP29nystik_u:17317: tatra prathamaṃ sādhyanirddeśo 'pekṣitaḥ parairna tu sādhananirddeśaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17318: tatra yadyayaṃ prathamaṃ sādhanameva prayuñjīta kathamapokṣitaṃ brūyād,
GSP29nystik_u:17320: tadevaṃ sarvāṇyeva hetuvacanādīni api kramavanti nākramāṇi pratipādayitumarhantīti viparītakramebhyo 'pyārthakramānusaraṇādevārthapratipatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17321: so 'yaṃ pratijñādīnāmartha etādṛśo ya eṣāṃ kramamantareṇa na śakyo jñātumiti /
GSP29nystik_u:17325: yadyucyeta arthaśabdavadayamasmākaṃ samayo yadanena kramaviśeṣeṇārthaḥ pratyetavyo nānyeneti atastatheva pratīyate na kramāntareṇetyata āha /
GSP29nystik_u:17327: padeṣveva samayapūrvakaḥ pratyayo na vākyeṣu abhinavakaviracitatatsamayānapekṣādeva vākyādarthapratīteḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17328: syādetad vākyeṣvapi kramaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ yathā pācayāṃ babhūveti na punarvabhūvapācayāmiti ata āha prayogācceti /
GSP29nystik_u:17329: tatra laukikaḥ prayogo niyata iha tvavayavavyatyayasyāpi dṛṣṭaḥ prayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17334: yathā gaurityasyaiva padasyārtheṃ gāvīti prayujyamānaṃ padaṃ kakudādimantamarthaṃ pratyāyayati
GSP29nystik_u:17337: śabdabhedā yeṣāṃ pārameśvarasaṅketaḥ tadasaṅketāttu pravarttamānā apyarthe
GSP29nystik_u:17339: tadapekṣāśca sādhubhirbhāṣitavyamityādayo vidhayo dharmeṣu nindārthavādāśca mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇata ityādayaḥ vedānāṃ ca prāmāṇyaṃ pratipāditaṃ dvitīye 'dhyāye /
GSP29nystik_u:17340: na cāyamartho ye ye sādhavaste sarve dharmahetava
GSP29nystik_u:17341: iti, kiṃ tu dharmānuṣṭhānaṃ tadanurūpabhāṣaṇe prāpte sādhubhirevati
GSP29nystik_u:17343: tadevaṃ vyavasthite aviśeṣeṇa gogāvyādiśabdā āryeṇa prayujyamānā dṛśyante tatraite kimaviśeṣeṇaivasādhava uta kaścidekaḥ sādhuḥ tatpūrviketarebhyaḥ pratītiḥ tatraikaśabdasya sādhutvakalpanāyāmitarasmāt tanmūlatayā
GSP29nystik_u:17346: tatrāpi katamasyāsādhutvamekasyaitoṣviti jijñāsāyāṃ tatra tattvamabhiyogaviśeṣātsyāditi yo
GSP29nystik_u:17348: tena yadyapi laukikā gāvyādiśabdebhya eva gavādyarthamadhigacchantīti dṛṣṭārthamātravyavahāriṇaḥ pratipattistathā 'pi parīkṣakāṇāṃ vicārayatāmevaṃ vicārakramo yadvṛddhatamena gośabde prayoktavye
GSP29nystik_u:17349: pramādādgāvīśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ tataśca vṛddhatareṇa gośabdamunnīya gotvaṃ pratītam /
GSP29nystik_u:17352: avyakte tadvidāṃ tena vyakte bhavati nirṇayaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:17356: gāvīśabdādevāyamamumarthaṃ pratītavāniti tameva gotvasya vācakamavagamyānyeṣāṃ vṛddho babhūva
GSP29nystik_u:17357: tataḥ prabhṛtyananusṛtamūlaśabdānāmayaṃ vācakatvabhramo 'pabhraṃśe vartate na vṛddhatarasyobhayavedino mūlaśabdānusāriṇasī padarthapratipattiridānīntanānāṃ tvapabhraṃśādeva ata evānavākhyānamapi prayojanavat /
GSP29nystik_u:17358: asatyasmin vācakāpabhraṃśavibhāge jñānānabhāvātsādhubhirbhāṣitavyamiti niyamavidherna mlecchitavai nāpabhāṣitavai iti niṣedhasya ca viṣayasaṃśayena duradhigamatvena dharmānuṣṭhānasyāśakyatvaprasaṅgāt yatrārthe yasya śabdasya bhagavateśvareṇa saṅketaḥ kṛtaḥ sa tatra sādhurasādhuranyatra yathā ya evāsvaśabdo daridre sādhuḥ sa evāsādhurvājini prayujyamānaḥ yathā nakuladaṃṣṭāgraspṛṣṭā yā kā cidoṣadhirasau sarpaviṣaṃ hanti evamīśvareṇa kṛtasaṅketaḥ śabdaḥ sādhurdharmaupayujyate nānya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17359: yavavarāhādiśabdānāmāryamlecchayorarthavivāde vaidikādvākyaśeṣādāryasaṃmator 'tho grahītavyo na mlecchasaṃmataḥ tatra vaidikavākyaśeṣavirodhāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17360: yeṣāṃ tu śabdānāmāryeṣu na dṛṣṭacaraḥ prayogaḥ kevalairmlecchairevārthabhede prayujyante yathā pikanematāmarasādayaḥ vede tu prayuktāsteṣāṃ mlecchavyavahārādevārtho 'vadhāraṇīyaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17362: tadevaṃ vyavasthite nyāyamīmāṃsāpariśīlanavikalānāṃ bāhyatarāḥ pralāpā upekṣaṇīyāḥ tasmātsuṣṭhūktaṃ prayogāpetaśabdavaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:17371: na hiśāstre kṛtsnāsadivādarabhūtadivetyarthasaṅgraho yathā kathaṃ cit kriyata iti vāde 'pi tathā kriyatāmiti yuktaṃ vādādiṣu pakṣapratipakṣavadvakrorapi parīkṣyamāṇatvāt parīkṣitasya ca śāstritatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:17374: nyūnatve sādhanatvaṃ nāsti tadabhāve na sādhyasiddhiḥ na hi sāmagrīniṣpādyaṃ kāryaṃ sāmagryekadeśādbhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17376: eke tu pratijñānyūnaṃ nāmanigrasthānaṃ nāstīti bravate/dūṣayati etattu na yuktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:17377: kiṃ pratijñānyūnaṃ nigrahasthānāntaraṃ na bhavati atha nigrahasthānameva na bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:17380: dvitīyakalpe doṣamāha atha na nigraha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17388: tatra kathametatsādhyaṃ sidhyatīti jijñāsā tatraikenaiva sādhanena sādhyasiddheḥ sādhanāntarābhidhānamanarthakamiti
GSP29nystik_u:17390: yatra tu prativādinaḥ pariṣado vā jijñāsā bhavati kati sādhanānisaṃbhavantyasminsādhya iti tatra yāvanti sādhanāni tāvanti sarvāṇyeva vācyāni anyatarābhidhāne
GSP29nystik_u:17395: yadi niścayo dārḍhyaṃ tadekasmādeva pramāṇādbhavati aniścāyakasyāpramāṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17396: atha sphuṭhatvaṃ tadapi cenniścayaḥ sa dattottaraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17397: atha sāmānyaviśeṣatadvatāṃ grahaṇaṃ na tadanumānasahasrairapi teṣāṃ sāmānyavaddravyamātraviṣayatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:17398: śaṅkate atha bravīṣi dve api jñāpake iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17400: api tu gantṛmātraṃ pramāṇaṃ tacca dvitīyasyāpyaviśiṣṭamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17401: nirākaroti satyaṃ dve api jñāpate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17402: puruṣo 'trāparādhyate yo jñātamarthamajijñāsitaṃ jñāpayati na tu pramāṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:17404: yadi jijñāsāyāṃ sityāṃ pravartate pratipādayati jñeyaṃ nāsya kaścidaparādha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17405: na hi dhānyeṣvalūneṣu dātramavraścanaṃ bhavati tasmādanapekṣitakāraṇādanavasthāprasaṅgācca puruṣasya nigraha iti sthitam // 13 //
GSP29nystik_u:17408: tadanena sūtradvayena punaruktamekameva nigrahasthānaṃ kathaṃ cidavāntarabhedavivakṣayātrividhamuktaṃ prāpañcārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:17409: tadeva punaruktaṃ kva cicchabdābhyāsāt kva citparyāyāntarāt kva cidarthāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:17413: punaruktaprayoge tvanipuṇaḥ syād anapekṣitābhidhānātsādhanasya viṣayaḥ sādhyo 'rtho na siddhaḥ tasyāparijñanānnigṛhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17415: tathā hi punaruktaprayoge tatprayojanānusaraṇasamākulacittaḥ prathamābhidhānādāpātataḥ pratītamapyarthamapratītamiva manyamāno na niścetumarhatīti tataśca pratipādanāya pravṛtto na pratipādayiteti viruddhaprayojanavattvavaiyarthyaṃ syādityupapannaṃ nigrahasthānamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:17426: puṃsāṃ vicitrasvabhāvatvāt kaściduttare samartho na pratyuccāraṇe nāsau saduttaparamabhidadhānaḥ tāvatānanubhāṣaṇamātreṇa nigrahamarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:17429: yastvārabhya na nirvāhayet saduttaraṃ tu brūyāt tasya syāt khalīkāramātrasamāmarthyakṛtaṃ na tu tattvavāditvavihatirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17431: dūṣyaviṣayaṃ hi dūṣaṇam asati dūṣyābhidhāne na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nystik_u:17433: tadidamuktaṃ tadidaṃ vyāhatamucyate noccārayati uttaraṃ ca bravītīti /
GSP29nystik_u:17434: syādetad na prativādinā sarvaṃ dūṣaṇīyam anyatamāvayavadūṣaṇenaiva sādhanasya dūṣitatvena doṣāntarābhidhānavaiyarthyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17435: na khalu mṛto mṛtyunā rakṣito mārayituṃ śakyaḥ evaṃ dūṣitamapi dūṣayituṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:17436: tasmāt satyapi dūṣyabāhulye 'nyatamaṃ dūṣyaṃ tathā ca sarvānubhāṣaṇe sarvasyādūṣyatvād yaddūṣaṇīyaṃ tatpunaranuvādyamiti sarvānuvāde dviranuvādo 'dūṣyānuvādaśceti dūṣakanigrahasthānadvayaṃ tasmādanubhāṣaṇameva nigrahasthānamiti viparītamāpatitamityata āha apratijñānācceti /
GSP29nystik_u:17438: pūrvamekagranthena sarvamuccārayitavyaṃ paścāduttaraṃ yaddūṣyaṃ tadanuvādenābhidheyaṃ yena dūṣyānuvādo dviranuvādaśca doṣau syātām api tu yathākathaṃ ciduttaraṃvaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:17442: na khalu nānubhāṣataityetāvataiva nigṛhyate api tvananubhāṣamāṇo dūṣyaṃ na budhyate abudhyamānaśca tatrottaraṃ na pratipadyate tato 'pratibhayā
GSP29nystik_u:17444: tadevamananubhāṣaṇamapratibhāviśeṣa iti apratibhāyā vihitaṃ nigrahasthānatvaṃ tadviśeṣe 'pi vihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:17445: yathā gavi sāsnādimattvaṃ vihitaṃ śābaleye 'pi vihitaṃ bhavati na
GSP29nystik_u:17447: atra brūmaḥ, na tāvaduttarāpratipattisāmānyaviśeṣo 'nanubhāṣaṇaṃ puṃsāṃ sāmaryyavaicitryāt
GSP29nystik_u:17448: kaściddūnaṣyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca vidannapi nānubhāṣituṃ pārayati bahuvacanakuṇṭhatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17450: kaściddūṣaṇaviṣayaṃ vedānubhāṣate ca uttarapratipattivikalastu syātso 'yamapratibhayā nigṛhyate nānanubhāṣaṇena tatra sāmarthyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17451: kaścitpunardūṣyameva na jānāti so 'jñānena nigṛhyate na cājñāne
GSP29nystik_u:17454: apratibhā tvavaśyaṃ bhevad na hyasti sambhavo dūṣyaṃ na vedāsya dūṣaṇaṃ tu vedeti /
GSP29nystik_u:17455: tathāpi svarūpatastāvadbhedaḥ na hi yadeva dūṣaṇaviṣayamajñānamapratibhā tadeva dūṣyaviṣayamajñānaṃ tasmātsatyapyananubhāṣaṇāpratibhājñānānānāmuttarānabhidhānaphalatve tulye avāntarabhedavivakṣayā bhedenopanyāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17467: arthāntare hi nigrahasthāne prasaktānuprasaktaṃ tatsiddhyarthatāvyājenāvatārayatā na prakṛtāvajñānaṃ kriyate iha tvavajñānametāvatā bhedenopanyāsa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17468: iyaṃ cāpratibhā samyaksādhanopanyāse draṣṭavyā sādhanābhāsopanyāse tu paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam NyS_5,2.19: kāryaprasaṅgāt kathāvicchedo vikṣepaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:17469: sādhanasya dūṣaṇasya copanyāsamabhyupagamya tadavasthaḥ pratīyamāna eva prativādino dārḍhyaṃ sabhyānāṃ vā kaṭhoratvamavagamyākasmātkāryaṃ vyāsajyābhyupagatāṃ kathāṃ vyavacchinatti tatra vikṣepo nāma nigrahasthānam /
GSP29nystik_u:17472: na cedamarthāntaraṃ tatra prakṛtameva sādhayāmīti vyājena prasaktānuprasaktāvatāreṇa kathāvicchedābhāvād iha tu kathāvicchedāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17474: na hi vikṣepasyānyatamaliṅgadharmānuvidhānaṃ nāpi prakṛtasādhyasiddhaye prayogo yena hetvābhāsaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17478: kimetāvatā na nigṛhyeta hetvābhāsena vā nigṛhyeta kiṃ tu vyāsaṅgādeva /
GSP29nystik_u:17481: nāpīha padāni vākyāni vā paurvāparyeṇāsambandhāni yenāpārthakaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17485: vyācaṣṭe yaḥ pareṇa deśita doṣaṃ svapakṣe 'bhyupagamya /
GSP29nystik_u:17491: yadi puruṣatvāccoro 'haṃ tato bhavānapi coraḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17492: na ca bhavata evamiṣṭaṃ tasmāttvayaivānaikāntikatvānnāyaṃ heturiti prasaṅgaviparyayaḥ tasmānnātmanaścoratvamanenābhyupagatamiti matānujñā nāsau nigrahasthānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17493: nirākaroti etattu na, kasmāt ata eva /
GSP29nystik_u:17494: kutaḥ ? yata evāsau uttare kartavye prasaṅgaṃ karoti ata eva nigṛhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17495: yadi hi vādī prativādinaṃ brūyātsatyamahaṃ cora eveti tadā kimanaikāntikatvaṃ śaknuyātkartum
GSP29nystik_u:17496: tasmātpuruṣatvaṃ na coratvahetuḥ api tu parasvenādattena sambandha ityuttare kartavye yaduttarābhāsamāha tena jñāpayati nūnamayaṃ sabhyaguttaraṃ na jānāti samyaguttarājñānānnigṛhyate, taccottarāparijñānaṃ matānujñādvāpareṇodbhāvyamānaṃ matānujñetyucyate // 20 //
GSP29nystik_u:17500: etattu na tāvadvādinodbhāvanīyaṃ na hyasau svasvasādhanāvadyamanunmatta
GSP29nystik_u:17502: nāpi prativādinā na hyanunmatta ātmānamātmanā nigṛhṇāti /
GSP29nystik_u:17503: api tu paryanuyojyaṃ jānānaḥ kasmādupekṣatetasmātsabhāpanitā vādiprativādibhyāmanuyuktayā vā pariṣadā tannigrahasthānamudbhāvanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:17504: atra ca tattvanirṇayāvasāne vāde dvayorapi nigrahātpariṣadeva vijayate jalpavitaṇḍayośca tattvānapekṣaṃ puruṣasāmarthyaparīkṣaṇapravṛttayoḥ prativādī nigṛhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17505: sādhanābhāsavādinā 'pi vādinā sphuratā prativādī stambhito yataḥ samyaksādhanopanyāso vihitaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17506: prativādina uttarāpratipattirapratibhā sādhanābhāsopanyāse ca uttarāpratipattiḥ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17508: yatra prativādī tūṣṇīṃbhavati tatra tūṣṇīmbhāvenaiva vādina uttarānarhatāṃ darśaya nnasya sādhanābhāsavāditāṃ sūcayati yatrāsya doṣodbhāvanaṃ samyagdoṣamanuktvā karoti tatrāpyasau duṣṭamuttaraṃ dadattatsādhanadoṣameva sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:17509: upadiśanti hi vṛddhāḥ duṣṭe hi sādhane dṛṣṭottaraṃ deyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:17513: (560/1) sādhanasya hi samyañcaṃ doṣaṃ jānan tameva brūyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17514: so 'yaṃ prāptāvasaro 'bruvan vibruvan vā nūnaṃ na samyañjaṃ doṣa jānāti /
GSP29nystik_u:17524: anenaiva sarvā jātayo nigrahasthānatvena saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:17525: na ca hetvābhāsānāmito na bhedaḥ te hi vādino nigrahasthānamayaṃ tu prativādina iti mahānviśeṣaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17529: apratibhāyā eva prasajyapratiṣedhātmikāyā asyā niranuyojyānuyogasya bhede darśayati bhāṣyakāraḥ
GSP29nystik_u:17533: abhyupetpayetyasya vyākhyānaṃ kasya cidarthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:17539: tasya paryāyāntareṇa kathanaṃ na sata itañ nāsidātmānamityasya paryāyāntareṇa vivaraṇaṃ nāsadutpadyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17540: so 'yaṃ siddhāntaḥ sāṃkhyānāṃ tamabhyupetya tadviparyayātkathāprasaṅgamāha svapakṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati
GSP29nystik_u:17548: ekaprakṛtiḥ sarvo vikāra iti seyaṃ kathā /
GSP29nystik_u:17552: sa evaṃ naiyāyikena pṛṣṭaḥ sāṃkhya uttaramāha yasyāvasthitasya mṛdāderdharmāntaranivṛttau śarāvavināśe yaddharmāntaraṃ maṇimādi pravartate asadeva jāyate sā prakṛtirmṛdādi /
GSP29nystik_u:17553: yaddharmāntaraṃ nivartate pravartate vā sa vikāra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17555: soyaṃ pratijñātārthasya siddhāntārthasya vādī viparyayādaniyamātkathāṃ prasañjayati pratijñātaḥ siddhāntaḥ khalvanena nāsadāvirbhavatīti utpadyate na sattiro bhavatīti na vinaśyatīti tathā 'pi kasmādanena siddhānto bādhyate atha siddhāntenaiva kasmānna
GSP29nystik_u:17561: na kevalaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ kartṝṇāmapi tu saddharmāṇāmapyutpādavināśau pravṛttyunaparamau dṛśyamānau na syātāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:17562: evaṃ pratyavasthitaḥ sāṃkhyonaiyāyikena pṛṣṭo yadyasata ātmalābhaṃ sataścātmahānamabhyupa iti tato 'syāpasiddhānto bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:17564: vikāro hyanena pakṣīkṛta ekaprakṛtitvena tatra vikārāṇāmanirūpaṇāt tadabhāve na pratijñārtho na ca hetvarthaḥ āśrayāsiddhatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:17565: nanvevaṃ pratijñātārthavirodhitvātsato nirodhasyāsataścotpādasya hetvābhāsa eva nigrahasthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:17568: na hyatraikaprakṛtayo vikārāḥ ekaprakṛtikatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ sādhyaviruddhena vyāpta udbhāvito yena viruddho bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:17569: nāpyekaprakṛtikatvaṃ vikārāṇāṃ śabdato viruddhaṃ samanvayena hetunā yena pratijñāvirodho bhavet
GSP29nystik_u:17570: vaibhavamātreṇa ca pratijñāhetvorvirodha ityatroktaṃ vārtikakṛtā svasiddhāntaspaya gotvārdernityatvavirodhādvirodha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17571: api ca tatra balavatā siddhāntenānaikāntikadeśanā bādhyate iha tu siddhānta eva bādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:17573: tasmādyatra pratijñārthena virodhaḥ tatra viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ pratijñāvirodho vā iha tu pratijñārthavyatirekeṇābhyupagamāntareṇa virodha iti puruṣasya pūrvāparaviruddhārthābhidhāyino 'sāmarthyānnigrahasthānaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:17577: yadyanuktamapi kiṃ cidavaśiṣyate nigrahasthānaṃ taccakāreṇa samucceyam /
GSP29nystik_u:17579: kiṃ punarlakṣaṇāntarayogāddhetvābhāsānigrahasthānatāmāpadyante yathā pramāṇāni prameyatvaṃ teṣāmeva pratyakṣādīnāmupalabdhisādhanatvena lakṣyamāṇānāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ pramāvyāpyatayā prameyatvaṃ lakṣaṇāntareṇa pramāṇāni prameyatvamāpadyanta iti śaṅkāyāḥ sambhavādata āha bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ yathoktā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:17581: ta ime pramāṇādaya uddiṣṭā lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:17585: samāsena jātīnāmapi prativādinigrahasthāne 'sti niveśa iti sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:17587: ta ime pramāṇādaya uddiṣṭā ityanena kṛta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:17592: pratyakṣāptāgamamayamahānyāyamūlā manojñā ṭīkāvīrudbhavatu kṛtināṃ nandrinī ṣaṭhpadānām
GSP29nystik_u:17593: // 3 // krūrāḥ kṛto 'ñjalirayaṃ balireṣa dattaḥ kāyo mayā praharatātra yathābhilāṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:17594: abhyarthaye vitathavāṅmayapāṃśuvarṣair- mā māvilīkuruta kīrtinadīḥ pareṣām
GSP29nystik_u:17599: 5 adhyāye 1 āhnike 43 sūtrāṇi 17 prakaraṇāni 2 āhnike 24 sūtrāṇi 7
